Defeat Local Legend, Rulers of the Chizhang Mountains.
Find the Guhua treasure.

wonders_of_the_world_true_mastery_of_spe.name: True Mastery of Spear and Sword

phases.desc: Complete all the trials in Wangshan Hall.
Solve the mystery left behind by the ancestors.
Complete the restoration and reconstruction of six ruined areas.
Destroy the seven sources of the miasma.

wonders_of_the_world_to_touch_the_face_o.name: To Touch the Face of Heaven

phases.desc: Use adeptal energy to temporarily break free from the earth's shackles.
...Should nonetheless be placed with care.

wonders_of_the_world_tea_i_am_tea_in_a_c.name: Tea I Am, Tea in a Cauldron

phases.desc: Help Uncle Luo repair the tea cauldron in Qiaoying Village.
Behold the ancient tree, returned to life.
Find the habitat of the Venerable Jadestone Turtle.

wonders_of_the_world_long_days_in_the_re.name: Long Days in the Realm Within

phases.desc: Fill all the ancient teacups between Chenyu Vale's mountains and rivers.
Enter the long-sealed Carp's Rest with Lingyuan.
Find all five "lost swords of Guhua."
Defeat a special unofficial Guhua Clan disciple 3 times.
Witness four murals.
Help the Millelith investigate the Iron and Salt Gang's illegal trade activities.
Obtain a limited-edition "Our Chenyu Vale Trek" commemorative photo album.
Discover the secret behind the Spiritscent Flower.
You've learned quite a bit about raising Sumpter Beasts... But is this really useful?
Restart the ruin machine in Chenyu Vale.

wonders_of_the_world_at_the_construction.name: At the Construction of the Endless Wall

phases.desc: Find the items left behind by the Millelith.
Hear of the beauty of the Bishui River from boat-songs.

wonders_of_the_world_the_carp_leaps_heav.name: The Carp Leaps, Heaven's Gates Open

phases.desc: Witness the Golden Carp leap into the valley.
Discover the secret of the Jademouth.

wonders_of_the_world_jade_o_jade_grant_m.name: "Jade, O Jade, Grant Me My Wish..."

phases.desc: Retrieve the final Votive Rainjade.
Ascend to the heavens with the dreams of the past.
Witness the completion of the Rainjade Rite.
Return to Carp's Rest.
Discover the secret of the jade in Mt. Laixin.

wonders_of_the_world_a_pulse_of_ice_and_.name: A Pulse of Ice and Wind

phases.desc: Search for the connection between Solitary Suanni and Cryo.
Help Guijarro find new inspiration...?
Witness a certain story regarding light, shadow and hydrology...

chenyus_splendor_continental_explorer_wh.name: Continental Explorer: Where the Bishui Lingers

phases.desc: Light up the Chenyu Vale map in the Liyue region.
Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Chenyu Vale within the Liyue region.
Follow 4 Seelie in Chenyu Vale to their Seelie Courts.
Follow 8 Seelie in Chenyu Vale to their Seelie Courts.
Follow 16 Seelie in Chenyu Vale to their Seelie Courts.
Open 60 chests in Chenyu Vale.
Open 120 chests in Chenyu Vale.
Open 240 chests in Chenyu Vale.
Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Chenyu Vale.
Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Chenyu Vale.
Complete 48 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Chenyu Vale.

chenyus_splendor_one_ring_for_the_rite_o.name: One Ring for the Rite of All

phases.desc: Upgrade the Votive Rainjade in Carp's Rest to its maximum level.
Complete "Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade."

mondstadt_the_city_of_wind_and_song.name: Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song

liyue_the_harbor_of_stone_and_contracts.name: Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts

domains_and_spiral_abyss_series_i.name: Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I

snezhnaya_does_not_believe_in_tears_seri.name: Snezhnaya Does Not Believe in Tears: Series I

inazuma_the_islands_of_thunder_and_etern.name: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I
Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II

the_chronicles_of_the_sea_of_fog.name: The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog

sumeru_the_gilded_desert_series_i.name: Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I

sumeru_the_gilded_desert_series_ii.name: Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II

fontaine_dance_of_the_dewwhite_springs_i.name: Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)
Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)
Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)

gladiators_finale.name: Gladiator's Finale
gladiators_finale.4pc: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

list_pieces.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
list_pieces.desc: No one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

list_pieces.name: Gladiator's Destiny
list_pieces.desc: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

list_pieces.name: Gladiator's Longing
list_pieces.desc: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

list_pieces.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
list_pieces.desc: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

list_pieces.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
list_pieces.desc: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

wanderers_troupe.name: Wanderer's Troupe
wanderers_troupe.4pc: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

list_pieces.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
list_pieces.desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

list_pieces.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
list_pieces.desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

list_pieces.name: Concert's Final Hour
list_pieces.desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

list_pieces.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
list_pieces.desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which plays a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

list_pieces.name: Conductor's Top Hat
list_pieces.desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

thundering_fury.name: Thundering Fury
thundering_fury.4pc: Increases DMG caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, Superconduct, and Hyperbloom by 40%, and the DMG Bonus conferred by Aggravate is increased by 20%. When Quicken or the aforementioned Elemental Reactions are triggered, Elemental Skill CD is decreased by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

list_pieces.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
list_pieces.desc: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

list_pieces.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
list_pieces.desc: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

list_pieces.name: Hourglass of Thunder
list_pieces.desc: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

list_pieces.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
list_pieces.desc: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

list_pieces.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
list_pieces.desc: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

thundersoother.name: Thundersoother
thundersoother.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

list_pieces.name: Thundersoother's Heart
list_pieces.desc: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

list_pieces.name: Thundersoother's Plume
list_pieces.desc: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

list_pieces.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
list_pieces.desc: A timepiece kept by hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shard of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

list_pieces.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
list_pieces.desc: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

list_pieces.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
list_pieces.desc: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

blizzard_strayer.name: Blizzard Strayer
blizzard_strayer.4pc: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

list_pieces.name: Snowswept Memory
list_pieces.desc: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

list_pieces.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
list_pieces.desc: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

list_pieces.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
list_pieces.desc: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

list_pieces.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
list_pieces.desc: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

list_pieces.name: Broken Rime's Echo
list_pieces.desc: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

heart_of_depth.name: Heart of Depth
heart_of_depth.4pc: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

list_pieces.name: Gilded Corsage
list_pieces.desc: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

list_pieces.name: Gust of Nostalgia
list_pieces.desc: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

list_pieces.name: Copper Compass
list_pieces.desc: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

list_pieces.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
list_pieces.desc: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

list_pieces.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
list_pieces.desc: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

maiden_beloved.name: Maiden Beloved
maiden_beloved.4pc: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

list_pieces.name: Maiden's Distant Love
list_pieces.desc: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

list_pieces.name: Maiden's Heart-Stricken Infatuation
list_pieces.desc: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

list_pieces.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
list_pieces.desc: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

list_pieces.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
list_pieces.desc: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

list_pieces.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
list_pieces.desc: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

viridescent_venerer.name: Viridescent Venerer
viridescent_venerer.4pc: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

list_pieces.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
list_pieces.desc: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

list_pieces.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
list_pieces.desc: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

list_pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
list_pieces.desc: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

list_pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
list_pieces.desc: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

list_pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
list_pieces.desc: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

bloodstained_chivalry.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bloodstained_chivalry.4pc: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s. Also triggers with wild animals such as boars, squirrels and frogs.

list_pieces.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
list_pieces.desc: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

list_pieces.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
list_pieces.desc: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

list_pieces.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
list_pieces.desc: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

list_pieces.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
list_pieces.desc: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

list_pieces.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
list_pieces.desc: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

noblesse_oblige.name: Noblesse Oblige
noblesse_oblige.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

list_pieces.name: Royal Flora
list_pieces.desc: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

list_pieces.name: Royal Plume
list_pieces.desc: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

list_pieces.name: Royal Pocket Watch
list_pieces.desc: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

list_pieces.name: Royal Silver Urn
list_pieces.desc: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

list_pieces.name: Royal Masque
list_pieces.desc: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

archaic_petra.name: Archaic Petra
archaic_petra.4pc: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

list_pieces.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
list_pieces.desc: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

list_pieces.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
list_pieces.desc: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

list_pieces.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
list_pieces.desc: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. It's lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

list_pieces.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
list_pieces.desc: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

list_pieces.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
list_pieces.desc: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

retracing_bolide.name: Retracing Bolide
retracing_bolide.4pc: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

list_pieces.name: Summer Night's Bloom
list_pieces.desc: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

list_pieces.name: Summer Night's Finale
list_pieces.desc: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

list_pieces.name: Summer Night's Moment
list_pieces.desc: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

list_pieces.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
list_pieces.desc: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

list_pieces.name: Summer Night's Mask
list_pieces.desc: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

crimson_witch_of_flames.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
crimson_witch_of_flames.4pc: Increases Overloaded and Burning, and Burgeon DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

list_pieces.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
list_pieces.desc: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

list_pieces.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
list_pieces.desc: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

list_pieces.name: Witch's End Time
list_pieces.desc: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

list_pieces.name: Witch's Heart Flames
list_pieces.desc: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

list_pieces.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
list_pieces.desc: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

lavawalker.name: Lavawalker
lavawalker.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

list_pieces.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
list_pieces.desc: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

list_pieces.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
list_pieces.desc: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

list_pieces.name: Lavawalker's Torment
list_pieces.desc: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

list_pieces.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
list_pieces.desc: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

list_pieces.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
list_pieces.desc: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

pale_flame.name: Pale Flame
pale_flame.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

list_pieces.name: Stainless Bloom
list_pieces.desc: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

list_pieces.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
list_pieces.desc: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

list_pieces.name: Moment of Cessation
list_pieces.desc: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

list_pieces.name: Surpassing Cup
list_pieces.desc: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

list_pieces.name: Mocking Mask
list_pieces.desc: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

tenacity_of_the_millelith.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
tenacity_of_the_millelith.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

list_pieces.name: Flower of Accolades
list_pieces.desc: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer

list_pieces.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
list_pieces.desc: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

list_pieces.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
list_pieces.desc: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

list_pieces.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
list_pieces.desc: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

list_pieces.name: General's Ancient Helm
list_pieces.desc: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

echoes_of_an_offering.name: Echoes of an Offering
echoes_of_an_offering.4pc:
When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK.
This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG.
If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%.
This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

list_pieces.name: Soulscent Bloom
list_pieces.desc: A jade carved into the shape of a flower. A phantom scent, here one instant and gone the next, swirls around it.

list_pieces.name: Jade Leaf
list_pieces.desc: A jade ornament shaped like a leaf. It seems to have once had deep meaning between specific friends.

list_pieces.name: Symbol of Felicitation
list_pieces.desc: A circular jade ornament. Legend has it that it was once used somewhere as a symbol for rituals to begin.

list_pieces.name: Chalice of the Font
list_pieces.desc: This teacup forever overflows with fresh water. Perhaps it was a gift from an adeptus, one of their relics, or just something they left behind.

list_pieces.name: Flowing Rings
list_pieces.desc: A pair of earrings made from a single piece of jade. It has a most gentle texture.

vermillion_hereafter.name: Vermillion Hereafter
vermillion_hereafter.4pc: After using an Elemental Burst. this character will gain the Nascent Light effect, increasing their ATK by 8% for 16s. When the character's HP decreases, their ATK will further increase by 10%. This increase can occur this way maximum of 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.8s. Nascent Light will be dispelled when the character leaves the field. If an Elemental Burst is used again during the duration of Nascent Light, the original Nascent Light will be dispelled.

list_pieces.name: Flowering Life
list_pieces.desc: An ancient memento. It still looks as alive as the being that preserved it several centuries ago.

list_pieces.name: Feather of Nascent Light
list_pieces.desc: A dimly lustrous pinion steeped in strong memories.

list_pieces.name: Solar Relic
list_pieces.desc: An ancient timepiece with a mighty solid look. Its luster is produced by sand crystal.

list_pieces.name: Moment of the Pact
list_pieces.desc: An old cup made of sand crystal. Its luster is somehow undimmed by age.

list_pieces.name: Thundering Poise
list_pieces.desc: This mask is said to have been made by the mountain people for a Yaksha. It is of simple make, but its surface still shines brightly nonetheless.

emblem_of_severed_fate.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
emblem_of_severed_fate.4pc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

list_pieces.name: Magnificent Tsuba
list_pieces.desc: Legends has it that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

list_pieces.name: Sundered Feather
list_pieces.desc: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

list_pieces.name: Storm Cage
list_pieces.desc: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

list_pieces.name: Scarlet Vessel
list_pieces.desc: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

list_pieces.name: Ornate Kabuto
list_pieces.desc: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

shimenawas_reminiscence.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
shimenawas_reminiscence.4pc: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

list_pieces.name: Entangling Bloom
list_pieces.desc: A lovely amulet made from twisted paper cord. It is said to hold the power to make wishes come true.

list_pieces.name: Shaft of Remembrance
list_pieces.desc: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

list_pieces.name: Morning Dew's Moment
list_pieces.desc: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

list_pieces.name: Hopeful Heart
list_pieces.desc: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

list_pieces.name: Capricious Visage
list_pieces.desc: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.

husk_of_opulent_dreams.name: Husk of Opulent Dreams
husk_of_opulent_dreams.4pc:
A character equipped with this Artifact set will obtain the Curiosity effect in the following conditions:
When on the field, the character gains 1 stack after hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, triggering a maximum of once every 0.3s.
When off the field, the character gains 1 stack every 3s.
Curiosity can stack up to 4 times, each providing 6% DEF and a 6% Geo DMG Bonus.
When 6 seconds pass without gaining a Curiosity stack, 1 stack is lost.

list_pieces.name: Bloom Times
list_pieces.desc: A small golden ornament with six petals that shall never wilt. It symbolizes the transience of mortal glories.

list_pieces.name: Plume of Luxury
list_pieces.desc: A feather-shaped token that was brought forth from a secluded hall. The compassion of its creator led to it being left within that mansion along with a certain slumbering form.

list_pieces.name: Song of Life
list_pieces.desc: As far as Inazuma is concerned, this is some small object from overseas. The heart of this mechanism has been removed, and its hands no longer turn.

list_pieces.name: Calabash of Awakening
list_pieces.desc: A gourd that has been adorned with powdered gold and black paint. Its original color can no longer be discerned, but its main use seems to be as a performance prop.

list_pieces.name: Skeletal Hat
list_pieces.desc: A hat that once shielded a wanderer from sun and rain. It eventually became a convenient tool with which faces might be hidden and expressions obscured.

ocean_hued_clam.name: Ocean-Hued Clam
ocean_hued_clam.4pc:
When the character equipping this artifact set heals a character in the party, a Sea-Dyed Foam will appear for 3 seconds, accumulating the amount of HP recovered from healing (including overflow healing).
At the end of the duration, the Sea-Dyed Foam will explode, dealing DMG to nearby opponents based on 90% of the accumulated healing.
(This DMG is calculated similarly to Reactions such as Electro-Charged, and Superconduct, but it is not affected by Elemental Mastery, Character Levels, or Reaction DMG Bonuses).
Only one Sea-Dyed Foam can be produced every 3.5 seconds.
Each Sea-Dyed Foam can accumulate up to 30,000 HP (including overflow healing).
There can be no more than one Sea-Dyed Foam active at any given time.
This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

list_pieces.name: Sea-Dyed Blossom
list_pieces.desc: A soft flower that has taken on the many shades of the capricious ocean. It shines with wondrous colors under the moon's silver light.

list_pieces.name: Deep Palace's Plume
list_pieces.desc: A down feather with the same hue as coral, said to come from a shrine maiden's ceremonial garment.

list_pieces.name: Cowry of Parting
list_pieces.desc: A clean, flawless shell that comes from the bottomless ocean.

list_pieces.name: Pearl Cage
list_pieces.desc: The shining pearls that the shrine maidens of Watatsumi Island offer up shine eternally and never dim.

list_pieces.name: Crown of Watatsumi
list_pieces.desc: An ancient, intricate crown that was once used by a forgotten clergy member. Today, this relic has been enshrined with great ceremony by the people of Watatsumi.

desert_pavilion_chronicle.name: Desert Pavilion Chronicle
desert_pavilion_chronicle.4pc: When Charged Attacks hit opponents, the equipping character's Normal Attack SPD will increase by 10% while Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will increase by 40% for 15s.

list_pieces.name: The First Days of the City of Kings
list_pieces.desc: An artificial flower that shimmers with a strange light. If you incline your ear to it, you can vaguely hear charming laughter issuing from within.

list_pieces.name: End of the Golden Realm
list_pieces.desc: A crystal-clear artificial feather that is one of the legacies of an ancient human realm. The cries of soaring eagles are also sealed within.

list_pieces.name: Timepiece of the Lost Path
list_pieces.desc: An ancient mechanical clock. The Jinni fragments continue to emit light at its center and vibrate ever so slightly, as if to say something...

list_pieces.name: Defender of the Enchanting Dream
list_pieces.desc: An ancient golden cup that is both marvelously and luxuriously wrought. Murmurings can be heard within its empty innards.

list_pieces.name: Legacy of the Desert High-Born
list_pieces.desc: Earrings made from amber gold that shines with a strange light.

flower_of_paradise_lost.name: Flower of Paradise Lost
flower_of_paradise_lost.4pc: The equipping character's Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG are increased by 40%. Additionally, after the equipping character triggers Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, they will gain another 25% bonus to the effect mentioned prior. Each stack of this lasts 10s. Max 4 stacks simultaneously. This effect can only be triggered once per second. The character who equips this can still trigger its effects when not on the field.

list_pieces.name: Ay-Khanoum's Myriad
list_pieces.desc: An amethyst bloom that has been beautifully sculpted in the image of an ancient, extinct flower.

list_pieces.name: Wilting Feast
list_pieces.desc: A feather left behind by a long-extinct bird species. It was inlaid with gold and gems by the ancient adherents of the Goddess of Flowers.

list_pieces.name: A Moment Congealed
list_pieces.desc: These sands no longer move no matter how you tilt the hourglass, now and forever defying the drift of time itself.

list_pieces.name: Secret-Keeper's Magic Bottle
list_pieces.desc: A small bottle made of purple crystal. An emerald cap keeps it tightly sealed.

list_pieces.name: Amethyst Crown
list_pieces.desc: A crown inlaid with amethyst and emerald. It seems to have been the headgear worn by ancient priests of the Goddess of Flowers.

nymphs_dream.name: Nymph's Dream
nymphs_dream.4pc: After Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts hit opponents, 1 stack of Mirrored Nymph will be triggered, lasting 8s. When under the effect of 1, 2, or 3 or more Mirrored Nymph stacks, ATK will be increased by 7%/16%/25%, and Hydro DMG will be increased by 4%/9%/15%. Mirrored Nymph stacks created by Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts exist independently.

list_pieces.name: Odyssean Flower
list_pieces.desc: The story must end, and even fresh flowers will wither. But the flower within one's dreams will always remain in full and fragrant bloom.

list_pieces.name: Wicked Mage's Plumule
list_pieces.desc: This was once a decorative feather in someone's hat. Being dark green, it is quite eye-catching indeed.

list_pieces.name: Nymph's Constancy
list_pieces.desc: A pocket watch that has long stopped working. It seems to have borne witness to many a passing year as its hands spun in vain.

list_pieces.name: Heroes' Tea Party
list_pieces.desc: A lovely teacup. Perhaps it was once used by people enjoying a leisurely afternoon together.

list_pieces.name: Fell Dragon's Monocle
list_pieces.desc: An exquisitely-made monocle. Ancient anecdotes say that one might be able to see the future through it.

vourukashas_glow.name: Vourukasha's Glow
vourukashas_glow.4pc: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG will be increased by 10%. After the equipping character takes DMG, the aforementioned DMG Bonus is increased by 80% for 5s. This effect increase can have 5 stacks. The duration of each stack is counted independently. These effects can be triggered even when the equipping character is not on the field.

list_pieces.name: Stamen of Khvarena's Origin
list_pieces.desc: An insignia in the shape of a lovely little flower that was once worn by pilgrims in times long bygone.

list_pieces.name: Vibrant Pinion
list_pieces.desc: An exquisite feather-shaped decoration on which the vivid hues of verdant leaves and fragrant flowers shimmer.

list_pieces.name: Ancient Abscission
list_pieces.desc: An ancient timepiece upon which the light of Khvarena gleams. It is filled with a pure liquid that appears alive.

list_pieces.name: Feast of Boundless Joy
list_pieces.desc: An opulent wine goblet that was once filled with nectar and honeydew, but is empty today.

list_pieces.name: Heart of Khvarena's Brilliance
list_pieces.desc: Intricate and vibrant earrings upon which the luster of a hundred flowers seems to flow.

deepwood_memories.name: Deepwood Memories
deepwood_memories.4pc: After Elemental Skills or Bursts hit opponents, the targets' Dendro RES will be decreased by 30% for 8s. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is not on the field.

list_pieces.name: Labyrinth Wayfarer
list_pieces.desc: This lovely gold-plated flower was plucked from the crown of the ruler of the forest.

list_pieces.name: Scholar of Vines
list_pieces.desc: An emerald leaf as fluffy as a feather. Plucked from the raiment of a forest scholar.

list_pieces.name: A Time of Insight
list_pieces.desc: Such timepieces are used by those who dedicate themselves to the way of the wise. These timepieces do not contain lifeless sand, but instead play host to tiny mustard seeds.

list_pieces.name: Lamp of the Lost
list_pieces.desc: This was originally an oil lamp in the style of the desert realm, but has since sprouted fluorescent green leaves.

list_pieces.name: Laurel Coronet
list_pieces.desc: This crown was bestowed by the deity with dominion over plants and trees. It was an heirloom of the royal house of the labyrinth. It was, at last, made the inheritance of the king's attendant.

gilded_dreams.name: Gilded Dreams
gilded_dreams.4pc: Within 8s of triggering an Elemental Reaction, the character equipping this will obtain buffs based on the Elemental Type of the other party members, ATK is increased by 14% for each party member whose Elemental Type is the same as the equipping character, and Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for every party member with a different Elemental Type. Each of the aforementioned buffs will count up to 3 characters. This effect can be triggered once every 8s. The character who equips this can still trigger its effects when not on the field.

list_pieces.name: Dreaming Steelbloom
list_pieces.desc: A flower bud made of hammered dark gold. Its crimson core is wrapped by petals that shall never open.

list_pieces.name: Feather of Judgment
list_pieces.desc: This special feather was once used to weigh the hearts of the guilty, but it has since lost its original function.

list_pieces.name: The Sunken Years
list_pieces.desc: This dark-golden sundial seems to tell the ancient tale of the desert.

list_pieces.name: Honeyed Final Feast
list_pieces.desc: A wine cup that was once used at a grand and ancient feast. It has now lost much of that luster.

list_pieces.name: Shadow of the Sand King
list_pieces.desc: This gold-inlaid headband was once used by desert priests in the days of old. They were made in imitation of one worn by a legendary ruler of the desert peoples.

golden_troupe.name: Golden Troupe
golden_troupe.4pc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 25%. Additionally, when not on the field, Elemental Skill DMG will be further increased by 25%. This effect will be cleared 2s after taking the field.

list_pieces.name: Golden Song's Variation
list_pieces.desc: A flower constructed out of clam, mother-of-pearl, and gold leaf. It blooms proudly.

list_pieces.name: Golden Bird's Shedding
list_pieces.desc: A gold feather made using silver and gold filigree. A crystal-clear sapphire is amounted atop it.

list_pieces.name: Golden Era's Prelude
list_pieces.desc: This lovely sundial is inlaid with silver and gold. It seems that time has stopped flowing atop its dial plate.

list_pieces.name: Golden Night's Bustle
list_pieces.desc: An ancient silver urn that was once filled with fine wine as red as rubies. Now, it contains nothing but bitter seawater.

list_pieces.name: Golden Troupe's Reward
list_pieces.desc: An ancient crown that resembles a stage prop more than it does some suzerain's headgear.

marechaussee_hunter.name: Marechaussee Hunter
marechaussee_hunter.4pc: When current HP increases or decreases, CRIT Rate will be increased by 12% for 5s. Max 3 stacks.

list_pieces.name: Hunter's Brooch
list_pieces.desc: An ancient emblem that was once awarded to those who had made exceptional contributions in battle.

list_pieces.name: Masterpiece's Overture
list_pieces.desc: A portable tool used to adjust the torque on some old-school clockwork machine. It has since lost its practical value.

list_pieces.name: Moment of Judgment
list_pieces.desc: A standard pocket watch. Its accuracy is not particularly high.

list_pieces.name: Forgotten Vessel
list_pieces.desc: A portable metal vessel containing strong wine. Can be stuffed into the pocket of an outer coat for ease of access and use.

list_pieces.name: Veteran's Visage
list_pieces.desc: An old mask that can, to some extent, stand in for a face marred by wounds. Its design can vary based on the wounded areas and the user's gender.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.4pc: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

list_pieces.name: Berserker's Rose
list_pieces.desc: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

list_pieces.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
list_pieces.desc: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

list_pieces.name: Berserker's Timepiece
list_pieces.desc: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

list_pieces.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
list_pieces.desc: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

list_pieces.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
list_pieces.desc: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

brave_heart.name: Brave Heart
brave_heart.4pc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

list_pieces.name: Medal of the Brave
list_pieces.desc: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

list_pieces.name: Prospect of the Brave
list_pieces.desc: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

list_pieces.name: Fortitude of the Brave
list_pieces.desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

list_pieces.name: Outset of the Brave
list_pieces.desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

list_pieces.name: Crown of the Brave
list_pieces.desc: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

defenders_will.name: Defender's Will
defenders_will.4pc: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

list_pieces.name: Guardian's Flower
list_pieces.desc: An iris that was cherished by the Guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the Guardian loved.

list_pieces.name: Guardian's Sigil
list_pieces.desc: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone's yearning to defend others like a shield.

list_pieces.name: Guardian's Clock
list_pieces.desc: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

list_pieces.name: Guardian's Vessel
list_pieces.desc: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

list_pieces.name: Guardian's Band
list_pieces.desc: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.4pc: Defeating an opponent has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

list_pieces.name: Gambler's Brooch
list_pieces.desc: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.

list_pieces.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
list_pieces.desc: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

list_pieces.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
list_pieces.desc: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

list_pieces.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
list_pieces.desc: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

list_pieces.name: Gambler's Earrings
list_pieces.desc: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

instructor.name: Instructor
instructor.4pc: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

list_pieces.name: Instructor's Brooch
list_pieces.desc: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

list_pieces.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
list_pieces.desc: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

list_pieces.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
list_pieces.desc: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

list_pieces.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
list_pieces.desc: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

list_pieces.name: Instructor's Cap
list_pieces.desc: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

martial_artist.name: Martial Artist
martial_artist.2pc: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
martial_artist.4pc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

list_pieces.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
list_pieces.desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

list_pieces.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
list_pieces.desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

list_pieces.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
list_pieces.desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

list_pieces.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
list_pieces.desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

list_pieces.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
list_pieces.desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

prayers_for_destiny.name: Prayers for Destiny
prayers_for_destiny.1pc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

list_pieces.name: Tiara of Torrents
list_pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayers_for_illumination.name: Prayers for Illumination
prayers_for_illumination.1pc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

list_pieces.name: Tiara of Flame
list_pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayers_for_wisdom.name: Prayers for Wisdom
prayers_for_wisdom.1pc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

list_pieces.name: Tiara of Thunder
list_pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayers_to_springtime.name: Prayers to Springtime
prayers_to_springtime.1pc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

list_pieces.name: Tiara of Frost
list_pieces.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

resolution_of_sojourner.name: Resolution of Sojourner
resolution_of_sojourner.4pc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

list_pieces.name: Heart of Comradeship
list_pieces.desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

list_pieces.name: Feather of Homecoming
list_pieces.desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

list_pieces.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
list_pieces.desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

list_pieces.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
list_pieces.desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

list_pieces.name: Crown of Parting
list_pieces.desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.4pc: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

list_pieces.name: Scholar's Bookmark
list_pieces.desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark, it had absorbed the scent from the pages.

list_pieces.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
list_pieces.desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen, the tip has long been stained black.

list_pieces.name: Scholar's Clock
list_pieces.desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

list_pieces.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
list_pieces.desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

list_pieces.name: Scholar's Lens
list_pieces.desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

the_exile.name: The Exile
the_exile.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

list_pieces.name: Exile's Flower
list_pieces.desc: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

list_pieces.name: Exile's Feather
list_pieces.desc: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

list_pieces.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
list_pieces.desc: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

list_pieces.name: Exile's Goblet
list_pieces.desc: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

list_pieces.name: Exile's Circlet
list_pieces.desc: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

tiny_miracle.name: Tiny Miracle
tiny_miracle.4pc: Incoming Elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

list_pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
list_pieces.desc: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

list_pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
list_pieces.desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

list_pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
list_pieces.desc: Just an ordinary everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

list_pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
list_pieces.desc: A cup commonly used for fortunetelling. It can also hold water, of course.

list_pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
list_pieces.desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

adventurer.name: Adventurer
adventurer.4pc: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

list_pieces.name: Adventurer's Flower
list_pieces.desc: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

list_pieces.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
list_pieces.desc: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

list_pieces.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
list_pieces.desc: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

list_pieces.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
list_pieces.desc: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

list_pieces.name: Adventurer's Bandana
list_pieces.desc: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

list_pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
list_pieces.desc: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

list_pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
list_pieces.desc: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

list_pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
list_pieces.desc: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

list_pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
list_pieces.desc: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

list_pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
list_pieces.desc: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

list_pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
list_pieces.desc: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

list_pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
list_pieces.desc: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

list_pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
list_pieces.desc: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

list_pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
list_pieces.desc: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

list_pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
list_pieces.desc: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

nighttime_whispers_in_the_echoing_woods.name: Nighttime Whispers in the Echoing Woods
nighttime_whispers_in_the_echoing_woods.4pc: After using an Elemental Skill, gain a 20% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s. While under a shield granted by the Crystallize reaction, the above effect will be increased by 150%, and this additional increase disappears 1s after that shield is lost.

list_pieces.name: Selfless Floral Accessory
list_pieces.desc: A brooch that the witch in the tale wore. As with the other ornaments she loved, this was characterized by butterfly-like shapes.

list_pieces.name: Honest Quill
list_pieces.desc: The witch in the tale used this dip pen. Its silken smooth writing is not even worth discussing amongst its various advantages.

list_pieces.name: Faithful Hourglass
list_pieces.desc: A sand timepiece that the witch relied on in her story. Legend has it that if you recite the wrong incantation over it, time will suddenly flow exceptionally quickly.

list_pieces.name: Magnanimous Ink Bottle
list_pieces.desc: An ink bottle utilized by the witch in the story. It possesses a strange enchantment no less powerful than the one cast upon the dip pen.

list_pieces.name: Compassionate Ladies' Hat
list_pieces.desc: The favored lady's hat of the witch in the story. She loved this piece of headwear for its weave of solemnity and playfulness.

song_of_days_past.name: Song of Days Past
song_of_days_past.4pc: When the equipping character heals a party member, the Yearning effect will be created for 6s, which records the total amount of healing provided (including overflow healing). When the duration expires, the Yearning effect will be transformed into the "Waves of Days Past" effect: When your active party member hits an opponent with a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill, or Elemental Burst, the DMG dealt will be increased by 8% of the total healing amount recorded by the Yearning effect. The "Waves of Days Past" effect is removed after it has taken effect 5 times or after 10s. A single instance of the Yearning effect can record up to 15,000 healing, and only a single instance can exist at once, but it can record the healing from multiple equipping characters. Equipping characters on standby can still trigger this effect.

list_pieces.name: Forgotten Oath of Days Past
list_pieces.desc: A flower in ever-bloom shaped from larimar and shimmering silver. They say that this is still viewed as a symbol of resistance.

list_pieces.name: Recollection of Days Past
list_pieces.desc: A butterfly-shaped feather accessory made from silver and azure crystals. It is said to, in the distant past, have symbolized an oath to never be parted.

list_pieces.name: Echoing Sound From Days Past
list_pieces.desc: An oddly shaped hourglass made from lazurite and aqua jade. It was reportedly inspired by the bell tower in Petrichor.

list_pieces.name: Promised Dream of Days Past
list_pieces.desc: An opulent vessel made based on the form of the legendary "Pure Grail." It is said to be able to fulfill the wishes of the purest of people.

list_pieces.name: Poem Passed Down from Days Past
list_pieces.desc: A formal hat that was once in vogue amongst creators of opera in Fontaine. Word has it that its feathered adornment was based on the legendary Lochknights' helms.

in_the_name_of_the_rosula_2023_12_20.name: In the Name of the Rosula

amber.name: Amber
amber.title: Gliding Champion
amber.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

talents.name: Sharpshooter
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Explosive Puppet
talents.desc: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage. Baron Bunny Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Hold Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny. The longer the button is held, the further the throw.

talents.name: Fiery Rain
talents.desc: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
talents.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of <color=skill>Fiery Rain</color> by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

talents.name: Precise Shot
talents.desc: <color=skill>Aimed Shot</color> hits on weak spots increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

talents.name: Gliding Champion
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.desc: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.desc: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting <color=skill>Baron Bunny</color>'s foot with a fully-charged <color=skill>Aimed Shot</color> manually detonates it.Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

barbara.name: Barbara
barbara.title: Shining Idol
barbara.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

talents.name: Whisper of Water
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Let the Show Begin♪
talents.desc: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them. Melody Loop ● On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP. ● On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing. ● Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP. ● Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.

talents.name: Shining Miracle♪
talents.desc: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

talents.name: Glorious Season
talents.desc: The Stamina Consumption of characters within <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color>'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

talents.name: Encore
talents.desc:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color> is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

talents.name: With My Whole Heart♪
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Barbara has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.desc: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.desc:
Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.desc:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.desc:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
● Automatically revives the fallen character.
● Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

beidou.name: Beidou
beidou.title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
beidou.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

talents.name: Oceanborne
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Tidecaller
talents.desc: Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder. Press Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG. Hold Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP. Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice. The shield possesses the following properties: ● Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency. ● Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.

talents.name: Stormbreaker
talents.desc: Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Thunderbeast's Targe ● When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG. ● Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken. A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.

talents.name: Retribution
talents.desc: Counterattacking with <color=skill>Tidecaller</color> at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

talents.name: Lightning Storm
talents.desc:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing <ccolor=skill>Tidecaller</color> with its maximum DMG Bonus:
● DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
● Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

talents.name: Conqueror of Tides
talents.desc:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color>'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Tidecaller</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.desc: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.desc: During the duration of <color=skill>Stormbreaker</color>, the <color=electro>Electro RES</color> of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

bennett.name: Bennett
bennett.title: Trial by Fire
bennett.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

talents.name: Strike of Fortune
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Passion Overload
talents.desc: Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is... Press A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG. Hold (Short) Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level. ● Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents. ● Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy. Bennett takes no damage from being launched.

talents.name: Fantastic Voyage
talents.desc: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field. Inspiration Field ● If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP. ● If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK. ● Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.

talents.name: Rekindle
talents.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Passion Overload</color>'s CD by 20%.

talents.name: Fearnaught
talents.desc: When inside <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s circle, <color=skill>Passion Overload</color>'s CD is decreased by 50% and Bennett cannot be launched by this skill's explosion.

talents.name: It Should Be Safe...
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.desc: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Passion Overload</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.desc:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures With Me
constellations.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=skill>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s radius gain a 15% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.

candace.name: Candace
candace.title: Golden Vow
candace.description: A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.

talents.name: Gleaming Spear: Guardian Stance
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
talents.desc: Tap Rushes forward with her shield, dealing Hydro DMG to opponents in front of her. Hold Raises her shield to block incoming attacks from nearby opponents, forming a barrier that absorbs DMG based on her Max HP and absorbs Hydro DMG 250% more effectively. This barrier lasts until the Elemental Skill is unleashed. After holding for a certain period of time, Candace will finish charging, and when the skill button is released, the skill duration expires, or when the barrier is broken, she will perform a leaping strike that deals Hydro DMG to opponents in front of her.

talents.name: Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide
talents.desc: Raising her weapon high, Candace calls upon a divine blessing that deals AoE Hydro DMG based on her Max HP and continuously confers the Prayer of the Crimson Crown on your active character. Prayer of the Crimson Crown This effect has the following properties: ● Characters deal increased Elemental DMG with their Normal Attacks. ● Whenever a character takes the field, they will unleash a rippling wave of water that deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. There is a limited number of waves that can be triggered in the duration of this skill. ● Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters under this effect will obtain a Hydro Infusion.

talents.name: Aegis of Crossed Arrows
talents.desc: If Candace is hit by an attack in the Hold duration of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color>, that skill will finish charging instantly.

talents.name: Celestial Dome of Sand
talents.desc: Characters affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> will deal 0.5% increased DMG to opponents for every 1,000 points of Candace's Max HP when they deal Elemental DMG with their Normal Attacks.

talents.name: To Dawn's First Light
talents.desc:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Returning Heiress of the Scarlet Sands
constellations.desc: The duration of Prayer of the Crimson Crown effect triggered by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Moon-Piercing Brilliance
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> hits opponents, Candace's Max HP will be increased by 20% for 15s.

constellations.name: Hunter's Supplication
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sentinel Oath
constellations.desc: Shortens the Hold CD of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> to be the same as that of the Tapping CD.

constellations.name: Heterochromatic Gaze
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Overflow
constellations.desc:
When characters (excluding Candace herself) affected by the Prayer of the Crimson Crown caused by Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide deal Elemental DMG to opponents using Normal Attacks, an attack wave will be unleashed that deals <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> equal to 15% of Candace's Max HP.
This effect can trigger once every 2.3s and is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

charlotte.name: Charlotte
charlotte.title: Lens of Verity
charlotte.description: Indefatigable reporter of The Steambird, constantly on the hunt for the "truth."

talents.name: Cool-Color Capture
talents.desc: Normal Attack Taking aim at targets using Monsieur Verite, her custom Kamera, Charlotte performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Cryo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a fixed amount of Stamina, and after a moment's preparation, will deploy Monsieur Verite to deal AoE Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Gathering the power of Cryo, Charlotte plunges toward the ground, dealing DMG to all opponents in her path and dealing AoE Cryo DMG upon landing. Arkhe: Pneuma At certain intervals, upon using a Charged Attack, Charlotte will cause a Spiritbreath Thorn to descend and pierce opponents, dealing Pneuma-aligned AoE Cryo DMG.

talents.name: Framing: Freezing Point Composition
talents.desc: Using the keen instincts of an ace reporter, Charlotte uses her photography skills to produce different effects based on whether the ability is Tapped or Held. Tap Takes a snapshot using Monsieur Verite, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her and applying Snappy Silhouette to a maximum of 5 opponents. During this effect's duration, it will deal Cryo DMG to affected opponents at intervals. Hold Popping Monsieur Verite's viewfinder open, Charlotte enters Composition Mode, and during this time, the viewfinder will expand as you hold until you reach a Finisher Frame state. In this state, Charlotte can move and change direction freely. When the hold state ends, Monsieur Verite will deal Cryo DMG to all opponents locked on within the viewfinder, and apply the same Snappy Silhouette as Tap Mode does to them. If you unleash this ability only after reaching Finisher Frame, you will instead apply Focused Impression, which lasts longer and deals more DMG, although the Skill CD will be longer. Composition Mode lasts a maximum of 15s and allows a maximum of 5 opponents to be selected.

talents.name: Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation
talents.desc: Condensing ice to create The Steambird's signature, Charlotte creates a Newsflash Field that will deal AoE Cryo DMG and restores HP for all nearby party members based on Charlotte's ATK. Newsflash Field ● While the ability is active, Monsieur Verite will deal Cryo DMG at intervals to opponents within its AoE. ● Will continuously restore HP to active character(s) within its AoE based on Charlotte's ATK.

talents.name: Moment of Impact
talents.desc: When opponents marked by "Focused Impression" are defeated, Framing: Freezing Point Composition's CD will be decreased by 2s. This CD decrease can be triggered 4 times every 12s.

talents.name: Diversified Investigation
talents.desc: When the party contains 1/2/3 Fontainians other than herself, Charlotte gains a 5%/10%/15% Healing Bonus. When the party contains 1/2/3 non-Fontainians, Charlotte gains a 5%/10%/15% Cryo DMG Bonus.

talents.name: First-Person Shutter
talents.desc: After activating the Special Analysis Zoom Lens, Charlotte's "Framing: Freezing Point Composition" Hold Mode cannot trigger its original effects, but instead enables her to take photos in a rather unique manner...

constellations.name: A Need to Verify Facts
constellations.desc: After Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation heals a character, it will mark them with Verification, which will heal them once every 2s for 80% of Charlotte's ATK. This effect lasts 6s.

constellations.name: A Duty to Pursue Truth
constellations.desc: When using Framing: Freezing Point Composition, when Monsieur Verite hits 1/2/3 (or more) opponents, Charlotte's own ATK will be increased by 10%/20%/30% for 12s.

constellations.name: An Imperative to Independence
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: A Responsibility to Oversee
constellations.desc: When Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation hits an opponent marked by Snappy Silhouette or Focused Impression, it will deal 10% more DMG and restore 2 Energy to Charlotte. This restoration can be triggered 5 times every 20s.

constellations.name: A Principle of Conscience
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Framing: Freezing Point Composition by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: A Summation of Interest
constellations.desc: When the active character's Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent marked by <color=skill>Framing: Freezing Point Composition</color>'s Focused Impression, Monsieur Verite will initiate a coordinated attack that deals 180% of Charlotte's ATK as <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color> and heals active character(s) within the AoE for 42% of Charlotte's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 6s and both DMG and healing dealt in this way will be considered as having been done by Charlotte's Elemental Burst.

chongyun.name: Chongyun
chongyun.title: Frozen Ardor
chongyun.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

talents.name: Demonbane
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
talents.desc:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a <color=cryo>Cryo</color> explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the <color=cryo>Cryo</color> explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with <color=cryo>Cryo</color>.

talents.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
talents.desc:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color> and launch opponents.

talents.name: Steady Breathing
talents.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

talents.name: Rimechaser Blade
talents.desc:
When the field created by <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.
Opponents hit by this blade will have their <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> decreased by 10% for 8s.

talents.name: Gallant Journey
