talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.desc: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.desc: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.desc:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=cryo>Cryo</color>.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

collei.name: Collei
collei.title: Sprout of Rebirth
collei.description: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

talents.name: Supplicant's Bowmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, Dendro energy will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal Dendro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Floral Brush
talents.desc:
Throws out a Floral Ring that deals 1 instance of <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> to targets it comes into contact with.
The Floral Ring will return after a set time, dealing <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> once again.

talents.name: Trump-Card Kitty
talents.desc:
Trusty Cuilein-Anbar comes to save the day!
Throws the doll named Cuilein-Anbar, causing an explosion that deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>, creating a Cuilein-Anbar Zone. Cuilein-Anbar will bounce around within this zone, dealing <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Floral Sidewinder
talents.desc:
If one of your party members has triggered Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions before the Floral Ring returns, it will grant the character the Sprout effect upon return, which will continuously deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> equivalent to 40% of Collei's ATK to nearby opponents for 3s.
If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed. DMG dealt by Sprout is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

talents.name: The Languid Wood
talents.desc:
When a character within the Cuilein-Anbar Zone triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Zone's duration will be increased by 1s.
A single <color=skill>Trump-Card Kitty</color> can be extended by up to 3s.

talents.name: Gliding Champion of Sumeru
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Deepwood Patrol
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Through Hill and Copse
constellations.desc:
The Passive Talent <color=skill>Floral Sidewinder</color> is changed to this:
The Floral Ring will grant the character the Sprout effect from <color=skill>Floral Sidewinder</color> upon return, dealing 40% of Collei's ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> to nearby opponents for 3s.
From the moment of using <color=skill>Floral Brush</color> to the moment when this instance of Sprout effect ends, if any of your party members triggers Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon reactions, the Sprout effect will be extended by 3s.
The Sprout effect can only be extended this way once. If another Sprout effect is triggered during its initial duration, the initial effect will be removed.
Requires you to have unlocked the <color=skill>Floral Sidewinder</color> Passive Talent.

constellations.name: Scent of Summer
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Floral Brush</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Gift of the Woods
constellations.desc: Using <color=skill>Trump-Card Kitty</color> will increase all nearby characters' Elemental Mastery by 60 for 12s (not including Collei herself).

constellations.name: All Embers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Trump-Card Kitty</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forest of Falling Arrows
constellations.desc:
When the Floral Ring hits, it will create a miniature Cuilein-Anbar that will deal 200% of Collei's ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color>.
Each <color=skill>Floral Brush</color> can only create one such miniature Cuilein-Anbar.

diona.name: Diona
diona.title: Kätzlein Cocktail
diona.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

talents.name: Kätzlein Style
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Icy Paws
talents.desc: Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target. Press Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws. Hold Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus. The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.

talents.name: Signature Mix
talents.desc: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE. Drunken Mist ● Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE. ● Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.

talents.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
talents.desc: Characters shielded by <color=skill>Icy Paws</color> have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

talents.name: Drunkards' Farce
talents.desc: Opponents who enter the AoE of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color> have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

talents.name: Complimentary Bar Food
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Diona has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color> end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.desc:
Increases <color=skill>Icy Paws</color>' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=skill>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A—Another Round?
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.desc: Within the radius of <color=skill>Signature Mix</color>, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.name: Double Shot, on the Rocks
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Icy Paws</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.desc:
Characters within <color=skill>Signature Mix</color>'s radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
● Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
● Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

dori.name: Dori
dori.title: Treasure of Dream Garden
dori.description: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

talents.name: Marvelous Sword-Dance (Modified)
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 3 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon
talents.desc:
Directs a Spirit-Warding Lamp to fire off Troubleshooter Shots at opponents, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
When Troubleshooter Shots hit opponents, they will create 2 After-Sales Service Rounds that will automatically track opponents and deal <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Alcazarzaray's Exactitude
talents.desc: Summons forth the Jinni within the lamp to give the client various kinds of aid. Jinni Connects to a nearby character. The connected character will: ● Continuously restore HP based on Dori's Max HP. ● Continuously regenerate Energy. ● Be affected by Electro. When the connector between the Jinni and the character touches opponents, it will deal one instance of Electro DMG to them every 0.4s. Only one Jinni can exist at one time.

talents.name: An Eye for Gold
talents.desc:
After a character connected to the Jinni triggers an Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or an <color=electro>Electro</color> Swirl or Crystallize reaction, the CD of <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

talents.name: Compound Interest
talents.desc:
When the Troubleshooter Shots or After-Sales Service Rounds from <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> hit opponents, Dori will restore 5 Elemental Energy for every 100% Energy Recharge possessed.
Per <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color>, only one instance of Energy restoration can be triggered and a maximum of 15 Energy can be restored this way.

talents.name: Unexpected Order
talents.desc: When Dori crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Additional Investment
constellations.desc: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by Troubleshooter Shots is increased by 1.

constellations.name: Special Franchise
constellations.desc: When you are in combat and the Jinni heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

constellations.name: Wonders Never Cease
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Alcazarzaray's Exactitude</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Discretionary Supplement
constellations.desc:
The character connected to the Jinni will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:
● When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.
● When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: Value for Mora
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sprinkling Weight
constellations.desc:
Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using <color=skill>Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon</color>:
● <color=electro>Electro Infusion</color>.
● When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.

faruzan.name: Faruzan
faruzan.title: Enigmatic Machinist
faruzan.description: "Much of the content found within this book originates from Madam Faruzan's theories and manuscripts. It is our hope that future generations of scholars will remember her name when she returns to the Akademiya." — Quote from the book "Introduction to Ancient Machines." This text was released almost a century ago and is still on the Kshahrewar's essential reading list today.

talents.name: Parthian Shot
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, mighty winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, hitting opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Wind Realm of Nasamjnin
talents.desc: Faruzan deploys a polyhedron that deals AoE Anemo DMG to nearby opponents. She will also enter the Manifest Gale state. While in the Manifest Gale state, Faruzan's next fully charged shot will consume this state and will become a Hurricane Arrow that contains high-pressure currents. This arrow deals Anemo DMG based on the DMG of a fully charged Aimed Shot from "Normal Attack: Parthian Shot." Pressurized Collapse The Hurricane Arrow will apply a Pressurized Collapse effect to the opponent or character hit. This effect will be removed after a short delay, creating a vortex that deals AoE Anemo DMG and pulls nearby objects and opponents in. If the Hurricane Arrow does not hit any opponent or character, it will create a Pressurized Collapse effect at its point of impact. The vortex DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

talents.name: The Wind's Secret Ways
talents.desc: Faruzan deploys a Dazzling Polyhedron that unleashes a Whirlwind Pulse and deals AoE Anemo DMG. While the Dazzling Polyhedron persists, it will continuously move along a triangular path. Once it reaches each corner of that triangular path, it will unleash 1 more Whirlwind Pulse. Whirlwind Pulse ● When the Whirlwind Pulse is unleashed, it will apply Perfidious Wind's Bale to nearby opponents, decreasing their Anemo RES. ● The Whirlwind Pulse will also apply Prayerful Wind's Benefit to all nearby party members when it is unleashed, granting them an Anemo DMG Bonus.

talents.name: Impetuous Flow
talents.desc: When Faruzan is in the Manifest Gale state created by <color=skill>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color>, the amount of time taken to charge a shot is decreased by 60%, and she can apply <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Perfidious Wind's Bale to opponents who are hit by the vortex created by Pressurized Collapse.

talents.name: Lost Wisdom of the Seven Caverns
talents.desc: When characters affected by <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Prayerful Wind's Gift deal <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> using Normal, Charged, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, or Elemental Bursts to opponents, they will gain the Hurricane Guard effect: This DMG will be increased based on 32% of Faruzan's Base ATK. 1 instance of Hurricane Guard can occur once every 0.8s. This DMG Bonus will be cleared after Prayerful Wind's Benefit expires or after the effect is triggered once.

talents.name: Tomes Light the Path
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Sumeru Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Truth by Any Means
constellations.desc: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under a single <color=skill>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color> effect.

constellations.name: Overzealous Intellect
constellations.desc: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color> is increased by 6s.

constellations.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Wind Realm of Nasamjnin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Comprehension
constellations.desc:
The vortex created by Pressurized Collapses will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan.
A maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

constellations.name: Wonderland of Rumination
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth
constellations.desc: Characters affected by <color=skill>The Wind's Secret Ways</color>' Prayerful Wind's Benefit have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>. When the active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Benefit, they will apply Pressurized Collapse to the opponent damaged. This effect can be triggered once every 3s. This CD is shared between all party members.

fischl.name: Fischl
fischl.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
fischl.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

talents.name: Bolts of Downfall
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Nightrider
talents.desc:
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.

Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.

talents.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
talents.desc:
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl.
Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
● Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
● Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to opponents she comes in contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once.
● Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.

talents.name: Stellar Predator
talents.desc: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

talents.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
talents.desc: If your active character triggers an <color=electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color> when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

talents.name: Mein Hausgarten
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.desc: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Nightrider</color> is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nightrider</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> is used, it deals 222% of ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.desc: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.

diluc.name: Diluc
diluc.title: The Dark Side of Dawn
diluc.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

talents.name: Tempered Sword
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Searing Onslaught
talents.desc:
Performs a forward slash that deals <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.

This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

talents.name: Dawn
talents.desc:
Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.
The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.

talents.name: Relentless
talents.desc: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

talents.name: Blessing of Phoenix
talents.desc: The <color=pyro>Pyro</color> Infusion provided by <color=skill>Dawn</color> lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> during the duration of this effect.

talents.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Forging Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.desc: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.desc:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.desc:
Casting <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color>, casting the next <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dawn</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.desc:
After casting <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color>, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

jean.name: Jean
jean.title: Dandelion Knight
jean.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind. Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Gale Blade
talents.desc: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG. Hold At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration.

talents.name: Dandelion Breeze
talents.desc: Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK. Dandelion Field ● Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo. ● Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field.

talents.name: Wind Companion
talents.desc: Hits by Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

talents.name: Let the Wind Lead
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color> will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

talents.name: Guiding Breeze
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Jean has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.desc: Increases the pulling speed of <color=skill>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.desc: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.desc: Within the Field created by <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Gale Blade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.desc: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

kaeya.name: Kaeya
kaeya.title: Frostwind Swordsman
kaeya.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

talents.name: Ceremonial Bladework
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Frostgnaw
talents.desc: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents in front of Kaeya.

talents.name: Glacial Waltz
talents.desc:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.

talents.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
talents.desc: Every hit with <color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

talents.name: Glacial Heart
talents.desc:
Opponents Frozen by <color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> will drop additional Elemental Particles.
<color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

talents.name: Hidden Strength
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.desc: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=cryo>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.desc: Every time <color=skill>Glacial Waltz</color> defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.desc:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

keqing.name: Keqing
keqing.title: Driving Thunder
keqing.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

talents.name: Yunlai Swordsmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Stellar Restoration
talents.desc: Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit. Hold Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time. Lightning Stiletto If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects: ● If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain. ● If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.

talents.name: Starward Sword
talents.desc:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> in an AOE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
The final attack deals massive <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Thundering Penance
talents.desc: After recasting <color=skill>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an <color=electro>Electro</color> Infusion for 5s.

talents.name: Aristocratic Dignity
talents.desc: When casting <color=skill>Starward Sword</color>, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

talents.name: Land's Overseer
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.desc: Recasting <color=skill>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.desc:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <color=electro>Electro</color>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Starward Sword</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.desc: For 10s after Keqing triggers an <color=electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color>, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stellar Restoration</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.desc:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

klee.name: Klee
klee.title: Fleeing Sunlight
klee.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

talents.name: Kaboom!
talents.desc: Normal Attack Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Jumpy Dumpty
talents.desc:
<color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> is tons of boom-bang-fun!
When thrown, <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> bounces thrice, igniting and dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> with every bounce.

On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

Starts with 2 charges.

talents.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
talents.desc: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> to attack nearby opponents, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Pounding Surprise
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

talents.name: Sparkling Burst
talents.desc: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

talents.name: All Of My Treasures!
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Chained Reactions
constellations.desc: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.desc: Being hit by <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.desc: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.desc:
While under the effects of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.

lisa.name: Lisa
lisa.title: Witch of Purple Rose
lisa.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

talents.name: Lightning Touch
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Violet Arc
talents.desc: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. Press Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE. Hold After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.

talents.name: Lightning Rose
talents.desc:
Summons a <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
The <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> throughout the ability's duration.

talents.name: Induced Aftershock
talents.desc: Hits by Charged Attacks apply <color=skill>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status to opponents.

talents.name: Static Electricity Field
talents.desc: Opponents hit by <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

talents.name: General Pharmaceutics
talents.desc: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.desc:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=skill>Violet Arc</color>.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.desc:
Holding <color=skill>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:
● Increases DEF by 25%.
● Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.desc: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=skill>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Violet Arc</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.desc:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=skill>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

mona.name: Mona
mona.title: Astral Reflection
mona.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

talents.name: Ripple of Fate
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Mirror Reflection of Doom
talents.desc: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts. The Phantom has the following special properties: ● Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire. ● Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. ● When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Hold Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom. Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.

talents.name: Stellaris Phantasm
talents.desc: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE. Illusory Bubble Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects: ● Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it. ● Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro DMG in the process. Omen During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents.

talents.name: Illusory Torrent
talents.desc: Alternate Sprint Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming stamina to move rapidly. When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water. Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears.

talents.name: "Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!"
talents.desc:
After she has used <color=skill>Illusory Torrent</color> for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.
A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of <color=skill>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color>.

talents.name: Waterborne Destiny
talents.desc: Increases Mona's <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

talents.name: Principium of Astrology
talents.desc: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.desc:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <color=hydro>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</color> are enhanced for 8s:
● <color=electro>Electro-Charged DMG</color> increases by 15%.
● Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
● <color=hydro>Hydro</color> Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
● Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.desc:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stellaris Phantasm</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.desc: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.desc:
Upon entering <color=skill>Illusory Torrent</color>, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

ningguang.name: Ningguang
ningguang.title: Eclipsing Star
ningguang.description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

talents.name: Sparkling Scatter
talents.desc: Normal Attack Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Jade Screen
talents.desc: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Jade Screen ● Blocks opponents' projectiles. ● Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP. Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.

talents.name: Starshatter
talents.desc:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive <color=geo>Geo DMG</color>.
If <color=skill>Starshatter</color> is cast when a <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> is nearby, the <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

talents.name: Backup Plan
talents.desc: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

talents.name: Strategic Reserve
talents.desc: A character that passes through the <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> will gain a 12% <color=geo>Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

talents.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby ore veins used in forging on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.desc: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty Be the Array of Stars
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Starshatter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible Be the Jade Screen
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Jade Screen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur Be the Seven Stars
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Starshatter</color> is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

noelle.name: Noelle
noelle.title: Chivalric Blossom
noelle.description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Breastplate
talents.desc:
Summons protective stone armor, dealing <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.
The shield has the following properties:
● When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters.
● Possesses 150% DMG Absorption efficiency against all Elemental and Physical DMG.

The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.

talents.name: Sweeping Time
talents.desc:
Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing <color=geo>Geo DMG</color>.
Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
● Larger attack AoE.
● Converts attack DMG to <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
● Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

talents.name: Devotion
talents.desc:
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when your active character's HP falls below 30%:
Creates a shield for your active character that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF.
The shield has a 150% DMG Absorption effectiveness against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
This effect can only occur once every 60s.

talents.name: Nice and Clean
talents.desc:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of <color=skill>Breastplate</color> by 1s.
Hitting multiple opponents with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

talents.name: Maid's Knighthood
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.desc: While <color=skill>Sweeping Time</color> and <color=skill>Breastplate</color> are both in effect, the chance of <color=skill>Breastplate</color>'s healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.desc: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Breastplate</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Breastplate</color>'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sweeping Time</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Sweeping Time</color> increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

qiqi.name: Qiqi
qiqi.title: Icy Resurrection
qiqi.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

talents.name: Ancient Sword Art
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
talents.desc: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents. Herald of Frost ● On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK. ● Periodically regenerates your active character's HP. ● Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in their path.

talents.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
talents.desc: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG. Fortune-Preserving Talisman When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

talents.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
talents.desc: When a character under the effects of <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

talents.name: A Glimpse Into Arcanum
talents.desc: When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

talents.name: Former Life Memories
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.desc: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.desc: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <color=cryo>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.desc: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.desc:
Using <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

razor.name: Razor
razor.title: Wolf Boy
razor.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

talents.name: Steel Fang
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Claw and Thunder
talents.desc: Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical. Press Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to opponents in front of Razor. Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate. Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration. Hold Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

talents.name: Lightning Fang
talents.desc: Summons the Wolf Within, which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him. The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration. The Wolf Within ● Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG. ● Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES. ● Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status. ● Disables Razor's Charged Attacks. ● Increases Razor's resistance to interruption. These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield. When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.

talents.name: Awakening
talents.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>'s CD by 18%. Using <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color> resets the CD of <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>.

talents.name: Hunger
talents.desc: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

talents.name: Wolvensprint
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.desc: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.desc: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.desc: When casting <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color> (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.desc:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
When Razor is not using <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an <color=electro>Electro</color> Sigil for <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>.

sucrose.name: Sucrose
sucrose.title: Harmless Sweetie
sucrose.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

talents.name: Wind Spirit Creation
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
talents.desc: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
talents.desc: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Catalyst Conversion
talents.desc: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

talents.name: Mollis Favonius
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> or <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

talents.name: Astable Invention
talents.desc: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.desc: The duration of <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.desc: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.desc: If <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

venti.name: Venti
venti.title: Windborne Bard
venti.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

talents.name: Divine Marksmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Skyward Sonnet
talents.desc: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky! Press Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air. Hold Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

talents.name: Wind's Grand Ode
talents.desc:
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge <color=skill>Stormeye</color> that sucks in opponents and deals continuous <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>.

Elemental Absorption
If the <color=skill>Stormeye</color> comes into contact with <color=hydro>Hydro</color>/<color=pyro>Pyro</color>/<color=cryo>Cryo</color>/<color=electro>Electro</color>, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Embrace of Winds
talents.desc: Holding <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

talents.name: Stormeye
talents.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

talents.name: Windrider
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.desc: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.desc: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=anemo>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.desc:
Targets who take DMG from <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

xiangling.name: Xiangling
xiangling.title: Exquisite Delicacy
xiangling.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

talents.name: Dough-Fu
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guoba Attack
talents.desc: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Pyronado
talents.desc: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> whirling around her. The <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

talents.name: Crossfire
talents.desc: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

talents.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Guoba Attack</color>'s effects end, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

talents.name: Chef de Cuisine
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an ATK-boosting dish, Xiangling has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.desc: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=pyro>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.desc: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.desc: <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.desc: For the duration of <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

xingqiu.name: Xingqiu
xingqiu.title: Juvenile Galant
xingqiu.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

talents.name: Guhua Style
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
talents.desc:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:
● When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
● Increases the character's resistance to interruption.

20% of Xingqiu's <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords.

The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the <color=hydro>Wet</color> status onto the character.

talents.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
talents.desc: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords. Rainbow Bladework ● Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG. ● Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.

talents.name: Hydropathic
talents.desc: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

talents.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
talents.desc: Xingqiu gains a 20% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Flash of Genius
talents.desc: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.desc:
Extends the duration of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.
Decreases the <color=hydro>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.desc: Throughout the duration of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.desc: Activating 2 of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

tartaglia.name: Tartaglia
tartaglia.title: Childe
tartaglia.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

talents.name: Cutting Torrent
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply the Riptide status. Riptide Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG. ● Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s. ● Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide creates a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact. When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, he cannot perform a plunging attack.

talents.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
talents.desc: Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering Melee Stance. In this Stance, Tartaglia's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Hydro DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion and change as follows: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG. Riptide Slash Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s. After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD. If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer.

talents.name: Havoc: Obliteration
talents.desc: Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting. Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status. Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use. Melee Stance: Light of Obliteration Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast. Riptide Blast When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

talents.name: Never Ending
talents.desc: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

talents.name: Sword of Torrents
talents.desc: When Tartaglia is in <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee stance, on dealing a CRIT hit, Normal and Charged Attacks apply the Riptide status effects to opponents.

talents.name: Master of Weaponry
talents.desc: Increases your own party members' Normal Attack Level by 1.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 20%

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.desc: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.desc:
If Tartaglia is in <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Havoc: Obliteration</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Havoc: Obliteration</color> is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> is reset.
This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

wanderer.name: Wanderer
wanderer.title: Eons Adrift
wanderer.description: "Those who believe cast the gods in glory, while unbelievers witness how gods transcend. But as for him, I will not characterize him as either. All uncertainties are but foundations for his future path."  — Blessed One of Wisdom, Mahakusaladhamma – Buer

talents.name: Yuuban Meigen
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina, gathers a build up of high wind pressure, and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the power of Anemo, the Wanderer plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
talents.desc: Concentrates the power of the winds to break free from the shackles of the earth, dealing AoE Anemo DMG before leaping into the air and entering the Windfavored state. Windfavored The Wanderer cannot perform Plunging Attacks in this state. When he uses Normal and Charged Attacks, they will be converted into Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai respectively; the DMG they deal and their AoE will be increased, and their DMG will be considered Normal and Charged Attack DMG respectively. Kuugo: Toufukai will not consume Stamina. The Wanderer will hover persistently during this time. While this state is active, the Wanderer's movements gain the following properties:Persistently consumes Kuugoryoku Points to maintain this hovering state.When sprinting, additional Kuugoryoku Points will be consumed for the Wanderer to accelerate mid-air. Holding sprint will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to maintain speed. This effect will replace his default sprint.Jumping expends extra Kuugoryoku Points to increase hovering height. Holding jump will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to keep increasing hovering height. Running out of Kuugoryoku Points will end the Windfavored state. A second cast during the duration of Windfavored will also end it.

talents.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
talents.desc: Compresses the atmosphere into a singlular vacuum that grinds all troubles away, dealing multiple instances of <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>. If the character is in the Windfavored state due to the skill "Hanega: Song of the Wind," Windfavored state will end after casting.

talents.name: Jade-Claimed Flower
talents.desc:
If Hanega: Song of the Wind comes into contact with **Hydro**/**Pyro**/**Cryo**/**Electro** when it is unleashed, this instance of the Windfavored state will obtain buffs according to the contacted element(s):**Hydro**: Kuugoryoku Point cap increases by 20.**Pyro**: ATK increases by 30%.**Cryo**: CRIT Rate increases by 20%.**Electro**: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent, 0.8 Energy will be restored. Energy can be restored this way every 0.2s.
You can have up to 2 different kinds of these buffs simultaneously.

talents.name: Gales of Reverie
talents.desc:
When the Wanderer hits opponents with Kuugo: Fushoudan or Kuugo: Toufukai in his Windfavored state, he has a 16% chance to obtain the Descent effect: The next time the Wanderer accelerates in mid-air while in this instance of the Windfavored state, this effect will be removed, this acceleration instance will not consume any Kuugoryoku Points, and he will fire off 4 wind arrows that deal 35% of his ATK as <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> each.
For each Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai that does not produce this effect, the next attack of those types will have a 12% increased chance of producing it. The calculation of the effect production is done once every 0.1s.

talents.name: Strum the Swirling Winds
talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Bows and Catalysts is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
constellations.desc:
When in the Windfavored state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

constellations.name: Niban: Moonlit Isle Amidst White Waves
constellations.desc:
When in the Windfavored state, Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

constellations.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
constellations.desc:
When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.

constellations.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
constellations.desc:
