Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
constellations.desc:
When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the Windfavored state, the following effects will occur:
Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.
When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.

xinyan.name: Xinyan
xinyan.title: Blazing Riff
xinyan.description: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

talents.name: Dance on Fire
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sweeping Fervor
talents.desc:
Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> on nearby opponents, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan's DEF and on the number of opponents hit.
● Hitting 0 – 1 opponents grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib.
● Hitting 2 opponents grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In.
● Hitting 3 or more opponents grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

The shield has the following special properties:
● When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.
● It has 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Riff Revolution
talents.desc:
Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby opponents and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd.
The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

talents.name: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."
talents.desc:
Decreases the number of opponents <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> must hit to trigger each level of shielding.
● Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 opponent hit.
● Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 opponents hit or more.

talents.name: "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
talents.desc: Characters shielded by <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

talents.name: A Rad Recipe
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.desc:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Impromptu Opening
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Riff Revolution</color>'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.name: Double-Stop
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color>'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Riff Revolution</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.desc: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

zhongli.name: Zhongli
zhongli.title: Vago Mundo
zhongli.description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

talents.name: Rain of Stone
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Dominus Lapidis
talents.desc: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between. Press Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele. Hold Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects: ● If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele. ● Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP. ● Deals AoE Geo DMG. ● If there are nearby targets with the Geo element, it will drain a large amount of Geo element from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG. Stone Stele When created, deals AoE Geo DMG. Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby Geo constructs, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents. The Stone Stele is considered a Geo construct that can both be climbed and used to block attacks. Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time. Jade Shield Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG. Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.

talents.name: Planet Befall
talents.desc: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them. Petrification Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.

talents.name: Resonant Waves
talents.desc:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:
● Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.
Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

talents.name: Dominance of Earth
talents.desc:
Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
● Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.
● <color=skill>Dominus Lapidis</color>' Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.
● <color=skill>Planet Befall</color>'s DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

talents.name: Arcanum of Crystal
talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Forging Polearm-type weapons.

constellations.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by <color=skill>Dominus Lapidis</color> that may exist simultaneously to 2.

constellations.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Planet Befall</color> grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

constellations.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dominus Lapidis</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
constellations.desc: Increases <color=skill>Planet Befall</color>'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of <color=skill>Planet Befall</color>'s Petrification effect by 2s.

constellations.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Planet Befall</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
constellations.desc:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

albedo.name: Albedo
albedo.title: Kreideprinz
albedo.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
talents.desc: Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance. Solar Isotoma has the following properties: ● When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF. ● Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s. ● When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time. ● Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time. Hold to designate the location of the skill.

talents.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
talents.desc:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing <color=geo>AoE Geo DMG</color> in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing <color=geo>AoE Geo DMG</color>.

Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

talents.name: Calcite Might
talents.desc: Transient Blossoms generated by <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

talents.name: Homuncular Nature
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

talents.name: Flash of Genius (Albedo)
talents.desc: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.desc: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.desc:
Transient Blossoms generated by <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
● Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
● This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.desc: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadean
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of <color=skill>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.desc: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

ganyu.name: Ganyu
ganyu.title: Plenilune Gaze
ganyu.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

talents.name: Liutian Archery
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals Cryo DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals Cryo DMG. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Trail of the Qilin
talents.desc: Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Ice Lotus ● Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it. ● Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP. ● Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

talents.name: Celestial Shower
talents.desc:
Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred <color=cryo>Cryo</color> Pearl that exorcises evil.
During its ability duration, the Sacred <color=cryo>Cryo</color> Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Undivided Heart
talents.desc: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

talents.name: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
talents.desc: <color=skill>Celestial Shower</color> grants a 20% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> to active members in the AoE.

talents.name: Preserved for the Hunt
talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Forging Bow-type weapons.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.desc:
Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> by 15% for 6s.
A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Trail of the Qilin</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Celestial Shower</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.desc:
Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=skill>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Trail of the Qilin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.desc: Using <color=skill>Trail of the Qilin</color> causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

hu_tao.name: Hu Tao
hu_tao.title: Fragrance in Thaw
hu_tao.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

talents.name: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guide to Afterlife
talents.desc: Only an unwavering flame can cleanse the impurities of this world. Hu Tao consumes a set portion of her HP to knock the surrounding enemies back and enter the Paramita Papilio state. Paramita Papilio ● Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK. ● Converts attack DMG to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. ● Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to the enemies hit. ● Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption. Blood Blossom Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG. Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself. Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.

talents.name: Spirit Soother
talents.desc:
Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> in a large AoE.
Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times, based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.

talents.name: Flutter By
talents.desc: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

talents.name: Sanguine Rouge
talents.desc: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> is increased by 33%.

talents.name: The More the Merrier
talents.desc: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.desc: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks [sic] do not consume Stamina.

constellations.name: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.desc: Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied. Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

constellations.name: Lingering Carmine
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guide to Afterlife</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.desc: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.name: Floral Incense
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit Soother</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.desc:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

xiao.name: Xiao
xiao.title: Vigilant Yaksha
xiao.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

talents.name: Whirlwind Thrust
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

talents.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
talents.desc:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.

talents.name: Bane of All Evil
talents.desc: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Yaksha's Mask ● Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability. ● Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG. ● Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP. The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.

talents.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
talents.desc: While under the effects of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color>, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists. The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

talents.name: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> increases the DMG of subsequent uses of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 15%. This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

talents.name: Transcension: Gravity Defier
talents.desc:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.desc: Increases <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>'s charges by 1.

constellations.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.desc: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.desc: While under the effects of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> while ignoring its CD.

rosaria.name: Rosaria
rosaria.title: Thorny Benevolence
rosaria.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

talents.name: Spear of the Church
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Ravaging Confession
talents.desc:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.

talents.name: Rites of Termination
talents.desc:
Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

talents.name: Regina Probationum
talents.desc: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color>, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

talents.name: Shadow Samaritan
talents.desc:
Casting <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

talents.name: Night Walk
talents.desc:
At night (18:00 – 6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the same effects.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.desc: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.desc: The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color>'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color> is cast.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color>'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

eula.name: Eula
eula.title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
eula.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Edel
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Icetide Vortex
talents.desc: Sharp frost, swift blade. Press Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s. Grimheart Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF. Hold Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her. If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased. Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents.

talents.name: Glacial Illumination
talents.desc:
Brandishes her greatsword, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s.
While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s.
Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents.
This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated.
If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately.

talents.name: Roiling Rime
talents.desc: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color>, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color>.

talents.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color> is cast, the CD of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color> is reset and Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

talents.name: Aristocratic Introspection
talents.desc: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Tidal Illusion
constellations.desc:
Every time <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.name: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Tapping CD.

constellations.name: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.desc: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: Chivalric Quality
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Noble Obligation
constellations.desc: Lightfall Swords created by <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color> start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

yanfei.name: Yanfei
yanfei.title: Wise Innocence
yanfei.description: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

talents.name: Seal of Approval
talents.desc: Normal Attack Shoots fireballs that deal up to three counts of Pyro DMG. When Yanfei's Normal Attacks hit enemies, they will grant her a single Scarlet Seal. Yanfei may possess a maximum of 3 Scarlet Seals, and each time this effect is triggered, the duration of currently possessed Scarlet Seals will refresh. Each Scarlet Seal will decrease Yanfei's Stamina consumption and will disappear when she leaves the field. Charged Attack Consumes Stamina and all Scarlet Seals before dealing AoE Pyro DMG to the opponents after a short casting time. This Charged Attack's AoE and DMG will increase according to the amount of Scarlet Seals consumed. Plunging Attack Gathering the power of Pyro, Yanfei plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Signed Edict
talents.desc:
Summons blistering flames that deal <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
Opponents hit by the flames will grant Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals.

talents.name: Done Deal
talents.desc: Triggers a spray of intense flames that rush at nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG, granting Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals, and applying Brilliance to her. Brilliance Has the following effects: ● Grants Yanfei a Scarlet Seal at fixed intervals. ● Increases the DMG dealt by her Charged Attacks. The effects of Brilliance will end if Yanfei leaves the field or falls in battle.

talents.name: Proviso
talents.desc: When Yanfei consumes Scarlet Seals by using a Charged Attack, each Scarlet Seal will increase Yanfei's <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> by 5%. This effects [sic] lasts for 6s. When a Charged Attack is used again during the effect's duration, it will dispel the previous effect.

talents.name: Blazing Eye
talents.desc: When Yanfei's Charged Attack deals a CRIT Hit to opponents, she will deal an additional instance of <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> equal to 80% of her ATK. This DMG counts as Charged Attack DMG.

talents.name: Encyclopedic Expertise
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
constellations.desc: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

constellations.name: Right of Final Interpretation
constellations.desc: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

constellations.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Signed Edict</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Supreme Amnesty
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Done Deal</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Abiding Affidavit
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Done Deal</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Extra Clause
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

kaedehara_kazuha.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
kaedehara_kazuha.title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves
kaedehara_kazuha.description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

talents.name: Garyuu Bladework
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. If this Plunging Attack is triggered by Chihayaburu, it will be converted to Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan. Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG and will create a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents.

talents.name: Chihayaburu
talents.desc: Unleashes a secret technique as fierce as the rushing wind that pulls objects and opponents towards Kazuha's current position before launching opponents within the AoE, dealing Anemo DMG and lifting Kazuha into the air on a rushing gust of wind. Within 10s of remaining airborne after casting Chihayaburu, Kazuha can unleash a powerful Plunging Attack known as Midare Ranzan. Press Can be used in mid-air. Hold Charges up before unleashing greater Anemo DMG over a larger AoE than Press Mode. Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG. On landing, Kazuha creates a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents. Midare Ranzan's DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG.

talents.name: Kazuha Slash
talents.desc: The signature technique of Kazuha's self-styled bladework — a single slash that strikes with the force of the first winds of autumn, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. The blade's passage will leave behind a field named "Autumn Whirlwind" that periodically deals AoE Anemo DMG to opponents within its range. Elemental Absorption If Autumn Whirlwind comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Soumon Swordsmanship
talents.desc:
If <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> comes into contact with <color=hydro>Hydro</color>/<color=pyro>Pyro</color>/<color=cryo>Cryo</color>/<color=electro>Electro</color> when cast, <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> will absorb that element and if Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan is used before the effect expires, it will deal an additional 200% ATK of the absorbed elemental type as DMG. This will be considered Plunging Attack DMG.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color>.

talents.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
talents.desc: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kaedehara Kazuha will grant all party members a 0.04% Elemental DMG Bonus to the element absorbed by Swirl for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s. Bonuses for different elements obtained through this method can co-exist.

talents.name: Cloud Strider
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Scarlet Hills
constellations.desc:
Decreases <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color>'s CD by 10%.
Using <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color> resets the CD of <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color>.

constellations.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
constellations.desc:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color> has the following effects:
● Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
● Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

constellations.name: Maple Monogatari
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Oozora Genpou
constellations.desc:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
● Pressing or Holding <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
● When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

constellations.name: Wisdom of Bansei
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Crimson Momiji
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> or <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color>, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an <color=anemo>Anemo</color> Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.

kamisato_ayaka.name: Kamisato Ayaka
kamisato_ayaka.title: Frostflake Heron
kamisato_ayaka.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Kabuki
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
talents.desc: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
talents.desc: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously. Frostflake Seki no To ● A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG. ● The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Senho
talents.desc: Alternate Sprint Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her. In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water. When she reappears, the following effects occur: ● Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents. ● Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period.

talents.name: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification
talents.desc: After using <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color>, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.

talents.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
talents.desc:
When the <color=cryo>Cryo</color> application at the end of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Senho</color> hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:
● Restores 10 Stamina
● Gains 18% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

talents.name: Fruits of Shinsa
talents.desc: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Snowswept Sakura
constellations.desc: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

constellations.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
constellations.desc: When casting <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

constellations.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Ebb and Flow
constellations.desc: Opponents damaged by <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

constellations.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dance of Suigetsu
constellations.desc: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her <color=skill>Charged Attack</color> DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

sayu.name: Sayu
sayu.title: Mujina Ninja
sayu.description: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

talents.name: Shuumatsuban Ninja Blade
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
talents.desc: The special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! Sayu curls up into a rolling Fuufuu Windwheel and smashes into opponents at high speed, dealing Anemo DMG. When the duration ends, she unleashes a Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. Press Enters the Fuufuu Windwheel state, rolling forward a short distance before using the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick. Hold Rolls about continuously in the Fuufuu Windwheel state, increasing Sayu's resistance to interruption while within that state. During this time, Sayu can control the direction of her roll, and can use the skill again to end her Windwheel state early and unleash a stronger version of the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick. The Hold version of this skill can trigger Elemental Absorption. This skill has a maximum duration of 10s and enters CD once its effects end. The longer Sayu remains in her Windwheel state, the longer the CD. Elemental Absorption If Sayu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro while in her Windwheel state, she will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of this skill.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
talents.desc: The other super special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! It summons a pair of helping hands for Sayu. Deals Anemo DMG to nearby opponents and heals all nearby party members. The amount of HP restored is based on Sayu's ATK. This skill then summons a Muji-Muji Daruma. Muji-Muji Daruma At specific intervals, the Daruma will take one of several actions based on the situation around it: ● If the HP of nearby characters is above 70%, it will attack a nearby opponent, dealing Anemo DMG. ● If there are active characters with 70% or less HP nearby, it will heal the active character with the lowest percentage HP left. If there are no opponents nearby, it will heal active characters nearby even if they have 70% HP or more.

talents.name: Someone More Capable
talents.desc:
When Sayu triggers a Swirl reaction while active, she heals all your characters and nearby allies for 300 HP. She will also heal an additional 1.2 HP for every point of Elemental Mastery she has.
This effect can be triggered once every 2s.

talents.name: No Work Today!
talents.desc:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> gains the following effects:
● When healing a character, it will also heal characters near that healed character for 20% the amount of HP.
● Increases the AoE of its attack against opponents.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Silencer's Secret
talents.desc:
When Sayu is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when getting near them.
Check the "Other" sub-category of the "Living Beings / Wildlife" section in the Archive for creatures this skill works on.

constellations.name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
constellations.desc: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

constellations.name: Egress Prep
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash</color> gains the following effects:
● DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Tapping (mobile)/Press (PC & PlayStation) Mode increased by 3.3%.
● Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

constellations.name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Skiving: New and Improved
constellations.desc:
Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.
This effect occurs once every 2s.

constellations.name: Speed Comes First
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sleep O'Clock
constellations.desc:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
● Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
● Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

yoimiya.name: Yoimiya
yoimiya.title: Frolicking Flames
yoimiya.description: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

talents.name: Firework Flare-Up
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead before being fired off as an attack. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Fires off a flaming arrow that deals Pyro DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Generates a maximum of 3 Kindling Arrows based on time spent charging, releasing them as part of this Aimed Shot. Kindling Arrows will home in on nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG on hit. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Niwabi Fire-Dance
talents.desc: Yoimiya waves a sparkler and causes a ring of saltpeter to surround her. Niwabi Enshou During this time, arrows fired by Yoimiya's Normal Attack will be Blazing Arrows, and their DMG will be increased and converted to Pyro DMG. During this time, Normal Attack: Firework Flare-Up will not generate Kindling Arrows at Charge Level 2. This effect will deactivate when Yoimiya leaves the field.

talents.name: Ryuukin Saxifrage
talents.desc: Yoimiya leaps into the air along with her original creation, the "Ryuukin Saxifrage," and fires forth blazing rockets bursting with surprises that deal AoE Pyro DMG and mark one of the hit opponents with Aurous Blaze. Aurous Blaze All Normal/Charged/Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts by any party member other than Yoimiya that hit an opponent marked by Aurous Blaze will trigger an explosion, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. When an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated before its duration expires, the effect will pass on to another nearby opponent, who will inherit the remaining duration. One Aurous Blaze explosion can be triggered every 2s. When Yoimiya is down, Aurous Blaze effects created through her skills will be deactivated.

talents.name: Tricks of the Trouble-Maker
talents.desc: During <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>, shots from Yoimiya's Normal Attack will increase her <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> by 2% on hit. This effect lasts for 3s and can have a maximum of 10 stacks.

talents.name: Summer Night's Dawn
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> causes nearby party members (not including Yoimiya) to gain a 10% ATK increase for 15s. Additionally, a further ATK Bonus will be added on based on the number of "<color=skill>Tricks of the Trouble-Maker</color>" stacks Yoimiya possesses when using <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color>. Each stack increases this ATK Bonus by 1%.

talents.name: Blazing Match
talents.desc: When Yoimiya crafts Decoration, Ornament, and Landscape-type Furnishings, she has a 100% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

constellations.name: Agate Ryuukin
constellations.desc:
The Aurous Blaze created by <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> lasts for an extra 4s.
Additionally, when an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated within its duration, Yoimiya's ATK is increased by 20% for 20s.

constellations.name: A Procession of Bonfires
constellations.desc:
When Yoimiya's <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> scores a CRIT Hit, Yoimiya will gain a 25% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 6s.
This effect can be triggered even when Yoimiya is not the active character.

constellations.name: Trickster's Flare
constellations.desc:
Increase the Level of <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pyrotechnic Professional
constellations.desc: When Yoimiya's own Aurous Blaze triggers an explosion, <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>'s CD is decreased by 1.2.

constellations.name: A Summer Festival's Eve
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ryuukin Saxifrage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
constellations.desc: During <color=skill>Niwabi Fire-Dance</color>, Yoimiya's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance of firing an extra Blazing Arrow that deals 60% of its original DMG. This DMG is considered Normal Attack DMG.

aloy.name: Aloy
aloy.title: Savior From Another World
aloy.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

talents.name: Rapid Fire
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Frozen Wilds
talents.desc: Aloy throws a Freeze Bomb in the targeted direction that explodes on impact, dealing Cryo DMG. After it explodes, the Freeze Bomb will split up into many Chillwater Bomblets that explode on contact with opponents or after a short delay, dealing Cryo DMG. When a Freeze Bomb or Chillwater Bomblet hits an opponent, the opponent's ATK is decreased and Aloy receives 1 Coil stack. Aloy can gain up to 1 Coil stack every 0.1s. Coil ● Each stack increases Aloy's Normal Attack DMG. ● When Aloy has 4 Coil stacks, all stacks of Coil are cleared. She then enters the Rushing Ice state, which further increases the DMG dealt by her Normal Attacks and converts her Normal Attack DMG to Cryo DMG. While in the Rushing Ice state, Aloy cannot obtain new Coil stacks. Coil effects will be cleared 30s after Aloy leaves the field.

talents.name: Prophecies of Dawn
talents.desc: Aloy throws a Power Cell filled with Cryo in the targeted direction, then detonates it with an arrow, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Combat Override
talents.desc: When Aloy receives the Coil effect from Frozen Wilds, her ATK is increased by 16%, while nearby party members' ATK is increased by 8%. This effect lasts 10s.

talents.name: Strong Strike
talents.desc: When Aloy is in the Rushing Ice state conferred by Frozen Wilds, her <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> increases by 3.5% every 1s. A maximum <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> increase of 35% can be gained in this way.

talents.name: Easy Does It
talents.desc: When Aloy is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (1)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (2)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (3)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (4)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (5)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (6)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

kujou_sara.name: Kujou Sara
kujou_sara.title: Crowfeather Kaburaya
kujou_sara.description: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

talents.name: Tengu Bowmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, crackling lightning will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the storm's might will deal Electro DMG. When in the Crowfeather Cover state, a fully-charged arrow will leave a Crowfeather behind after it hits. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Tengu Stormcall
talents.desc:
Retreats rapidly with the speed of a tengu, summoning the protection of the Crowfeather.
Gains Crowfeather Cover for 18s, and when Kujou Sara fires a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Crowfeather Cover will be consumed, and will leave a Crowfeather at the target location.
Crowfeathers will trigger Tengu Juurai: Ambush after a short time, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> and granting the active character within its AoE an ATK Bonus based on Kujou Sara's Base ATK.

The ATK Bonuses from different Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect.

talents.name: Subjugation: Koukou Sendou
talents.desc:
Casts down Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>. Afterwards, Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker spreads out into 4 consecutive bouts of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.
Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker and Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster can provide the active character within their AoE with the same ATK Bonus as given by the Elemental Skill, <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color>.

The ATK Bonus provided by various kinds of Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect.

talents.name: Immovable Will
talents.desc: While in the Crowfeather Cover state provided by <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color>, Aimed Shot charge times are decreased by 60%.

talents.name: Decorum
talents.desc: When Tengu Juurai: Ambush hits opponents, Kujou Sara will restore 1.2 Energy to all party members for every 100% Energy Recharge she has. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

talents.name: Land Survey
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Inazuma, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Crow's Eye
constellations.desc:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color> is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

constellations.name: Dark Wings
constellations.desc: Unleashing <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color> will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

constellations.name: The War Within
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conclusive Proof
constellations.desc: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by <color=skill>Subjugation: Koukou Sendou</color> is increased to 6.

constellations.name: Spellsinger
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Tengu Stormcall</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sin of Pride
constellations.desc: The <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

raiden_shogun.name: Raiden Shogun
raiden_shogun.title: Plane of Euthymia
raiden_shogun.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

talents.name: Origin
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Transcendence: Baleful Omen
talents.desc: The Raiden Shogun unveils a shard of her Euthymia, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents, and granting nearby party members the Eye of Stormy Judgment. Eye of Stormy Judgment ● When characters with this buff attack and deal DMG to opponents, the Eye will unleash a coordinated attack, dealing AoE Electro DMG at the opponent's position. ● Characters who gain the Eye of Stormy Judgment will have their Elemental Burst DMG increased based on the Energy Cost of the Elemental Burst during the Eye's duration. The Eye can initiate one coordinated attack every 0.9s per party. Coordinated attacks generated by characters not controlled by you deal 20% of the normal DMG.

talents.name: Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu
talents.desc: Gathering truths unnumbered and wishes uncounted, the Raiden Shogun unleashes the Musou no Hitotachi and deals AoE Electro DMG, using Musou Isshin in combat for a certain duration afterward. The DMG dealt by Musou no Hitotachi and Musou Isshin's attacks will be increased based on the number of Chakra Desiderata's Resolve stacks consumed when this skill is used. Musou Isshin While in this state, the Raiden Shogun will wield her tachi in battle, while her Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be infused with Electro DMG, which cannot be overridden. When such attacks hit opponents, she will regenerate Energy for all nearby party members. Energy can be restored this way once every 1s, and this effect can be triggered 5 times throughout this skill's duration. While in this state, the Raiden Shogun's resistance to interruption is increased, and she is immune to Electro-Charged reaction DMG. While Musou Isshin is active, the Raiden Shogun's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will be considered Elemental Burst DMG. The effects of Musou Isshin will be cleared when the Raiden Shogun leaves the field. Chakra Desiderata When nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun herself) use their Elemental Bursts, the Raiden Shogun will build up Resolve stacks based on the Energy Cost of these Elemental Bursts. The maximum number of Resolve stacks is 60. The Resolve gained by Chakra Desiderata will be cleared 300s after the Raiden Shogun leaves the field.

talents.name: Wishes Unnumbered
talents.desc:
When nearby party members gain Elemental Orbs or Particles, Chakra Desiderata gains 2 Resolve stacks.
This effect can occur once every 3s.

talents.name: Enlightened One
talents.desc:
Each 1% above 100% Energy Recharge that the Raiden Shogun possesses grants her:
● 0.6% greater Energy restoration from Musou Isshin
● 0.4% <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: All-Preserver
talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Swords and Polearms is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Ominous Inscription
constellations.desc: Chakra Desiderata will gather Resolve even faster. When <color=electro>Electro</color> characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Steelbreaker
constellations.desc: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents's DEF.

constellations.name: Shinkage Bygones
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pledge of Propriety
constellations.desc: When the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color> expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

constellations.name: Shogun's Descent
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Transcendence: Baleful Omen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wishbearer
constellations.desc:
While in the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger a total of 5 times during the state's duration.

sangonomiya_kokomi.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
sangonomiya_kokomi.title: Pearl of Wisdom
sangonomiya_kokomi.description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

talents.name: The Shape of Water
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Kurage's Oath
talents.desc: Summons a "Bake-Kurage" created from water that can heal her allies. Using this skill will apply the Wet status to Sangonomiya Kokomi. Bake-Kurage Deals Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and heal nearby active characters at fixed intervals. This healing is based on Kokomi's Max HP.

talents.name: Nereid's Ascension
talents.desc: Summons the might of Watatsumi, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents, before robing Kokomi in a Ceremonial Garment made from the flowing waters of Sangonomiya. Ceremonial Garment ● Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP. ● When her Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, Kokomi will restore HP for all nearby party members, and the amount restored is based on her Max HP. ● Increases Sangonomiya Kokomi's resistance to interruption and allows her to walk on the water's surface. These effects will be cleared once Sangonomiya Kokomi leaves the field.

talents.name: Tamanooya's Casket
talents.desc: If Sangonomiya Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage are on the field when she uses <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

talents.name: Song of Pearls
talents.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.

talents.name: Princess of Watatsumi
talents.desc:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: At Water's Edge
constellations.desc:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

constellations.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
constellations.desc:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
● <color=skill>Kurage's Oath</color> Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
● <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color> Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

constellations.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
constellations.desc:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kurage's Oath</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sango Isshin
constellations.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.

thoma.name: Thoma
thoma.title: Protector From Afar
thoma.description: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

talents.name: Swiftshatter Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Blazing Blessing
talents.desc:
Thoma vaults forward with his polearm and delivers a flame-filled flying kick that deals <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>, while also summoning a defensive Blazing Barrier.
At the moment of casting, Thoma's Elemental Skill applies <color=pyro>Pyro</color> to himself.
The DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier scales off Thoma's Max HP.
The Blazing Barrier has the following traits:
● Absorbs <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.
● When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.

The maximum DMG Absoprtion of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.

talents.name: Crimson Ooyoroi
talents.desc: Thoma spins his polearm, slicing at his foes with roaring flames that deal AoE Pyro DMG and weave themselves into a Scorching Ooyoroi. Scorching Ooyoroi While Scorching Ooyoroi is in effect, the active character's Normal Attacks will trigger Fiery Collapse, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and summoning a Blazing Barrier. Fiery Collapse can be triggered once every 1s. Except for the amount of DMG they can absorb, the Blazing Barriers created in this way are identical to those created by Thoma's Elemental Skill, Blazing Blessing: ● Absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively. ● When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed. The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP. If Thoma falls, the effects of Scorching Ooyoroi will be cleared.

talents.name: Imbricated Armor
talents.desc:
When your current active character obtains or refreshes a Blazing Barrier, this character's Shield Strength will increase by 5% for 6s.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.3 seconds. Max 5 stacks.

talents.name: Flaming Assault
talents.desc: DMG dealt by <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s Fiery Collapse is increased by 2.2% of Thoma's Max HP.

talents.name: Snap and Swing
talents.desc: When you fish successfully in Inazuma, Thoma's help grants a 20% chance of scoring a double catch.

constellations.name: A Comrade's Duty
constellations.desc:
When a character protected by Thoma's own Blazing Barrier (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own <color=skill>Blazing Blessing</color> CD is decreased by 3s, while his own <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

constellations.name: A Subordinate's Skills
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Fortified Resolve
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Blazing Blessing</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Long-Term Planning
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

constellations.name: Raging Wildfire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Burning Heart
constellations.desc: When a Blazing Barrier is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

gorou.name: Gorou
gorou.title: Canine Warrior
gorou.description: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

talents.name: Ripping Fang Fletching
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, stone crystals will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged crystalline arrow will deal Geo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Inuzaka All-Round Defense
talents.desc: Deals AoE Geo DMG and sets up a General's War Banner. General's War Banner Provides up to 3 buffs to active characters within the skill's AoE based on the number of Geo characters in the party at the time of casting: ● 1 Geo character: Adds "Standing Firm" - DEF Bonus. ● 2 Geo characters: Adds "Impregnable" - Increased resistance to interruption. ● 3 Geo characters: Adds "Crunch" - Geo DMG Bonus. Gorou can deploy only 1 General's War Banner on the field at any one time. Characters can only benefit from 1 General's War Banner at a time. When a party member leaves the field, the active buff will last for 2s. Hold Adjust the location of the skill.

talents.name: Juuga: Forward Unto Victory
talents.desc: Displaying his valor as a general, Gorou deals Aoe Geo DMG and creates a field known as General's Glory to embolden his comrades. General's Glory This field has the following properties: ● Like the General's War Banner created by Inuzaka All-Round Defense, provides buffs to active characters within the skill's AoE based on the number of Geo characters in the party. Also moves together with your active character. ● Generates 1 Crystal Collapse every 1.5s that deals AoE Geo DMG to 1 opponent within the skill's AoE. ● Pulls 1 elemental shard in the skill's AoE to your active character's position every 1.5s (elemental shards are created by Crystallize reactions). If a General's War banner created by Gorou currently exists on the field when his ability is used, it will be destroyed. In addition, for the duration of General's Glory, Gorou's Elemental Skill "Inazuka All-Round Defense" will not create the General's War Banner. If Gorou falls, the effects of General's Glory will be cleared.

talents.name: Heedless of the Wind and Weather
talents.desc: After using <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>, all nearby party members' DEF is increased by 25% for 12s.

talents.name: A Favor Repaid
talents.desc:
Gorou receives the following DMG Bonuses to his attacks based on his DEF:
● <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color>: Skill DMG increased by 156% of DEF
● <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>: Skill DMG and Crystal Collapse DMG increased by 15.6% of DEF

talents.name: Seeker of Shinies
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Inazuma on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
constellations.desc: When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's General's War Banner or General's Glory deal <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> to opponents, the CD of Gorou's <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> is decreased by 2s. This effect can occur once every 10s.

constellations.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
constellations.desc: While General's Glory is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

constellations.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
constellations.desc: When General's Glory is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
constellations.desc:
For 12s after using <color=skill>Inuzaka All-Round Defense</color> or <color=skill>Juuga: Forward Unto Victory</color>, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
● "Standing Firm": +10%
● "Impregnable": +20%
● "Crunch": +40%

This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

arataki_itto.name: Arataki Itto
arataki_itto.title: Hanamizaka Heroics
arataki_itto.description: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

talents.name: Fight Club Legend
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. When the 2nd and 4th strikes hit opponents, Itto will gain 1 and 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength, respectively. Max 5 stacks. Triggering this effect will refresh the current duration of any existing stacks. Additionally, Itto's Normal Attack combo does not immediately reset after sprinting or using his Elemental Skill, "Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!" Charged Attack When holding to perform a Charged Attack, Itto unleashes a series of Arataki Kesagiri slashes without consuming Stamina. Instead, each Arataki Kesagiri slash consumes 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. When the final stack is consumed, Itto delivers a powerful final slash. If no stacks of Superlative Superstrength are available, Itto will perform a single Saichimonji Slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!
talents.desc: Hurls Ushi, the young akaushi bull and auxiliary member of the Arataki Gang, dealing Geo DMG to opponents on hit. When Ushi hits opponents, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. Ushi will remain on the field and provide support in the following ways: ● Taunts surrounding opponents and draws their attacks. ● Inherits HP based on a percentage of Arataki Itto's Max HP. ● When Ushi takes DMG, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. Only 1 stack can be gained in this way every 2s. ● Ushi will flee when its HP reaches 0 or its duration ends. It will grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength when it leaves. Hold Adjust throwing angle. Ushi is considered a Geo Construct. Arataki Itto can only deploy 1 Ushi on the field at any one time.

talents.name: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!
talents.desc:
Time to show 'em the might of the Arataki Gang! For a time, Itto lets out his inner Raging Oni King, wielding his Oni King's Kanabou in battle.
This state has the following special properties:
● Converts Itto's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks to <color=geo>Geo DMG</color>. This cannot be overridden.
● Increases Itto's Normal Attack SPD. Also increases his ATK based on his DEF.
● On hit, the 1st and 3rd strikes of his attack combo will each grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength.
● Decreases Itto's Elemental and Physical RES by 20%.

The Raging Oni King state will be cleared when Itto leaves the field.

talents.name: Arataki Ichiban
talents.desc:
When Arataki Itto uses consecutive <color=skill>Arataki Kesagiri</color>, he obtains the following effects:
● Each slash increases the ATK SPD of the next slash by 10%. Max ATK SPD increase is 30%.
● Increases his resistance to interruption.

These effects will be cleared once he stops performing consecutive slashes.

talents.name: Bloodline of the Crimson Oni
talents.desc: <color=skill>Arataki Kesagiri</color> DMG is increased by 35% of Arataki Itto's DEF.

talents.name: Woodchuck Chucked
talents.desc: When a party member uses attacks to obtain wood from a tree, they have a 25% chance to obtain an additional log of wood.

constellations.name: Stay a While and Listen Up
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color>, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

constellations.name: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color>, each party member whose Element is <color=geo>Geo</color> will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

constellations.name: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
constellations.desc: When the Raging Oni King state caused by <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color> ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

constellations.name: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Arataki Itto, Present!
constellations.desc: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses <color=skill>Arataki Kesagiri</color>, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

shenhe.name: Shenhe
shenhe.title: Lonesome Transcendence
shenhe.description: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

talents.name: Dawnstar Piercer
