talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spring Spirit Summoning
talents.desc: The frosted dew, silvery and dense, shall exorcise all demons. Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG in different ways based on whether it is pressed or held. Press Rushes forward together with a Talisman Spirit, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents along the path. Hold Commands the Talisman Spirit to deal AoE Cryo DMG. Icy Quill When Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts deal Cryo DMG to opponents, the DMG dealt is increased based on Shenhe's current ATK. The Icy Quill's effects will be cleared once its duration ends or after being triggered a certain number of times. When held rather than pressed, the Icy Quill's effect lasts longer and can be triggered more times. When one Cryo DMG instance strikes multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times based on the number of opponents hit. The number of times the effect is triggered is calculated independently for each party member with the Icy Quill.

talents.name: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
talents.desc:
Unleashes the power of the Talisman Spirit, allowing it to roam free in this plane, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

The Talisman Spirit then creates a field that decreases the <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> and Physical RES of opponents within it. It also deals periodic <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents within the field.

talents.name: Deific Embrace
talents.desc: An active character within the field created by <color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> gains 15% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Spirit Communion Seal
talents.desc:
After Shenhe uses <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will grant all nearby party members the following effects:
● Press: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 15% for 10s.
● Hold: Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 15% for 15s.

talents.name: Precise Comings and Goings
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Clarity of Heart
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> can be used 1 more time.

constellations.name: Centered Spirit
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> lasts for 6 seconds longer.
Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased <color=cryo>Cryo</color> CRIT DMG.

constellations.name: Seclusion
constellations.desc:
Increases Level of <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Insight
constellations.desc:
When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe triggers its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
● When Shenhe uses <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 5% for each stack consumed.
● Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

constellations.name: Divine Attainment
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystical Abandon
constellations.desc: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

yun_jin.name: Yun Jin
yun_jin.title: Stage Lucida
yun_jin.description: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

talents.name: Cloud-Grazing Strike
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Opening Flourish
talents.desc: Ms. Yun may just be acting out fights on stage, but her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes. Press Flourishes her polearm in a cloud-grasping stance, dealing Geo DMG. Hold Takes up the Opening Flourish stance and charges up, forming a shield. DMG Absorption is based on Yun Jin's Max HP and has 150% effectiveness against all Elemental DMG and Physical DMG. The shield lasts until she finishes unleashing her Elemental Skill. When the skill is released, when its duration ends, or when the shield breaks, Yun Jin will unleash the charged energy as an attack, dealing Geo DMG. Based on the time spent charging, it will either unleash an attack at Charge Level 1 or Level 2.

talents.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner
talents.desc:
Deals <color=geo>AoE Geo DMG</color> and grants all nearby party members a Flying Cloud Flag Formation.

Flying Cloud Flag Formation
When Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF.
The effects of this skill will be cleared after a set duration or after being triggered a specific number of times.
When one Normal Attack hits multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times according to the number of opponents hit. The number of times that the effect is triggered is counted independently for each member of the party with Flying Cloud Flag Formation.

talents.name: True to Oneself
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Opening Flourish</color> at the precise moment when Yun Jin is attacked will unleash its Level 2 Charged (Hold) form.

talents.name: Breaking Conventions
talents.desc: The Normal Attack DMG Bonus granted by Flying Cloud Flag Formation is further increased by 2.5%/5%/7.5%/11.5% of Yun Jin's DEF when the party contains characters of 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, respectively.

talents.name: Light Nourishment
talents.desc: When Perfect Cooking is achieved on Food with Adventure-related effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Thespian Gallop
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Opening Flourish</color>'s CD is decreased by 18%.

constellations.name: Myriad Mise-En-Scène
constellations.desc: After <color=skill>Cliffbreaker's Banner</color> is unleashed, all nearby party members' Normal Attack DMG is increased by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Seafaring General
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Cliffbreaker's Banner</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flower and a Fighter
constellations.desc: When Yun Jin triggers the Crystallize Reaction, her DEF is increased by 20% for 12s.

constellations.name: Famed Throughout the Land
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Opening Flourish</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Decorous Harmony
constellations.desc: Characters under the effects of the Flying Cloud Flag Formation have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 12%.

yae_miko.name: Yae Miko
yae_miko.title: Astute Amusement
yae_miko.description: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

talents.name: Spiritfox Sin-Eater
talents.desc: Normal Attack Summons forth kitsune spirits, initiating a maximum of 3 attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path with thunderous might. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
talents.desc: To Yae, such dull tasks as can be accomplished by driving spirits out need not be done personally. Moves swiftly, leaving a Sesshou Sakura behind. Sesshou Sakura Has the following properties: ● Periodically strikes one nearby opponent with lightning, dealing Electro DMG ● When there are other Sesshou Sakura nearby, their level will increase, boosting the DMG dealt by these lightning strikes. This skill has three charges. A maximum of 3 Sesshou Sakura can exist simultaneously. The initial level of each Sesshou Sakura is 1, and the initial highest level each sakura can reach is 3. If a new Sesshou Sakura is created too close to an existing one, the existing one will be destroyed.

talents.name: Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
talents.desc:
Legends of "kitsunetsuki," or the manifestations of a kitsune's might, are common in Inazuma's folktales. One that particularly captures the imagination is that of the Sky Kitsune, said to cause lightning to fall down upon the foes of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Summons a lightning strike, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.
When she uses this skill, Yae Miko will unseal nearby Sesshou Sakura, destroying their outer forms and transforming them into Tenko Thunderbolts that descend from the skies, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>. Each Sesshou Sakura destroyed in this way will create one Tenko Thunderbolt.

talents.name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
talents.desc: When casting <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color>, each Sesshou Sakura destroyed resets the cooldown for 1 charge of <color=skill>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color>.

talents.name: Enlightened Blessing
talents.desc: Every point of Elemental Mastery Yae Miko possesses will increase Sesshou Sakura DMG by 0.15%.

talents.name: Meditations of a Yako
talents.desc: Has a 25% chance to get 1 regional Character Talent Material (base material excluded) when crafting. The rarity is that of the base material.

constellations.name: Yakan Offering
constellations.desc: Each time <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

constellations.name: Fox's Mooncall
constellations.desc: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

constellations.name: The Seven Glamours
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color> by 3.
Maximum ugprade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sakura Channeling
constellations.desc: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

constellations.name: Mischievous Teasing
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou
constellations.desc: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponent's DEF.

kamisato_ayato.name: Kamisato Ayato
kamisato_ayato.title: Pillar of Fortitude
kamisato_ayato.description: The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Marobashi
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to dash forward and perform an iai. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Kyouka
talents.desc: Kamisato Ayato shifts positions and enters the Takimeguri Kanka state. After this shift, he will leave a watery illusion at his original location. After it is formed, the watery illusion will explode if opponents are nearby or after its duration ends, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Takimeguri Kanka In this state, Kamisato Ayato uses his Shunsuiken to engage in blindingly fast attacks, causing DMG from his Normal Attacks to be converted into AoE Hydro DMG. This cannot be overridden. It also has the following properties: ● After a Shunsuiken attack hits an opponent, it will grant Ayato the Namisen effect, increasing the DMG dealt by Shunsuiken based on Ayato's current Max HP. The initial maximum number of Namisen stacks is 4, and 1 stack can be gained through Shunsuiken every 0.1s. This effect will be dispelled when Takimeguri Kanka ends. ● Kamisato Ayato's resistance to interruption is increased. ● Unable to use Charged or Plunging Attacks. Takimeguri Kanka will be cleared when Ayato leaves the field. Using Kamisato Art: Kyouka again while in the Takimeguri Kanka state will reset and replace the pre-existing state.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Suiyuu
talents.desc:
Unveils a garden of purity that silences the cacophony within.
While this space exists, Bloomwater Blades will constantly rain down and attack opponents within its AoE, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> and increasing the Normal Attack DMG of characters within.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Mine Wo Matoishi Kiyotaki
talents.desc:
<color=skill>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> has the following properties:
● After it is used, Kamisato Ayato will gain 2 Namisen stacks.
● When the water illusion explodes, Ayato will gain a Namisen effect equal to the maximum number of stacks possible.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Michiyuku Hagetsu
talents.desc: If Kamisato Ayato is not on the field and his Energy is less than 40, he will regenerate 2 Energy for himself every second.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Daily Cooking
talents.desc: When Ayato cooks a dish perfectly, he has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Kyouka Fuushi
constellations.desc: Shunsuiken DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

constellations.name: World Source
constellations.desc: Namisen's maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: To Admire the Flowers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Endless Flow
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color>, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

constellations.name: Bansui Ichiro
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Boundless Origin
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color>, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

kuki_shinobu.name: Kuki Shinobu
kuki_shinobu.title: Mender of Tribulations
kuki_shinobu.description: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang." Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

talents.name: Shinobu's Shadowsword
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sanctifying Ring
talents.desc: Creates a Grass Ring of Sanctification at the cost of part of her HP, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents. Grass Ring of Sanctification Follows your current active character around. Deals Electro DMG to nearby opponents every 1.5s and restores HP for the active character(s) within the ring's AoE based on Kuki Shinobu's Max HP. The HP consumption from using this skill can only bring her to 20% HP.

talents.name: Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite
talents.desc:
Stabs an evil-excoriating blade into the ground, creating a field that cleanses the area of all that is foul, dealing continuous <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to opponents within its AoE based on Shinobu's Max HP.

If Shinobu's HP is less than or equal to 50% when this skill is used, the field will last longer.

talents.name: Breaking Free
talents.desc: When Shinobu's HP is not higher than 50%, her Healing Bonus is increased by 15%.

talents.name: Heart's Repose
talents.desc:
<color=skill>Sanctifying Ring</color>'s abilities will be boosted based on Shinobu's Elemental Mastery:
● Healing amount will be increased by 75% of Elemental Mastery.
● DMG dealt is increased by 25% of Elemental Mastery.

talents.name: Protracted Prayers
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on an Inazuma Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: To Cloister Compassion
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite</color>'s AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: To Forsake Fortune
constellations.desc: Grass Ring of Sanctification's duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: To Sequester Sorrow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sanctifying Ring</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Sever Sealing
constellations.desc:
When the Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks of the character affected by Shinobu's Grass Ring of Sanctification hit opponents, a Thundergrass Mark will land on the opponent's position and deal <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> based on 9.7% of Shinobu's Max HP.
This effect can occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: To Cease Courtesies
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Ward Weakness
constellations.desc:
When Kuki Shinobu takes lethal DMG, this instance of DMG will not take her down. This effect will automatically trigger when her HP reaches 1 and will trigger once every 60s.
When Shinobu's HP drops below 25%, she will gain 150 Elemental Mastery for 15s. This effect will trigger once every 60s.

yelan.name: Yelan
yelan.title: Valley Orchid
yelan.description: A mysterious person who claims to work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs, but is a "non-entity" on the Ministry of Civil Affairs' list.

talents.name: Stealthy Bowshot
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flowing water will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged torrential arrow will deal Hydro DMG. Breakthrough Yelan will enter a "Breakthrough" state after spending 5s out of combat, which will cause her next Charged Aimed Shot to have 80% decreased charge time, and once charged, she can fire a "Breakthrough Barb" that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Yelan's Max HP. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Lingering Lifeline
talents.desc: Fires off a Lifeline that allows her to move rapidly, entangling and marking opponents along its path. When this rapid movement ends, the Lifeline will explode, dealing Hydro DMG to the marked opponents based on Yelan's Max HP. Tap Moves a certain distance forward swiftly. Hold Engages in continuous, swift movement, during which Yelan's resistance to interruption is increased. During this time, Yelan can control this rapid movement and end it by using this Skill again. Additionally, each opponent marked by the Lifeline when it explodes grants Yelan a 34% chance to reset her Breakthrough state.

talents.name: Depth-Clarion Dice
talents.desc: Deals AoE Hydro DMG and creates an "Exquisite Throw," which aids her in battle. Exquisite Throw Follows the character around and will initiate a coordinated attack under the following circumstances, dealing Hydro DMG based on Yelan's Max HP: ● Can occur once every second when your active character uses a Normal Attack. ● Will occur each time Yelan's Lifeline explodes and hits opponents.

talents.name: Turn Control
talents.desc: When the party has 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, Yelan's Max HP is increased by 6%/12%/18%/30%.

talents.name: Adapt With Ease
talents.desc:
So long as an Exquisite Throw is in play, your own active character deals 1% more DMG. This increases by a further 3.5% DMG every second. The maximum increase to DMG dealt is 50%.
The pre-existing effect will be dispelled if <color=skill>Depth-Clarion Dice</color> is recast during its duration.

talents.name: Necessary Calculation
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Enter the Plotters
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Lingering Lifeline</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Taking All Comers
constellations.desc:
When Exquisite Throw conducts a coordinated attack, it will fire an additional water arrow that will deal 14% of Yelan's Max HP as <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.
This effect can trigger once every 1.8s.

constellations.name: Beware the Trickster's Dice
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Depth-Clarion Dice</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bait-and-Switch
constellations.desc: Increases all party members' Max HP by 10% for 25s for every opponent marked by Lifeline when the Lifeline explodes. A maximum increase of 40% Max HP can be attained in this manner.

constellations.name: Dealer's Sleight
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lingering Lifeline</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Winner Takes All
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Depth-Clarion Dice</color>, Yelan will enter the Mastermind state.
In this state, all of Yelan's Normal Attacks will be special Breakthrough Barbs. These Breakthrough Barbs will have similar abilities to normal ones and the DMG dealt will be considered Charged Attack DMG, dealing 156% of a normal Breakthrough Barb's DMG.

The Mastermind state lasts 20s and will be cleared after Yelan fires 5 arrows.

shikanoin_heizou.name: Shikanoin Heizou
shikanoin_heizou.title: Analytical Harmony
shikanoin_heizou.description: A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.

talents.name: Fudou Style Martial Arts
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 fisticuffs empowered by a mighty wind, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a set amount of Stamina to perform a sweeping kick, dealing Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Calling upon the surging wind, Heizou plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Heartstopper Strike
talents.desc: Press Wields the swift winds to launch a Heartstopper Strike that deals Anemo DMG. Hold Charges energy to unleash an even stronger blow. He will obtain the Declension effect while charging, which will increase the power of the Heartstopper Strike. When the skill button is released or the skill duration ends, he will strike forward, dealing Anemo DMG. Declension Increases the power of the next Heartstopper Strike. Max 4 stacks. When you possess 4 Declension stacks, the Conviction effect will be produced, which will cause the next Heartstopper Strike to be even stronger and have a larger AoE.

talents.name: Windmuster Kick
talents.desc:
Leaps into the air and uses the Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger and kicks his opponent. The Vacuum Slugger will explode upon hit and create an Arresting Windtunnel that pulls in nearby objects and opponents, dealing <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>.

When Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger hits enemies affected by <color=hydro>Hydro</color>, <color=pyro>Pyro</color>, <color=cryo>Cryo</color> or <color=electro>Electro</color>, it afflicts them with Windmuster Iris. Moments later, Windmuster Iris explodes and dissipates, dealing AoE DMG of the corresponding elemental type.

Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger can afflict a maximum of four enemies with the Windmuster Iris. A single enemy cannot be afflicted by Irises of different elemental types at the same time.

talents.name: Paradoxical Practice
talents.desc: When Shikanoin Heizou activates a Swirl reaction while on the field, he will gain 1 Declension stack for <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered every 0.1s.

talents.name: Penetrative Reasoning
talents.desc: After Shikanoin Heizou's <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Shikanoin Heizou) Elemental Mastery by 80 for 10s.

talents.name: Pre-Existing Guilt
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Named Juvenile Casebook
constellations.desc: For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.

constellations.name: Investigative Collection
constellations.desc: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.

constellations.name: Esoteric Puzzle Book
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tome of Lies
constellations.desc:
The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.

constellations.name: Secret Archive
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Curious Casefiles
constellations.desc: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>'s CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.

tighnari.name: Tighnari
tighnari.title: Verdant Strider
tighnari.description: A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart - and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.

talents.name: Khanda Barrier-Buster
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Dendro will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Tighnari fires a Dendro-infused arrow that deals Dendro DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow that deals Dendro DMG. Upon hit, the Wreath Arrow will create 4 Clusterbloom Arrows that will track nearby opponents automatically and deal Dendro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG on impact.

talents.name: Vijnana-Phala Mine
talents.desc:
Tighnari throws a Vijnana Stormheart ahead of him that deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color> and creates a Vijnana-Khanda Field, which summons strange illusions to taunt enemies and draw their fire.
Additionally, Tighnari gains the Vijnana Suffusion effect, which will decrease the Wreath Arrow's charging time by 2.4s. This effect will dissipate once the skill duration ends or after Tighnari has fired 3 Wreath Arrows.

talents.name: Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft
talents.desc:
Combines the power of all seeds to fire 6 Tanglevine Shafts that can track opponents and deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color>.

After they hit, the Tanglevine Shafts will create a secondary wave of Tanglevine Shafts that can also track opponents and deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> on hit.

talents.name: Keen Sight
talents.desc: After Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow, his Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for 4s.

talents.name: Scholarly Blade
talents.desc:
For every point of Elemental Mastery Tighnari possesses, his Charged Attack and <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> DMG are increased by 0.06%.
The maximum DMG Bonus obtainable this way is 60%.

talents.name: Encyclopedic Knowledge
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Sumeru on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Beginnings Determined at the Roots
constellations.desc: Tighnari's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Origins Known From the Stem
constellations.desc:
When there are opponents within the Vijnana-Khanda Field created by <color=skill>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color>, Tighnari gains 20% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color>.
The effect will last up to 6s if the field's duration ends or if it no longer has opponents within it.

constellations.name: Fortunes Read Amongst the Branches
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Withering Glimpsed in the Leaves
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> is unleashed, all nearby party members gain 60 Elemental Mastery for 8s. If the <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> triggers a Burning, Bloom, Quicken, or Spread reaction, their Elemental Mastery will be further increased by 60. This latter case will also refresh the buff state's duration.

constellations.name: Comprehension Amidst the Flowers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Karma Adjudged From the Leaden Fruit
constellations.desc: Wreath Arrow's charging time is decreased by 0.9s, and will produce 1 additional Clusterbloom Arrow upon hit. This arrow deals 150% of Tighnari's ATK as DMG.

cyno.name: Cyno
cyno.title: Judicator of Secrets
cyno.description: The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.

talents.name: Invoker's Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer
talents.desc:
Performs a swift thrust, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to opponents along the path.

When Cyno is under the Pathsworn Pathclearer state triggered by the Elemental Burst "<color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>," he will instead unleash a Mortuary Rite that deals thunderous <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> and extends the duration of Pathsworn Pathclearer.

talents.name: Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness
talents.desc: Calls upon a divine spirit to indwell him, morphing into the Pactsworn Pathclearer. Pactsworn Pathclearer Cyno's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to Electro DMG that cannot be overridden. Cyno's Elemental Mastery and resistance to interruption will increase, and he gains immunity to Electro-Charged DMG. This effect will be canceled when Cyno leaves the field and lasts a maximum of 18s.

talents.name: Featherfall Judgment
talents.desc:
When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state activated by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>, Cyno will enter the Endseer stance at intervals. If he activates <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> while affected by this stance, he will activate the Judication effect, increasing the DMG of this <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> by 35%, and firing off 3 Duststalker Bolts that deal 100% of Cyno's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.

Duststalker Bolt DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

talents.name: Authority Over the Nine Bows
talents.desc:
Cyno's DMG values will be increased based on his Elemental Mastery as follows:
● Pactsworn Pathclearer's Normal Attack DMG is increased by 150% of his Elemental Mastery.
● Duststalker Bolt DMG from his Passive Talent <color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color> is increased by 250% of his Elemental Mastery.

talents.name: The Gift of Silence
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Sumeru Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Ordinance: Unceasing Vigil
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>, Cyno's Normal Attack SPD will be increased by 20% for 10s. If the Judication effect of his Passive Talent <color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color> is triggered during <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color>, the duration of this increase will be refreshed.
You need to unlock the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgement."

constellations.name: Ceremony: Homecoming of Spirits
constellations.desc: When Cyno's Normal Attacks hit opponents, his <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> will increase by 10% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 5 stacks.

constellations.name: Precept: Lawful Enforcer
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Austerity: Forbidding Guard
constellations.desc:
When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state triggered by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>, after he triggers Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or an Electro Swirl reaction, he will restore 3 Elemental Energy for all nearby party members (except himself.)
This effect can occur 5 times within one use of Sacred Rite: Wolf’s Swiftness.

constellations.name: Funerary Rite: The Passing of Starlight
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Raiment: Just Scales
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color> or triggering the Judication effect of the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color>," Cyno will gain 4 stacks of the "Day of the Jackal" effect. When he hits opponents with Normal Attacks, he will consume 1 stack of "Day of the Jackal" to fire off one Duststalker Bolt.
"Day of the Jackal" lasts for 8s. Max 8 stacks. It will be canceled once Pactsworn Pathclearer ends.
A maximum of 1 Duststalker Bolt can be unleashed this way every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color>."

nilou.name: Nilou
nilou.title: Dance of Lotuslight
nilou.description: "What's so great about that little theater? If she went with me on tour all around Teyvat, she could earn so much Mora, more than what she could ever dream of... Alas, she's too innocent. So innocent that she knows nothing of her own worth." — Dori

talents.name: Dance of Samser
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 consecutive sword strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a twirling slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Dance of Haftkarsvar
talents.desc:
Nilou will enter the Pirouette state, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> to nearby opponents based on her Max HP. While she is in the Pirouette state, Nilou's Normal Attacks and Elemental Attacks will cause her to enter the Sword Dance and Whirling Steps stances respectively, causing DMG she deals to be converted to <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden and that is considered Elemental Skill DMG. In these stances, Nilou's third dance step will end Pirouette, and has the following effects:
● Sword Dance: unleashes a Luminous Illusion that deals <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> to opponents it touches and grants Nilou the Lunar Prayer effect. This effect converts Nilou's Normal Attacks into Sword Dance techniques, and her final hit will unleash a Luminous Illusion.
● Whirling Steps: Nilou unleashes a Whirling Water Wheel that deals <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> and creates a Tranquility Aura that follows your active character around and applies <color=hydro>Wet</color> to opponents within its AoE.
Nilou is unable to perform Charged Attacks when under the effect of Pirouette or Lunar Prayer. These effects will be removed once she leaves the field.

talents.name: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
talents.desc: Begins the dance of faraway dreams and springs that hear, causing a Lotus of Distant Waters to bloom, dealing <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> based on Nilou's Max HP and applying the Lingering Aeon effect to all opponents hit. After an interval, opponents affected by Lingering Aeon will take <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Court of Dancing Petals
talents.desc:
When all characters in the party are all <color=dendro>Dendro</color> or <color=hydro>Hydro</color>, and there are at least one <color=dendro>Dendro</color> character and one <color=hydro>Hydro</color> character:
The completion of the third dance step of Nilou's <color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> will grant all nearby characters the Golden Chalice's Bounty for 30s.
Characters under the effect of Golden Chalice's Bounty will increase the Elemental Mastery of all nearby characters by 100 for 10s whenever they are hit by <color=dendro>Dendro</color> attacks. Also, triggering the Bloom reaction will create Bountiful Cores instead of <color=dendro>Dendro</color> Cores.
Such Cores will burst very quickly after being created, and they have larger AoEs.
Bountiful Cores cannot trigger Hyperbloom or Burgeon, and they share an upper numerical limit with <color=dendro>Dendro</color> Cores. Bountiful Core DMG is considered DMG dealt by <color=dendro>Dendro</color> Cores produced by Bloom.
Should the party not meet the conditions for this Passive Talent, any existing Golden Chalice's Bounty effects will be canceled.

talents.name: Dreamy Dance of Aeons
talents.desc:
Every 1,000 points of Nilou's Max HP above 30,000 will cause the DMG dealt by Bountiful Cores created by characters affected by Golden Chalice's Bounty to increase by 9%.
The maximum increase in Bountiful Core DMG that can be achieved this way is 400%.

talents.name: White Jade Lotus
talents.desc: When Perfect Cooking is achieved on Food with Adventure-related effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Dance of the Waning Moon
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> will be enhanced as follows:
● Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
● The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.

constellations.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
constellations.desc:
After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> to an opponent, that opponent's <color=hydro>Hydro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their <color=dendro>Dendro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "<color=skill>Court of Dancing Petals</color>" Talent.

constellations.name: Beguiling Shadowstep
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fricative Pulse
constellations.desc: After the third dance step of <color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color>'s Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her <color=skill>Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring</color> will be increased by 50% for 8s.

constellations.name: Twirling Light
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frostbreaker's Melody
constellations.desc:
For every 1,000 points of Max HP, Nilou's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 0.6% and 1.2% respectively.
The maximum increase in CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG via this method is 30% and 60% respectively.

layla.name: Layla
layla.title: Fantastical Evening Star
layla.description: A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.

talents.name: Sword of the Radiant Path
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Nights of Formal Focus
talents.desc: Puts forth a shield known as the Curtain of Slumber, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. The Curtain of Slumber's DMG Absorption is based on Layla's Max HP and absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% effectiveness. When the shield is deployed, Layla will have Cryo applied to her briefly. Night Stars and Shooting Stars While the Curtain of Slumber is active, it will create 1 Night Star that will be attached to it every 1.5s. When a character protected by this shield uses an Elemental Skill, 2 Night Stars will be created. Night Stars can be created once every 0.3s in this way. A maximum of 4 Night Stars can be accumulated at any one time. Once the Curtain of Slumber has accumulated 4 Night Stars and there are opponents nearby, these Night Stars will transform into homing Shooting Stars that will be fired off in sequence, dealing Cryo DMG to any opponents hit. If the Curtain of Slumber's duration ends or it is destroyed, the Night Stars will disappear. If they are already being fired off as Shooting Stars, these Shooting Stars will last until this wave of shots ends. New Night Stars cannot be created until the previous wave of Shooting Stars has been fired completely. "She and I are like two master artisans who have never met, yet who sit at the same cushioned seat, embroidering the same dream-flower."

talents.name: Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker
talents.desc: Unleashes a Celestial Dreamsphere that constantly fires Starlight Slugs at opponents within its AoE, dealing Cryo DMG. When a Starlight Slug hits, it will generate 1 Night Star for nearby Curtains of Slumber. Each Curtain of Slumber can gain 1 Night Star this way every 0.5s. "Sleep now, sleep now; and may many destinies be revealed before your slumbering eyes, within your star-paved dreams."

talents.name: Like Nascent Light
talents.desc:
While the Curtain of Slumber is active, the Deep Sleep effect will activate each time the Curtain gains 1 Night Star:
● The Shield Strength of a character under the effect of the Curtain of Slumber increases by 6%.
● This effect can have a maximum of 4 stacks and persists until the Curtain of Slumber disappears.

talents.name: Sweet Slumber Undisturbed
talents.desc: The DMG dealt by the Shooting Stars fired by <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> is increased by 1.5% of Layla's Max HP.

talents.name: Shadowy Dream-Signs
talents.desc: When Layla crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Fortress of Fantasy
constellations.desc:
The Shield Absorption of the Curtain of Slumber generated by <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> is increased by 20%.
Additionally, when unleashing Nights of Formal Focus, she will generate a shield for any nearby party members who are not being protected by a Curtain of Slumber. This shield will have 35% of the absorption of a Curtain of Slumber, will last for 12s, and will absorb <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.

constellations.name: Light's Remit
constellations.desc: When Shooting Stars from Nights of Formal Focus strike opponents, they will each restore 1 Energy to Layla. Each Shooting Star can restore Energy to her in this manner once.

constellations.name: Secrets of the Night
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Starry Illumination
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> starts to fire off Shooting Stars, it will grant all nearby party members the Dawn Star effect, causing their Normal and Charged Attack DMG to increase based on 5% of Layla's Max HP.
Dawn Star can last up to 3s and will be removed 0.05s after dealing Normal or Charged Attack DMG.

constellations.name: Stream of Consciousness
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Radiant Soulfire
constellations.desc:
Shooting Stars from <color=skill>Nights of Formal Focus</color> deal 40% increased DMG, and Starlight Slugs from <color=skill>Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker</color> deal 40% increased DMG.
Additionally, the interval between the creation of Night Stars via Nights of Formal Focus is decreased by 20%.

nahida.name: Nahida
nahida.title: Physic of Purity
nahida.description: A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

talents.name: Akara
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG to opponents in front of her. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Dendro DMG to opponents in front of her after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the might of Dendro, Nahida plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Dendro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: All Schemes to Know
talents.desc: Sends forth karmic bonds of wood and tree from her side, dealing AoE Dendro DMG and marking up to 8 opponents hit with the Seed of Skandha. When held, this skill will trigger differently. Hold Enters Aiming Mode, which will allow you to select a limited number of opponents within a limited area. During this time, Nahida's resistance to interruption will be increased. When released, this skill deals Dendro DMG to these opponents and marks them with the Seed of Skandha. Aiming Mode will last up to 5s and can select a maximum of 8 opponents. Seed of Skandha Opponents who have been marked by the Seed of Skandha will be linked to one another up till a certain distance. After you trigger Elemental Reactions on opponents who are affected by the Seeds of Skandha or when they take DMG from Dendro Cores (including Burgeon and Hyperbloom DMG), Nahida will unleash Tri-Karma Purification on the opponents and all connected opponents, dealing Dendro DMG based on her ATK and Elemental Mastery. You can trigger at most 1 Tri-Karma Purification within a short period of time. Lo, the god of grass and trees shines her ultimate truth into the void, illuminating the origin and destruction of the three karmas.

talents.name: Illusory Heart
talents.desc: Manifests the Court of Dreams and expands the Shrine of Maya. When the Shrine of Maya field is unleashed, the following effects will be separately unleashed based on the Elemental Types present within the party. ● Pyro: While Nahida remains within the Shrine of Maya, the DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification from "All Schemes to Know" is increased. ● Electro: While Nahida remains within the Shrine of Maya, the interval between each Tri-Karma Purification from "All Schemes to Know" is decreased. ● Hydro: The Shrine of Maya's duration is increased. If there are at least 2 party members of the aforementioned Elemental Types present when the field is deployed, the aforementioned effects will be increased further. Even if Nahida is not on the field, these bonuses will still take effect so long as party members are within the Shrine of Maya. Perhaps all that dwell under the bowers of trees are naught but a fleeting upside-down dream in the eyes of the God of Wisdom.

talents.name: Compassion Illuminated
talents.desc:
When unleashing <color=skill>Illusory Heart</color>, the Shrine of Maya will gain the following effects:
The Elemental Mastery of the active character within the field will be increased by 25% of the Elemental Mastery of the party member with the highest Elemental Mastery.
You can gain a maximum of 250 Elemental Mastery in this manner.

talents.name: Awakening Elucidated
talents.desc:
Each point of Nahida's Elemental Mastery beyond 200 will grant 0.1% Bonus DMG and 0.03% CRIT Rate to Tri-Karma Purification from <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color>.
A maximum of 80% Bonus DMG and 24% CRIT Rate can be granted to Tri-Karma Purification in this manner.

talents.name: On All Things Meditated
talents.desc:
Nahida can use <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color> to interact with some harvestable items within a fixed AoE.
This skill may even have some other effects...

constellations.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
constellations.desc: When the <color=skill>Shrine of Maya</color> is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.

constellations.name: The Root of All Fullness
constellations.desc:
Opponents that are marked by <color=skill>Seeds of Skandha</color> applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
● Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
● Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.

constellations.name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
constellations.desc: When 1/2/3/(4 or more) nearby opponents are affected by <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color>'s Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.

constellations.name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Illusory Heart</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
constellations.desc:
When Nahida hits an opponent affected by <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color>'s Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing <color=skill>Illusory Heart</color>, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.

kirara.name: Kirara
kirara.title: Cat Upon the Eaves
kirara.description: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

talents.name: Boxcutter
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 3 rapid claw strikes.

talents.name: Meow-teor Kick
talents.desc: Press Leaps into the air with all the agility of a cat passing through the bushes, and thwacks her foes with a flying kick that deals AoE Dendro DMG while creating a Shield of Safe Transport. This will also briefly apply Dendro to Kirara. The shield will absorb Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness. The shield's DMG absorption will be based on Kirara's Max HP and will not exceed a certain percentage of that Max HP. The remaining DMG absorption on a Shield of Safe Transport will stack on a new one when it is created, and its duration will reset. Hold Out of her desire to "deliver within half a day," Kirara deploys a Shield of Safe Transport identical to the one that can be created by pressing the skill. She will also curl up into a special express delivery box, entering the Urgent Neko Parcel state in order to move and fight more swiftly. Urgent Neko Parcel ● Deals Dendro DMG to opponents she crashes into. This effect can be triggered once on each opponent every 0.5s. ● When in this state, Kirara's movement speed, climbing speed, and jumping power are all increased, and her Stamina Consumption from climbing is increased. ● When the duration ends or the skill is used again, a Flipclaw Strike more powerful than the attack in the Mode will be unleashed, dealing AoE Dendro DMG. ● The Urgent Neko Parcel state lasts a maximum of 10s. When the state ends, the skill will enter CD. The longer Kirara spends in this state, the longer the CD will be. ● Sprinting or actively canceling climbing will end this state early.

talents.name: Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch
talents.desc: Smash opponents with a Special Delivery Package used for punishing parcel thieves, dealing <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>. After the Special Delivery Package explodes, it will split up into many Cat Grass Cardamoms that will explode either upon contact with opponents or after a period of time, dealing <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Bewitching, Betwitching Tails
talents.desc: When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of <color=skill>Meow-teor Kick</color>, each impact against an opponent will grant her a stack of <color=skill>Reinforced Packaging</color>. This effect can be triggered once for each opponent hit every 0.5s. Max 3 stacks. When the Urgent Neko Parcel state ends, each stack of Reinforced Packaging will create 1 Shield of Safe Transport for Kirara. The shields that are created this way will have 20% of the DMG absorption that the Shield of Safe Transport produced by Meow-teor Kick would have. If Kirara is already protected by a Shield of Safe Transport created by <color=skill>Meow-teor Kick</color>, its DMG absorption will stack with these shields and its duration will reset.

talents.name: Pupillary Variance
talents.desc: Every 1,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will increase the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Meow-teor Kick</color> by 0.4%, and the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color> by 0.3%.

talents.name: Kirara's Utility Passive
talents.desc: When Kirara is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.

constellations.name: Material Circulation
constellations.desc: Every 8,000 Max HP Kirara possesses will cause her to create 1 extra <color=skill>Cat Grass Cardamom</color> when she uses <color=skill>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color>. A maximum of 4 extra can be created this way.

constellations.name: Perfectly Packaged
constellations.desc:
When Kirara is in the Urgent Neko Parcel state of <color=skill>Meow-teor Kick</color>, she will grant other party members she crashes into Critical Transport Shields.
The DMG absorption of Critical Transport Shield is 40% of the maximum absorption <color=skill>Meow-teor Kick</color>'s normal Shields of Safe Transport are capable of, and will absorb <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> with 250% effectiveness.
Critical Transport Shields last 12s and can be triggered once on each character every 10s.

constellations.name: Universal Recognition
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Meow-teor Kick</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Steed of Skanda
constellations.desc: After active character(s) protected by <color=skill>Shields of Safe Transport</color> or <color=skill>Critical Transport Shields</color> hit opponents with Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Kirara will perform a coordinated attack with them using <color=skill>Small Cat Grass Cardamoms</color>, dealing 200% of her ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color>. DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 3.8s. This CD is shared between all party members.

constellations.name: A Thousand Miles in a Day
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Countless Sights to See
constellations.desc: All nearby party members will gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus within 15s after Kirara uses her Elemental Skill or Burst.

alhaitham.name: Alhaitham
alhaitham.title: Admonishing Instruction
alhaitham.description: The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free — free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.

talents.name: Abductive Reasoning
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Universality: An Elaboration on Form
talents.desc: Rushes forward, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby opponents when the rush ends, causing a Chisel-Light Mirror to form. Holding this skill will cause it to behave differently. Hold Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the direction of Alhaitham's rush attack. Chisel-Light Mirror When this skill is unleashed, Alhaitham will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. If there are no Mirrors at this time, he will generate 1 additional Mirror. Chisel-Light Mirrors will have the following properties: ● When he possesses Chisel-Light Mirrors, Alhaitham's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to Dendro DMG. This cannot be overridden. ● When attacks of the aforementioned kinds hit opponents, the Chisel-Light Mirrors will unleash a Projection Attack that deals AoE Dendro DMG based on the number of Mirrors on the field. ● A total of 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors can exist at once. ● The Chisel-Light Mirrors will disappear one after the other over time, and will all disappear when Alhaitham leaves the field.

talents.name: Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena
talents.desc:
Creates a Particular Binding Field and deals multiple instances of <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>.
If Chisel-Light Mirrors exist when this ability is unleashed, all such Mirrors will be consumed and increase the number of DMG instances dealt.
2s after this ability is unleashed, if 0/1/2/3 Mirrors were consumed, Alhaitham will generate 3/2/1/0 new Mirrors in turn.

talents.name: Four-Causal Correction
talents.desc: When Alhaitham's Charged or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, they will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.

talents.name: Mysteries Laid Bare
talents.desc:
Each point of Alhaitham's Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Projection Attacks and <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> by 0.1%.
The maximum DMG increase this way for both these abilities is 100%.

talents.name: Law of Reductive Overdetermination
talents.desc: When Alhaitham crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Intuition
constellations.desc: When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, <color=skill>Universality: An Elaboration on Form</color>'s CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

constellations.name: Debate
constellations.desc: When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.

constellations.name: Negation
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Universality: An Elaboration on Form</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Elucidation
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around:
- Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s.
- Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color> for 15s.

The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

constellations.name: Sagacity
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Structuration
constellations.desc:
Alhaitham gains the following effects:
● 2 seconds after <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed.
● If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s.
If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.

yaoyao.name: Yaoyao
yaoyao.title: Burgeoning Grace
yaoyao.description: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

talents.name: Toss 'N' Turn Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Raphanus Sky Cluster
talents.desc: Calls upon "Yuegui: Throwing Mode," a special device created by a certain adeptus to help Yaoyao solve her problems. This skill will be used differently in Holding Mode. Hold Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the throw direction. Yuegui: Throwing Mode Throws out White Jade Radishes that will explode upon hitting characters or opponents, dealing Dendro DMG to opponents within a certain AoE, and healing characters within that same AoE based on Yaoyao's Max HP. If a radish does not hit either an opponent or a character, the radish will remain where it is and explode on contact with a character or opponent, or will explode after its duration expires. Yuegui: Throwing Mode will choose its radish-throw targets. ● If all nearby characters have more than 70% HP remaining, then it will throw the radish at a nearby opponent. ● If nearby characters have 70% or less HP remaining, it will throw a radish at the character with the lowest HP percentage remaining. If no opponents exist nearby, Yuegui will throw White Jade Radishes at characters even if they all have more than 70% HP remaining. A maximum of 2 instances Yuegui: Throwing Mode can exist at any one time.

talents.name: Moonjade Descent
talents.desc: At the enjoinment of a certain adeptus, Yuegui's full potential can be unleashed in an emergency, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby opponents and entering an (in some sense) unsurpassed Adeptal Legacy state. Adeptal Legacy ● White Jade Radishes generated will be changed to heal and deal DMG according to this skill. Explosions will heal all nearby party members, and the Dendro DMG that they deal will be viewed as Elemental Burst DMG instead. ● Summons "Yuegui: Jumping Mode" at intervals until their limit has been reached. The behavior of this version of Yuegui is the same as that of "Yuegui: Throwing Mode" in the Elemental Skill, Raphanus Sky Cluster. A maximum of 3 Yuegui: Jumping Mode can exist at any one time. ● Yaoyao's Movement SPD is increased by 15%. ● Yaoyao's Dendro RES will be increased. The Adeptal Legacy state will end once Yaoyao is off-field, and all remaining Yuegui: Jumping Mode will be cleared once this state ends.

talents.name: Starscatter
talents.desc: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color>, Yaoyao will constantly throw White Jade Radishes at nearby opponents when she is sprinting, jumping, or running. She can throw 1 White Jade Radish this way once every 0.6s.

talents.name: In Others' Shoes
talents.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will regain HP every 1s based on 0.8% of Yaoyao's Max HP. This effect lasts 5s.

talents.name: Tailing on Tiptoes
talents.desc:
When Yaoyao is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when getting near them.
Check the "Other" sub-category of the "Living Beings / Wildlife" section in the Archive for creatures this skill works on.

constellations.name: Adeptus' Tutelage
constellations.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will gain 15% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s and have 15 Stamina restored to them. This form of Stamina Restoration can only be triggered every 5s.

constellations.name: Innocent
constellations.desc: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color>, if White Jade Radish explosions damage opponents, 3 Energy will be restored to Yaoyao. This form of Energy regeneration can occur once every 0.8s.

constellations.name: Loyal and Kind
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Raphanus Sky Cluster</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Winsome
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Raphanus Sky Cluster</color> or <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color>, Yaoyao's Elemental Mastery will be increased based on 0.3% of her Max HP for 8s. The maximum Elemental Mastery she can gain this way is 120.

constellations.name: Compassionate
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Beneficent
constellations.desc:
For every 2 White Jade Radishes Yuegui: Throwing Mode throws out, it will also throw a Mega Radish that will have a larger AoE than the standard White Jade Radish and have the following effects upon exploding:
● Deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color> based on 75% of Yaoyao's ATK.
● Restores HP for the active character based on 7.5% of Yaoyao's Max HP.

Every Yuegei: Throwing Mode can throw out a maximum of 2 Mega Radishes.

dehya.name: Dehya
dehya.title: Flame-Mane
dehya.description: A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.

talents.name: Sandstorm Assault
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes using her Claymore and her martial arts. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

talents.name: Molten Inferno
talents.desc: This art of Dehya's own invention changes its method of use depending on the combat situation. Indomitable Flame This skill will be unleashed should there be no Fiery Sanctum field created by Dehya herself present at the time. Deals AoE Pyro DMG, and creates a field known as Fiery Sanctum. Ranging Flame This skill will be unleashed should a Fiery Sanctum field created by Dehya herself already exist. Dehya will perform a leaping attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG before recreating a Fiery Sanctum field at her new position. A Fiery Sanctum field created this way will inherit the remaining duration of the previous field. Ranging Flame can be used only once throughout a single Fiery Sanctum field's duration. Fiery Sanctum When an opponent within a Fiery Sanctum field takes DMG, the field will unleash a coordinated attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG to them based on Dehya's ATK and Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 2.5s. Active characters within this field have their resistance to interruption increased, and when such characters take DMG, a portion of that damage will be mitigated and flow into Redmane's Blood. Dehya will then take this DMG over 10s. When the mitigated DMG stored by Redmane's Blood reaches or goes over a certain percentage of Dehya's Max HP, she will stop mitigating DMG in this way. Only 1 Fiery Sanctum created by Dehya herself can exist at the same time.

talents.name: Leonine Bite
talents.desc: Unleashing her burning anger and casting her inconvenient blade aside, Dehya enters the Blazing Lioness state and increases her resistance to interruption. In this state, Dehya will automatically and continuously unleash the Flame-Mane's Fists, dealing Pyro DMG based on her ATK and Max HP, and when its duration ends, she will unleash an Incineration Drive, dealing AoE Pyro DMG based on her ATK and Max HP. If a Fiery Sanctum field created by Dehya's own Elemental Skill "Molten Inferno" exists when this ability is unleashed, Dehya will retrieve it, and then create another field once Blazing Lioness's duration expires. This field will take on the retrieved field's duration at the moment of its retrieval. In this state, Dehya will be unable to cast her Elemental Skill, or perform Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks. "Normal Attack: Sandstorm Assault" and Elemental Skill "Molten Inferno" will be replaced by "Roaring Barrage." Roaring Barrage Unleashing Roaring Barrage within 0.4s after each Flame-Mane's Fist strike will increase the speed at which the next Flame-Mane's Fist strike will be triggered.

talents.name: Unstinting Succor
talents.desc:
Within 6 seconds after Dehya retrieves the Fiery Sanctum field through <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color>: Ranging Flame or <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color>, she will take 60% less DMG when receiving DMG from Redmane's Blood. This effect can be triggered once every 2s.
Additionally, within 9s after Dehya unleashes Molten Inferno: Indomitable Flame, she will grant all party members the Gold-Forged Form state. This state will further increase a character's resistance to interruption when they are within the Fiery Sanctum field. Gold-Forged Form can be activated once every 18s.

talents.name: Stalwart and True
talents.desc: When her HP is less than 40%, Dehya will recover 20% of her Max HP and will restore 6% of her Max HP every 2s for the next 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

talents.name: The Sunlit Way
talents.desc:
Increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10% during the day (6:00 – 18:00).
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: The Flame Incandescent
constellations.desc:
Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
● <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color>'s DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
● <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color>'s DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.

constellations.name: The Sand-Blades Glittering
constellations.desc:
When Dehya uses <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color>: Ranging Flame, the duration of the recreated Fiery Sanctum field will be increased by 4s.
Additionally, when a Fiery Sanctum exists on the field, DMG dealt by its next coordinated attack will be increased by 50% when active character(s) within the Fiery Sanctum field are attacked.

constellations.name: A Rage Swift as Fire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: An Oath Abiding
constellations.desc: When Flame-Mane's Fist and Incineration Drive attacks unleashed during <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color> hit opponents, they will restore 1.5 Energy for Dehya and 2.5% of her Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: The Alpha Unleashed
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Burning Claws Cleaving
constellations.desc:
The CRIT Rate of <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color> is increased by 10%.
Additionally, after a Flame-Mane's Fist attack hits an opponent and deals CRIT Hits during a single Blazing Lioness state, it will cause the CRIT DMG of Leonine Bite to increase by 15% for the rest of Blazing Lioness's duration and extend that duration by 0.5s. This effect can be triggered every 0.2s. The duration can be extended for a maximum of 2s and CRIT DMG can be increased by a maximum of 60% this way.

mika.name: Mika
mika.title: Coordinates of Clear Frost
mika.description: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

talents.name: Spear of Favonius - Arrow's Passage
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes using his crossbow and spear. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Starfrost Swirl
talents.desc: Mika uses his crossbow to attack, granting all nearby characters in your party Soulwind. When characters in the Soulwind state are on the field, their ATK SPD will be increased. Will take effect in different ways if Tapped or Held. Tap Fires a Flowfrost Arrow that can pierce through opponents, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies it comes into contact with. Hold Goes into Aiming Mode, locking on to an opponent and firing a Rimestar Flare at them, dealing Cryo DMG. When the Rimestar Flare hits, it will rise before exploding, launching Rimestar Shards into a maximum of 3 other opponents, dealing Cryo DMG. Stars burst 'neath the frosted skies.

talents.name: Skyfeather Song
talents.desc: Derives the ability to spur his teammates on from the recited prayers of the knightly order, regenerating HP for all nearby party members. This healing is based on Mika's Max HP and will grant them the Eagleplume state. Eagleplume When the Normal Attacks of active characters affected by Eagleplume hit an opponent, Mika will help them regenerate HP based on his Max HP. Characters affected by this state can only regenerate HP in this way once per short interval of time. "Carry hope when in dire straits, and keep vigil when all is well... For that pure white plume shall at last guide the lost wayfarers."

talents.name: Suppressive Barrage
talents.desc:
Per the following circumstances, the Soulwind state caused by <color=skill>Starfrost Swirl</color> will grant characters the Detector effect, increasing their Physical DMG by 10% when they are on the field.
● If the Flowfrost Arrow hits more than one opponent, each additional opponent hit will generate 1 Detector stack.
● When a Rimestar Shard hits an opponent, it will generate 1 Detector stack. Each Rimestar Shard can trigger the effect 1 time.

The Soulwind state can have a maximum of 3 Detector stacks, and if Starfrost Swirl is cast again during this duration, the pre-existing Soulwind state and all its Detector stacks will be cleared.

talents.name: Topographical Mapping
talents.desc:
When an active character affected by both <color=skill>Skyfeather Song</color>'s Eagleplume and <color=skill>Starfrost Swirl</color>'s Soulwind at once scores a CRIT Hit with their attacks, Soulwind will grant them 1 stack of Detector from Suppressive Barrage. During a single instance of Soulwind, 1 Detector stack can be gained in this manner.
Additionally, the maximum number of stacks that can be gained through Soulwind alone is increased by 1.
Requires Suppressive Barrage to be unlocked first.

talents.name: Demarcation
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Factor Confluence
constellations.desc: The Soulwind state of <color=skill>Starfrost Swirl</color> can decrease the healing interval between instances caused by <color=skill>Skyfeather Song</color>'s Eagleplume state. This decrease percentage is equal to the ATK SPD increase provided by Soulwind.

constellations.name: Companion's Ingress
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Starfrost Swirl</color>'s Flowfrost Arrow first hits an opponent, or its Rimestar Flare hits an opponent, 1 Detector stack from Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" will be generated.
You must have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.

constellations.name: Reconnaissance Experience
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Skyfeather Song</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sunfrost Encomium
constellations.desc: When Mika's own <color=skill>Skyfeather Song</color>'s Eagleplume state heals party members, this will restore 3 Energy to Mika. This form of Energy restoration can occur 5 times during the Eagleplume state created by 1 use of Skyfeather Song.

constellations.name: Signal Arrow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Starfrost Swirl</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Companion's Counsel
constellations.desc:
The maximum number of Detector stacks that <color=skill>Starfrost Swirl</color>'s Soulwind can gain is increased by 1. You need to have unlocked the Passive Talent "Suppressive Barrage" first.
Additionally, active characters affected by Soulwind will deal 60% more Physical CRIT DMG.

baizhu.name: Baizhu
baizhu.title: Beyond Mortality
baizhu.description: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

talents.name: The Classics of Acupuncture
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG to opponents in front of him. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Dendro DMG to opponents in front of him after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the might of Dendro, Baizhu plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Dendro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Universal Diagnosis
talents.desc: Controls a Gossamer Sprite that cruises and attacks nearby opponents, dealing Dendro DMG. After it performs 3 attacks or if there are no opponents nearby, the Sprite will return, healing all nearby party members based on Baizhu's Max HP. Those in the medical field who can read true signs of illness from false ones may even cure people before any symptoms can show.

talents.name: Holistic Revivification
talents.desc: Enters the Pulsing Clarity state, creating a Seamless Shield that absorbs Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness. While in this state, Baizhu will generate a new Seamless Shield every 2.5s. The Seamless Shield will heal your own active character based on Baizhu's Max HP and attack opponents by unleashing Spiritveins, dealing Dendro DMG under the following circumstances: ·When a character is under the protection of a Seamless Shield and a new Seamless Shield is generated. ·When the Seamless Shield's effects expire, or when it is shattered.
