If you can perceive the heavens and the earth, defend against malignant auras with the flow of qi, and keep your mind clear, surely nothing can hinder you.

talents.name: Five Fortunes Forever
talents.desc:
Baizhu gains different effects according to the current HP of your current active character:
● When their HP is less than 50%, Baizhu gains 20% Healing Bonus.
● When their HP is equal to or more than 50%, Baizhu gains 25% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: All Things Are of the Earth
talents.desc: Characters who are healed by <color=skill>Seamless Shields</color> will gain the Year of Verdant Favor effect: Each 1,000 Max HP that Baizhu possesses that does not exceed 50,000 will increase the Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG dealt by these characters by 2%, while the Aggravate and Spread reaction DMG dealt by these characters will be increased by 0.8%. This effect lasts 6s.

talents.name: Herbal Nourishment
talents.desc: When Baizhu is in the party, interacting with certain harvestable items will heal your current active character for 2.5% of Baizhu's Max HP.

constellations.name: Attentive Observation
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Universal Diagnosis</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Incisive Discernment
constellations.desc:
When your own active character hits a nearby opponent with their attacks, Baizhu will unleash a Gossamer Sprite: Splice.
Gossamer Sprite: Splice will initiate 1 attack before returning, dealing 250% of Baizhu's ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> and healing for 20% of <color=skill>Universal Diagnosis</color>'s Gossamer Sprite's normal healing.
DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

constellations.name: All Aspects Stabilized
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Ancient Art of Perception
constellations.desc: For 15s after <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color> is used, Baizhu will increase all nearby party members' Elemental Mastery by 80.

constellations.name: The Hidden Ebb and Flow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Universal Diagnosis</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Elimination of Malicious Qi
constellations.desc:
Increases the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color>'s Spiritveins by 8% of Baizhu's Max HP.
Additionally, when a Gossamer Sprite or <color=skill>Gossamer Sprite</color>: Splice hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of generating one of <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color>'s Seamless Shields. This effect can only be triggered once by each Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice.

kaveh.name: Kaveh
kaveh.title: Empyrean Reflection
kaveh.description: A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.

talents.name: Schematic Setup
talents.desc: Normal Attack Uses Mehrak to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Artistic Ingenuity
talents.desc: Uses Mehrak's mapping ability for offensive purposes, initiating a radial scan that deals AoE Dendro DMG. It will also scan all Dendro Cores in its AoE and cause them to immediately burst. Mehrak was created through the modification of ancient technology and may have some other functions apart from mapping work...

talents.name: Painted Dome
talents.desc: Completely unleashes Mehrak's energy and creates a cubic scanned space, dealing AoE Dendro DMG to all opponents within it, causing all Dendro Cores in its AoE to immediately burst, and granting Kaveh the following enhanced combat abilities for a specific duration: ● Increases Kaveh's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack AoE, and converts his attack DMG to Dendro DMG that cannot be overridden. ● All Dendro Cores created by all your own party members through Bloom reactions will deal additional DMG when they burst. ● Increases Kaveh's resistance to interruption. These effects will be canceled once Kaveh leaves the field. "Every building style includes the architect's unique worldview, and from this angle, one can say that the buildings themselves are coalescences of human memories."

talents.name: An Architect's Undertaking
talents.desc: When DMG dealt by a Dendro Core (including DMG from Burgeon and Hyperbloom) hits Kaveh, Kaveh will regain HP equal to 300% of his Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s.

talents.name: A Craftsman's Curious Conceptions
talents.desc:
During <color=skill>Painted Dome</color>, after Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, his Elemental Mastery will increase by 25. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 4 stacks.
This effect will be canceled when Painted Dome's effects end.

talents.name: The Art of Budgeting
talents.desc: When Kaveh crafts Landscape, Building, and Courtyard-type Furnishings, he has a 100% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

constellations.name: Sublime Salutations
constellations.desc: Within 3s after using <color=skill>Artistic Ingenuity</color>, Kaveh's <color=dendro>Dendro RES</color> and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.

constellations.name: Grace of Royal Roads
constellations.desc: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during <color=skill>Painted Dome</color>.

constellations.name: Profferings of Dur Untash
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Painted Dome</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Feast of Apadana
constellations.desc: Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

constellations.name: Treasures of Bonkhanak
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Artistic Ingenuity</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pairidaeza's Dreams
constellations.desc: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during <color=skill>Painted Dome</color>, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color> and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

freminet.name: Freminet
freminet.title: Yearning for Unseen Depths
freminet.description: A reserved young man who is well-versed in diving. Beneath his distant, icy demeanor lies a pure heart bereft of all flaws.

talents.name: Flowing Eddies
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Pressurized Floe
talents.desc: Does an upward thrust that will deal Cryo DMG and cause Freminet to enter Pers Timer for 10s. While Pers Timer is active, his Elemental Skill will turn into Shattering Pressure. Shattering Pressure Executes different sorts of attacks based on the Pressure level of Pers Timer, and then cancels Pers Timer. ● Level 0: Unleashes a vertical cut that will deal Cryo DMG. ● Levels 1 to 3: Unleashes a vertical cut alongside Pers, dealing Cryo DMG and Physical DMG. DMG dealt scales based on Pressure level. ● Level 4: Borrows the power of a fully-pressurized Pers to deal Physical DMG. Meanwhile, Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies will be replaced by Shattering Pressure. Pers Timer When Freminet uses Normal Attacks, he will also unleash waves of frost that deal Cryo DMG and increase Pers' Pressure level. The accompanying Cryo DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG. Arkhe: Pneuma At certain intervals, after using the upward thrust, a Spiritbreath Thorn in the form of another upward thrust will be created, dealing Pneuma-aligned Cryo DMG. To immobilize one's opponent without taking their life can also be considered something of a "survival" strategy that one may choose. "Pers... I leave the rest to you."

talents.name: Shadowhunter's Ambush
talents.desc: Unleashes a wave of untouchable cold, dealing AoE Cryo DMG, resetting the CD of the Elemental Skill "Pressurized Floe," and causing Freminet to enter the Subnautical Hunter mode for 10s. While in Subnautical Hunter mode, his interruption resistance will increase, and Pressurized Floe will obtain the following buffs: ● CD decreased by 70%. ● Normal Attacks will give Pers 1 additional Pressure stack, and the frost released by his Normal Attacks deal 200% of their original DMG. This effect will be canceled when Freminet leaves the field. "Now... I have no need of any extraneous noise."

talents.name: Saturation Deep Dive
talents.desc: When using <color=skill>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color>, if Pers Timer has less than 4 levels of Pressure, the CD of <color=skill>Pressurized Floe</color> will be decreased by 1s.

talents.name: Parallel Condensers
talents.desc: When Freminet triggers Shatter against opponents, the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will be increased by 40% for 5s.

talents.name: Deepwater Navigation
talents.desc:
Decreases underwater stamina consumption for your own party members by 35%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Dreams of the Foamy Deep
constellations.desc: The CRIT Rate of <color=skill>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will be increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Penguins and the Land of Plenty
constellations.desc: Unleashing <color=skill>Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure</color> will restore 2 Energy to Freminet. If a Pressure Level 4 Shattering Pressure is unleashed, this will restore 3 Energy.

constellations.name: Song of the Eddies and Bleached Sands
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: <color=skill>Flowing Eddies</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dance of the Snowy Moon and Flute
constellations.desc: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his ATK will be increased by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

constellations.name: Nights of Hearth and Happiness
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Pressurized Floe</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
constellations.desc: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his CRIT DMG will be increased by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

lynette.name: Lynette
lynette.title: Elegance in the Shadows
lynette.description: A magic assistant of few words, her emotions are as inscrutable as any cat's.

talents.name: Rapid Ritesword
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Enigmatic Feint
talents.desc: Flicks her mantle and executes an Enigma Thrust, dealing Anemo DMG. When the Enigma Thrust hits an opponent, it will restore Lynette's HP based on her Max HP, and in the 4s afterward, she will lose a certain amount of HP per second. Based on whether you press or hold this ability, she will use Enigma Thrust differently. Press She swiftly uses an Enigma Thrust. Hold Lynette will enter a high-speed Pilfering Shadow state and apply Shadowsign to a nearby opponent. You can control her movement direction during this state, and you can end it prematurely by using this skill again. When this high-speed state ends, Lynette will unleash her Enigma Thrust. If there is an opponent with Shadowsign applied to them nearby, Lynette will approach them in a flash before using Enigma Thrust. A maximum of 1 opponent can have Shadowsign at any one time. When this opponent gets too far from Lynette, the Shadowsign will be canceled. Arkhe: Ousia At specific intervals, Lynette will unleash a Surging Blade when she uses Enigma Thrust, dealing Ousia-aligned Anemo DMG. "Now then, turn your eyes to the stage and continue to enjoy the performance. When I next appear, I'll be where you least expect."

talents.name: Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift
talents.desc: Lynette raises her mantle high, dealing AoE Anemo DMG, using skillful sleight of hand to make a giant Bogglecat Box appear! Bogglecat Box ● Taunts nearby opponents, attracting their attacks. ● Deals Anemo DMG to nearby opponents at intervals. ● When the Bogglecat Box comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will gain the corresponding element and additionally fire Vivid Shots that will deal DMG from that element at intervals. Elemental Absorption of this kind will only occur once during this ability's duration. "Look this way, and look closely. This is a time for miracles, just for us."

talents.name: Sophisticated Synergy
talents.desc: Within 10s after using <color=skill>Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift</color>, when there are 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types in the party, all party members' ATK will be increased by 8%/12%/16%/20% respectively.

talents.name: Props Positively Prepped
talents.desc: After the Bogglecat Box summoned by <color=skill>Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift</color> performs Elemental Conversion, Lynette's Elemental Burst will deal 15% more DMG. This effect will persist until the Bogglecat Box's duration ends.

talents.name: Loci-Based Mnemonics
talents.desc: Shows the location of nearby Recovery Orbs on the minimap. The underwater Stamina and HP gained from touching Orbs will be increased by 25%.

constellations.name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Enigmatic Feint</color>'s Enigma Thrust hits an opponent with Shadowsign, a vortex will be created at that opponent's position that will pull nearby opponents in.

constellations.name: Endless Mysteries
constellations.desc: Whenever the Bogglecat Box summoned by <color=skill>Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift</color> fires a Vivid Shot, it will fire an extra Vivid Shot.

constellations.name: Cognition-Inverting Gaze
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tacit Coordination
constellations.desc: Increases <color=skill>Enigmatic Feint</color>'s charges by 1.

constellations.name: Obscuring Ambiguity
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Enigmatic Feint</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Watchful Eye
constellations.desc: When Lynette uses <color=skill>Enigmatic Feint</color>'s Enigma Thrust, she will gain an <color=anemo>Anemo Infusion</color> and 20% <color=anemo>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 6s.

lyney.name: Lyney
lyney.title: Spectacle of Phantasmagoria
lyney.description: A famed Fontainian magician who possesses great stage presence as well as gift of the gab. Audiences are enthralled by his exquisite skills, and they hang on to his every clever word.

talents.name: Card Force Translocation
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact. Charged Attack Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will run across the arrowhead before being fired. Different effects will occur based on the time spent charging. ● Charge Level 1: Fires off a Pyro-infused arrow, dealing Pyro DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Fires off a Prop Arrow that deals Pyro DMG, and upon hit, it will summon a Grin-Malkin Hat. When firing the Prop Arrow, and when Lyney has more than 60% HP, he will consume a portion of his HP to obtain 1 Prop Surplus stack. Max 5 stacks. The effect will be removed after the character spends 30s out of combat. The lowest Lyney can drop to through this method is 60% of his Max HP. Grin-Malkin Hat ● Can taunt nearby opponents and attract their attacks. Each opponent can only be taunted by the Hat once every 5s. ● The Hat will inherit a percentage of Lyney's Max HP. ● If destroyed, or if its duration expires, it will fire off a Pyrotechnic Strike at 1 nearby opponent, dealing Pyro DMG. 1 Hat can exist at any given time. Arkhe: Pneuma At certain intervals, the Prop Arrow will cause a Spiritbreath Thorn to descend upon its hit location, dealing Pneuma-aligned Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Bewildering Lights
talents.desc:
Lyney does a flourish with his hat, unleashing a firework surprise!
When used, he will clear all current Prop Surplus stacks and deal <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents in front of him. DMG will be increased according to the stacks cleared, and this will also regenerate Lyney's HP based on his Max HP.

When a Grin-Malkin Hat created by Lyney is on the field, the fireworks will cause it to explode, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> equal to that of a Pyrotechnic Strike.
The DMG dealt through the Grin-Malkin Hat in this way is considered Charged Attack DMG.

talents.name: Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade
talents.desc: Unleashing his magic, Lyney turns himself into a Grin-Malkin Cat that can move around quickly. (Not to be mistaken for the Grin-Malkin Hat. They're two different props!) When the Grin-Malkin Cat gets close to opponents, it will send flames falling down on them, dealing at most 1 instance of Pyro DMG to each opponent. When the duration ends, he will dismiss the Grin-Malkin Cat and ignite fireworks that deal AoE Pyro DMG, summon 1 Grin-Malkin Hat, and grant himself 1 Prop Surplus stack. Grin-Malkin Cat can be actively canceled. "Watch closely now. This is a time for miracles, and it belongs just to the two of us!"

talents.name: Perilous Performance
talents.desc: If Lyney consumes HP when firing off a <color=skill>Prop Arrow</color>, the Grin-Malkin hat summoned by the arrow will, upon hitting an opponent, restore 3 Energy to Lyney and increase DMG dealt by 80% of his ATK.

talents.name: Conclusive Ovation
talents.desc:
The DMG Lyney deals to opponents affected by <color=pyro>Pyro</color> will receive the following buffs:
● Increases the DMG dealt by 60%.
● Each <color=pyro>Pyro</color> party member other than Lyney will cause the DMG dealt to increase by an additional 20%.
Lyney can deal up to 100% increased DMG to opponents affected by <color=pyro>Pyro</color> in this way.

talents.name: Trivial Observations
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Fontaine on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Whimsical Wonders
constellations.desc:
Lyney can have 2 <color=skill>Grin-Malkin Hats</color> present at once.
Additionally, Prop Arrows will summon 2 Grin-Malkin Hats and grant Lyney 1 extra stack of Prop Surplus. This effect can occur once every 15s.

constellations.name: Locquacious Cajoling
constellations.desc: When Lyney is on the field, he will gain a stack of Crisp Focus every 2s. This will increase his CRIT DMG by 20%. Max 3 stacks. This effect will be canceled when Lyney leaves the field.

constellations.name: Prestidigitation
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: <color=skill>Card Force Translocation</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Well-Versed, Well-Rehearsed
constellations.desc: After an opponent is hit by Lyney's <color=pyro>Pyro</color> Charged Attack, this opponent's <color=pyro>Pyro RES</color> will be decreased by 20% for 6s.

constellations.name: To Pierce Enigmas
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Wondrous Trick: Miracle Parade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Guarded Smile
constellations.desc: When Lyney fires a <color=skill>Prop Arrow</color>, he will fire a Pyrotechnic Strike: Reprised that will deal 80% of a Pyrotechnic Strike's DMG. This DMG is considered Charged Attack DMG.

neuvillette.name: Neuvillette
neuvillette.title: Ordainer of Inexorable Judgment
neuvillette.description: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

talents.name: As Water Seeks Equilibrium
talents.desc: Normal Attack With light flourishes, Neuvillette commands the tides to unleash a maximum of 3 attacks, dealing Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Empowerment: Legal Evaluation While charging up, Neuvillette will gather the power of water, forming it into a Seal of Arbitration. In this state, Neuvillette can move and change facing, and also absorb any Sourcewater Droplets in a certain AoE. Every Droplet he absorbs will increase the formation speed of the Seal, and will heal Neuvillette. When the charging is stopped, if the Symbol has yet to be formed, then a Charged Attack will be unleashed. If it has been formed, then a Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment will be unleashed. Charged Attack Consumes a fixed amount of Stamina to attack opponents with a rupturing blast of water, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment Unleashes surging torrents, dealing continuous AoE Hydro DMG to all opponents in a straight-line area in front of him. Equitable Judgment will not consume any Stamina and lasts 3s. If Neuvillette's HP is above 50%, he will continuously lose HP while using this attack. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Neuvillette plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: O Tears, I Shall Repay
talents.desc: Summons a Raging Waterfall that will deal AoE Hydro DMG to opponents in front of Neuvillette based on his Max HP. After hitting an opponent, this skill will generate 3 Sourcewater Droplets near that opponent. Arkhe: Pneuma At certain intervals, when the Raging Waterfall descends, a Spiritbreath Thorn will descend that will pierce opponents, dealing Pneuma-aligned Hydro DMG.

talents.name: O Tides, I Have Returned
talents.desc: Unleashes waves that will deal <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> based on Neuvillette's Max HP. After a short interval, 2 waterfalls will descend and deal <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> in a somewhat smaller AoE, and will generate 6 Sourcewater Droplets within an area in front.

talents.name: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority
talents.desc:
When a party member triggers a Vaporize, Frozen, Electro-Charged, Bloom, Hydro Swirl, or a Hydro Crystallize reaction on opponents, 1 stack of Past Draconic Glories will be granted to Neuvillette for 30s. Max 3 stacks. Past Draconic Glories causes Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment to deal 110%/125%/160% of its original DMG.
The stacks of Past Draconic Glories created by each kind of Elemental Reaction exist independently.

talents.name: Discipline of the Supreme Arbitration
talents.desc: For each 1% of Neuvillette's current HP greater than 30% of Max HP, he will gain 0.6% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>. A maximum bonus of 30% can be obtained this way.

talents.name: Gather Like the Tide
talents.desc:
Increases underwater Sprint SPD for your own party members by 15%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Venerable Institution
constellations.desc:
When Neuvillette takes the field, he will obtain 1 stack of Past Draconic Glories from the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority." You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority."
Additionally, his interruption resistance will be increased while using the Charged Attack Empowerment: Legal Evaluation and the Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment.

constellations.name: Juridical Exhortation
constellations.desc:
The Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority" will be enhanced: Each stack of Past Draconic Glories will increase the CRIT DMG of Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment by 14%. The maximum increase that can be achieved this way is 42%.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority."

constellations.name: Ancient Postulation
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: <color=skill>As Water Seeks Equilibrium</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Crown of Commiseration
constellations.desc: When Neuvillette is on the field and is healed, 1 Sourcewater Droplet will be generated. This effect can occur once every 4s.

constellations.name: Axiomatic Judgment
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>O Tides, I Have Returned</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wrathful Recompense
constellations.desc:
When using Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment, Neuvillette can absorb nearby Sourcewater Droplets in an AoE. Each absorbed Droplet will increase the duration of Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment by 1s.
Additionally, when Equitable Judgment hits opponents, it will fire off 2 additional currents every 2s, each of which will deal 10% of Neuvillette's Max HP as <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>. DMG dealt this way will count as DMG dealt by Equitable Judgment.

wriothesley.name: Wriothesley
wriothesley.title: Emissary of Solitary Iniquity
wriothesley.description: Duke of the Fortress of Meropide, Lord Incognito of the murky depths.

talents.name: Forceful Fists of Frost
talents.desc: Normal Attack Coalescing frost about his fist, Wriothesley will unleash powerful Repelling Fists, performing up to 5 rapid attacks that deal Cryo DMG. Apart from this, Normal Attack combo count will not reset for a short time after using Icefang Rush or sprinting. Charged Attack Consumes a fixed amount of Stamina to leap and unleash a Vaulting Fist, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE Cryo DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Icefang Rush
talents.desc: Adjusting his breathing, rhythm, and pace, Wriothesley sprints forward a short distance, entering the Chilling Penalty state and unleashing more powerful attacks than before. Chilling Penalty ● Increases Wriothesley's interruption resistance ● When his HP is above 50%, it will enhance the Repelling Fists of Normal Attack: Forceful Fists of Frost and increase its DMG. When such an attack hits, it will consume a fixed amount of Wriothesley's HP. HP can be lost this way once every 0.1s. This effect will be canceled should Wriothesley leave the field. "Past convictions are past. It is our future choices that we must grasp." "Defy your fate, or else this glutton be, to pay your fate's due, by the crime and thee."

talents.name: Darkgold Wolfbite
talents.desc: Activating his boxing gloves, Wriothesley strikes out with an icy straight, then uses Icicle Impact to cause multiple instances of AoE Cryo DMG in a frontal area. Arkhe: Ousia After Icicle Impact ends, a Surging Blade will descend upon the opponent's position, dealing Ousia-aligned Cryo DMG. There are some things that even the Duke of the Fortress of Meropide can do little about — for example, complicated paperwork, the trivialities of a supervisor, or even... little kids pasting a whole host of cute but difficult-to-remove stickers on his boxing gloves.

talents.name: There Shall Be a Plea for Justice
talents.desc:
When Wriothesley's HP is less than 60%, he will obtain a Gracious Rebuke. The next Charged Attack of his Normal Attack: <color=skill>Forceful Fists of Frost</color> will be enhanced to become Rebuke: Vaulting Fist. It will not consume Stamina, will deal 50% increased DMG, and after hitting will restore HP for Wriothesley equal to 30% of his Max HP.
You can gain a Gracious Rebuke this way once every 5s.

talents.name: There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin
talents.desc: When Wriothesley's current HP increases or decreases, if he is in the Chilling Penalty state conferred by <color=skill>Icefang Rush</color>, Chilling Penalty will gain one stack of Prosecution Edict. Max 5 stacks. Each stack will increase Wriothesley's ATK by 6%.

talents.name: The Duke's Grace
talents.desc: When Wriothesley crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Terror for the Evildoers
constellations.desc:
The Gracious Rebuke from the Passive Talent "<color=skill>There Shall Be a Plea for Justice</color>" is changed to this:
When Wriothesley's HP is less than 60% or while he is in the Chilling Penalty state caused by <color=skill>Icefang Rush</color>, when the fifth attack of Repelling Fists hits, it will create a Gracious Rebuke. 1 Gracious Rebuke effect can be obtained every 2.5s.

Additionally, Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will obtain the following enhancement:
● The DMG Bonus gained will be further increased to 200%.
● When it hits while Wriothesley is in the Chilling Penalty state, that state's duration is extended by 4s. 1 such extension can occur per 1 Chilling Penalty duration.

You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>There Shall Be a Plea for Justice</color>."

constellations.name: Shackles for the Arrogant
constellations.desc:
When using <color=skill>Darkgold Wolfbite</color>, each Prosecution Edict stack from the Passive Talent "<color=skill>There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin</color>" will increase said ability's DMG dealt by 40%.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>There Shall Be a Reckoning for Sin</color>."

constellations.name: Punishment for the Frauds
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Normal Attack: <color=skill>Forceful Fists of Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Redemption for the Suffering
constellations.desc:
The HP restored to Wriothesley through Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will be increased to 50% of his Max HP. You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>There Shall Be a Plea for Justice</color>."
Additionally, when Wriothesley is healed, if the amount of healing overflows, the following effects will occur depending on whether he is on the field or not. If he is on the field, his ATK SPD will be increased by 20% for 4s. If he is off-field, all of your own party members' ATK SPD will be increased by 10% for 6s. These two methods of increasing ATK SPD cannot stack.

constellations.name: Mercy for the Wronged
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Darkgold Wolfbite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Esteem for the Innocent
constellations.desc:
The CRIT Rate of Rebuke: Vaulting Fist will be increased by 10%, and its CRIT DMG by 80%. When unleashed, it will also create an additional icicle that deals 100% of Rebuke: Vaulting Fist's Base DMG as <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>. DMG dealt this way is regarded as Charged Attack DMG.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>There Shall Be a Plea for Justice</color>."

furina.name: Furina
furina.title: Endless Solo of Solitude
furina.description: The absolute focus of the stage of judgment, until the final applause sounds.

talents.name: Normal Attack: Soloist's Solicitation
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a solo dance, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents and changing her Arkhe alignment. If Salon Members or Singer of Many Waters summoned by her Elemental Skill "Salon Solitaire" are present, their lineup will switch in response. Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular At intervals, when Furina's Normal Attacks hit, a Spiritbreath Thorn or a Surging Blade will descend based on her current alignment, dealing Hydro DMG based on her current alignment. When Furina takes the field, her starting Arkhe will be Ousia. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Salon Solitaire
talents.desc: Invites the guests of the Salon Solitaire to come forth and abet in Furina's performance. Will summon either the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters based on Furina's current Arkhe alignment. Ousia Foaming bubbles like celebrants shall dance, dealing AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and summoning 3 Salon Members: the Ball Octopus-shaped Gentilhomme Usher, the Bubbly Seahorse-shaped Surintendante Chevalmarin, and the Armored Crab-shaped Mademoiselle Crabaletta. They will attack nearby opponents at intervals, prioritizing the target of the active character, dealing Hydro DMG based on Max HP. When they attack, if character(s) with more than 50% HP are nearby, the Members will increase their current attack's power based on the number of such characters, and consume said characters' HP. If the characters who meet these requirements are 1/2/3/4 (or more), the Members' attacks will deal 110%/120%/130%/140% of their original DMG. Pneuma Summons the Singer of Many Waters, who will heal nearby active character(s) based on Max HP at intervals. The Salon Members and Singer of Many Waters share a duration, and when Furina uses her Charged Attack to change the guest type, the new guests will inherit the initial duration. While the Salon Members and the Singer of Many Waters are on the field, Furina can move on the water's surface. A fixed roster of regulars frequent Furina's Salon Solitaire. At other times, Mademoiselle Crabaletta, Surintendante Chevalmarin, and Gentilhomme Usher shall visit, and on gloomy Wednesdays, it is the singer who comes by.

talents.name: Let the People Rejoice
talents.desc: Rouses the impulse to revel, creating a stage of foam that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and cause nearby party members to enter the Universal Revelry state: During this time, when nearby party members' HP increases or decreases, 1 Fanfare point will be granted to Furina for each percentage point of their Max HP by which their HP changes. At the same time, Furina will increase the DMG dealt by and Incoming Healing Bonus of all nearby party members based on the amount of Fanfare she has. When the duration ends, Furina's Fanfare points will be cleared. "Cheer! Give praise! Be awed! Raise your glasses! Every night bereft of banqueting is a sordid squandering of sore, sober daylight... And, uh, those who are not yet of age may have grape juice instead!"

talents.name: Endless Waltz
talents.desc: When the active character in your party receives healing, if the source of the healing is not Furina herself and the healing overflows, then Furina will heal a nearby party member for 2% of their Max HP once every 2s within the next 4s.

talents.name: Unheard Confession
talents.desc:
Every 1,000 points of Furina's Max HP can buff the different Arkhe-aligned Salon Solitaire in the following ways:
Will increase Salon Member DMG dealt by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 28%.
Will decrease active character healing interval of the Singer of Many Waters by 0.4%, up to a maximum of 16%.

talents.name: The Sea Is My Stage
talents.desc: Xenochromatic Fontemer Aberrant ability CD decreased by 30%.

constellations.name: "Love Is a Rebellious Bird That None Can Tame"
constellations.desc:
When using Let the People Rejoice, Furina will gain 150 Fanfare.
Additionally, Furina's Fanfare limit is increased by 100.

constellations.name: "A Woman Adapts Like Duckweed in Water"
constellations.desc: While Let the People Rejoice lasts, Furina's Fanfare gain from increases or decreases in nearby characters' HP is increased by 250%. Each point of Fanfare above the limit will increase Furina's Max HP by 0.35%. Her maximum Max HP increase is 140%.

constellations.name: "My Secret Is Hidden Within Me, No One Will Know My Name"
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Let the People Rejoice by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: "They Know Not Life, Who Dwelt in the Netherworld Not!"
constellations.desc: When the Salon Members from Salon Solitaire hit an opponent, or the Singer of Many Waters restores HP to the active character, Furina will restore 4 Energy. This effect triggers once every 5s.

constellations.name: "His Name I Now Know, It Is...!"
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Salon Solitaire by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
constellations.desc:
When using <color=skill>Salon Solitaire</color>, Furina gains "Center of Attention" for 10s.
Throughout the duration, Furina's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks are converted into <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. DMG is also increased by an amount equivalent to 18% of Furina's max HP.
Throughout the duration, Furina's Normal Attacks (not including Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular Attacks), Charged Attacks, and the impact of Plunging Attacks will cause different effects up to every 0.1s after hitting opponents depending on her current Arkhe alignment:

Arkhe: Ousia
Every 1s, all nearby characters in the party will be healed by 4% of Furina's max HP, for a duration of 2.9s. Triggering this effect again will extend its duration.
Arkhe: Pneuma
This Normal Attack (not including Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular Attacks), Charged Attack, or Plunging Attack ground impact DMG will be further increased by an amount equivalent to 25% of Furina's max HP. When any of the attacks mentioned previously hit an opponent, all nearby characters in the party will consume 1% of their current HP.

During the duration of each instance of "Center of Attention," the above effects can be triggered up to 6 times. "Center of Attention" will end when its effects have triggered 6 times or when the duration expires.

chevreuse.name: Chevreuse
chevreuse.title: Executor of Justice
chevreuse.description: The captain of the Special Security and Surveillance Patrol, who wears justice as an ever-present seal upon her heart. Her musket shall only ever point at the guilty.

talents.name: Line Bayonet Thrust EX
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire
talents.desc: Chevreuse quickly shoulders her musket and fires at her opponent(s), dealing AoE Pyro DMG. For a short duration after Chevreuse fires a shot, she will continuously restore HP to the active character on the field. The amount healed is based on her Max HP. Hold to fire in a different fashion. Hold Enter Aiming Mode, locking a target in her sights to fire a precise interdiction shot. If Chevreuse has an Overcharged Ball, then she will fire the Overcharged Ball instead, dealing greater Pyro DMG in a larger area. Chevreuse gains 1 Overcharged Ball every time a nearby character in the party triggers an Overloaded reaction, and can have up to 1 Overcharged Ball at a time. Arkhe: Ousia Periodically, after Chevreuse's Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire hits, a Surging Blade will be called forth that deals ousia-aligned Pyro DMG. "Actually, training regulations only had the phrase "interdiction fire," but the protagonist of this novel believes that even how stylish your terminology is can affect how motivated your troops are, which can put your opponents on the back foot right from the get-go... I think that's a good point, so I changed the regulations!"

talents.name: Ring of Bursting Grenades
talents.desc: Chevreuse fires an explosive grenade at opponents with her musket, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. After the projectile hits, it will split into many secondary explosive shells. The secondary explosive shells will burst after a short interval, dealing Pyro DMG to nearby opponents. "Theoretically, a rectangular blast would be most efficient at destroying enemy formations. Unfortunately, the cross-section of an explosive shock wave is round, like most cakes. So, the secondary explosive shells can only be arranged like the fruit on a cake, forming a ring around the edge."

talents.name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
talents.desc:
When the Elemental Type of all party members is <color=pyro>Pyro</color> or <color=electro>Electro</color> and there is at least one <color=pyro>Pyro</color> and one <color=electro>Electro</color> characters each in the party:
Chevreuse grants "Coordinated Tactics" to nearby party members: After a character triggers the Overloaded reaction, the <color=pyro>Pyro</color> and <color=electro>Electro RES</color> of the opponent(s) affected by this Overloaded reaction will be decreased by 40% for 6s.
The "Coordinated Tactics" effect will be removed when the Elemental Types of the characters in the party do not meet the basic requirements for the Passive Talent.

talents.name: Vertical Force Coordination
talents.desc: After Chevreuse fires an Overcharged Ball using <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color>, nearby <color=pyro>Pyro</color> and <color=electro>Electro</color> characters in the party gain 1% increased ATK for every 1000 Max HP Chevreuse has for 30s. ATK can be increased by up to 40% in this way.

talents.name: Double Time March
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Stable Front Line's Resolve
constellations.desc:
When the active character with the "Coordinated Tactics" status (not including Chevreuse herself) triggers the Overloaded reaction, they will recover 6 Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics</color>."

constellations.name: Sniper Induced Explosion
constellations.desc: After Holding <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color> and hitting a target, 2 chain explosions will be triggered near the location where said target is hit. Each explosion deals <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> equal to 120% of Chevreuse's ATK. This effect can be triggered up to once every 10s, and DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

constellations.name: Practiced Field Stripping Technique
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Secret to Rapid-Fire Multishots
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Ring of Bursting Grenades</color>, the Hold mode of <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color> will not enter cooldown when Chevreuse uses it. This effect is removed after <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color> has been fired twice using Hold or after 6s.

constellations.name: Enhanced Incendiary Firepower
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ring of Bursting Grenades</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: In Pursuit of Ending Evil
constellations.desc:
After 12s of the healing effect from <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color>, all nearby party members recover HP equivalent to 10% of Chevreuse's Max HP once.
After a party member is healed by <color=skill>Short-Range Rapid Interdiction Fire</color>, they gain a 20% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

navia.name: Navia
navia.title: Helm of the Radiant Rose
navia.description: The current President of Spina di Rosula, who is lovely, dutiful, and a great boss.

talents.name: Blunt Refusal
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Ceremonial Crystalshot
talents.desc: When a character in the party obtains an Elemental Shard created from the Crystallize reaction, Navia will gain 1 Crystal Shrapnel charge. Navia can hold up to 6 charges of Crystal Shrapnel at once. Each time Crystal Shrapnel gain is triggered, the duration of the Crystal Shrapnel charges you already have will be reset. When she fires, Navia will consume all Crystal Shrapnel charges and open her elegant yet lethal Gunbrella, firing multiple Rosula Shardshots that can penetrate opponents, dealing Geo DMG to opponents hit. When 0/1/2/3 or more charges of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed, 5/7/9/11 Rosula Shardshots will be fired respectively. The more Rosula Shardshots that strike a single opponent, the greater the DMG dealt to them. When all 11 Rosula Shardshots strike, 200% of the original amount of DMG is dealt. In addition, when more than 3 charges of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed, every charge consumed beyond those 3 will increase the damage dealt by this Gunbrella shot by an additional 15%. Hold Enter Aiming Mode, continually collecting Elemental Shards created by Crystallize reactions. When released, fire Rosula Shardshots with the same effect as when the skill is Tapped. Two initial uses. Arkhe: Ousia Periodically, when Navia fires her Gunbrella, a Surging Blade will be summoned, dealing Ousia-aligned Geo DMG. "Maintaining the appropriate distance with those whom distance should be maintained is an essential part of etiquette. Naturally, there are also many ways to do this..."

talents.name: As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute
talents.desc: On the orders of the President of the Spina di Rosula, call for a magnificent Rosula Dorata Salute. Unleashes a massive cannon bombardment on opponents in front of her, dealing AoE Geo DMG and providing Cannon Fire Support for a duration afterward, periodically dealing Geo DMG to nearby opponents. When cannon attacks hit opponents, Navia will gain 1 charge of Crystal Shrapnel. This effect can be triggered up to once every 2.4s. "The Spina di Rosula's salute is a preemptive celebration of the successful conclusion of our negotiations and is fired just before talks begin. Don't misunderstand, it isn't in any way, shape, or form some kind of threat."

talents.name: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
talents.desc: For 4s after using <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color>, the DMG dealt by Navia's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks will be converted into <color=geo>Geo DMG</color> which cannot be overridden by other Elemental infusions, and the DMG dealt by Navia's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, and Plunging Attacks will be increased by 40%.

talents.name: Mutual Assistance Network
talents.desc: For each <color=pyro>Pyro</color>/<color=electro>Electro</color>/<color=cryo>Cryo</color>/<color=hydro>Hydro</color> party member, Navia gains 20% increased ATK. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

talents.name: Painstaking Transaction
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Fontaine Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: A Lady's Rules for Keeping a Courteous Distance
constellations.desc: Each charge of Crystal Shrapnel consumed when Navia uses <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> will restore 3 Energy to her and decrease the CD of <color=skill>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> by 1s. Up to 9 Energy can be gained this way, and the CD of "<color=skill>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color>" can be decreased by up to 3s.

constellations.name: The President's Pursuit of Victory
constellations.desc:
Each charge of Crystal Shrapnel consumed will increase the CRIT Rate of this <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> instance by 12%. CRIT Rate can be increased by up to 36% in this way.
In addition, when <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> hits an opponent, one Cannon Fire Support shot from <color=skill>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> will strike near the location of the hit. Up to one instance of Cannon Fire Support can be triggered each time <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> is used, and DMG dealt by said Cannon Fire Support this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

constellations.name: Businesswoman's Broad Vision
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Oathsworn Never Capitulate
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> hits an opponent, that opponent's <color=geo>Geo RES</color> will be decreased by 20% for 8s.

constellations.name: Negotiator's Resolute Negotiations
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>As the Sunlit Sky's Singing Salute</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Flexible Finesse of the Spina's President
constellations.desc: If more than 3 charges of Crystal Shrapnel are consumed when using <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color>, each charge consumed beyond the first 3 increases the CRIT DMG of that <color=skill>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> by 45%, and any charges consumed beyond the first 3 are returned to Navia.

gaming.name: Gaming
gaming.title: Leonine Vanguard
gaming.description: Guard of the Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency, and the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe.
gaming.affiliation: Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency

talents.name: Stellar Rend
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Bestial Ascent
talents.desc: Pounces forward using the Wushou arts, leaping high into the air after coming into contact with a target or surface. After Gaming has used Bestial Ascent to rise into the air, he will use the especially powerful Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider when performing a Plunging Attack. Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider The DMG from Plunging Attacks caused by Bestial Ascent is converted to Pyro DMG that cannot be overridden by other elemental infusions. Upon landing, Gaming will consume a fixed amount of HP. Gaming's HP cannot be reduced below 10% by this method. Charmed Cloudstrider DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG. "The beast leaps and plucks the greens, prosperity all around us rings. May wealth and health come to us all — and may we have a grand ol' ball!"

talents.name: Suanni's Gilded Dance
talents.desc:
Gaming enters Wushou Stance, briefly applying <color=pyro>Pyro</color> to him, recovering a fixed amount of HP, and summons his companion, the Suanni Man Chai, to smash into his target, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
After bashing its target, Man Chai will roll to a nearby location before moving towards Gaming. When it links up with Gaming, Man Chai will leave the field and reset the CD for Gaming's Elemental Skill, <color=skill>Bestial Ascent</color>.
While Wushou Stance is active, when Gaming lands with Charmed Cloudstrider attack or completes the forward pounce attack from <color=skill>Bestial Ascent</color> with over 50% HP, he will summon Man Chai again.
Each Gaming can only have 1 Man Chai on the field simultaneously.
This effect will be canceled once Gaming leaves the field.

"The golden beast brings fortune, blazing lights, and brilliant sights! Now that's what you call an abundant life!"

talents.name: Dance of Amity
talents.desc: After Bestial Ascent's Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider hits an opponent, Gaming will regain 1.5% of his Max HP once every 0.2s for 0.8s.

talents.name: Air of Prosperity
talents.desc: When Gaming has less than 50% HP, he will receive a 20% Incoming Healing Bonus. When Gaming has 50% HP or more, Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider will deal 20% more DMG.

talents.name: The Striding Beast
talents.desc:
Increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10% during the day (6:00 – 18:00).
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Bringer of Blessing
constellations.desc: When the Suanni Man Chai from <color=skill>Suanni's Gilded Dance</color> meets back up with Gaming, it will heal 15% of Gaming's HP.

constellations.name: Plum Blossoms Underfoot
constellations.desc: When Gaming receives healing and this instance of healing overflows, his ATK will be increased by 20% for 5s.

constellations.name: Awakening Spirit
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Bestial Ascent</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Soar Across Mountains
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Bestial Ascent</color>'s Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider hits an opponent, it will restore 2 Energy to Gaming. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: Demon-Daunting Roar
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Suanni's Gilded Dance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Tame All Beasts
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Bestial Ascent</color>'s Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider CRIT Rate increased by 20% and CRIT DMG increased by 40%, and its attack radius will be increased.

xianyun.name: Xianyun
xianyun.title: Passerine Herald
xianyun.description: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as "Cloud Retainer." Expert in all kinds of mechanical contraptions, her heart now turns towards the affairs of the mortal world, through which she walks under the name "Xianyun."

talents.name: Word of Wind and Flower
talents.desc: Normal Attack Summons swirling winds to perform up to 4 attacks, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and launches a Breeze Bolt in a straight line that deals Anemo DMG to opponents along its path. Plunging Attack Gathers the power of Anemo and plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: White Clouds at Dawn
talents.desc:
Xianyun enters the Cloud Transmogrification state, in which she will not take Fall DMG, and uses Skyladder once.
In this state, her Plunging Attack will be converted into Driftcloud Wave instead, which deals <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color> and ends the Cloud Transmogrification state. This DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG.
Each use of Skyladder while in this state increases the DMG and AoE of the next Driftcloud Wave used.

Skyladder
Can be used while in mid-air. Xianyun leaps forward, dealing <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> to targets along her path.
During each Cloud Transmogrification state Xianyun enters, Skyladder may be used up to 3 times and 1 instance of Skyladder DMG can be dealt to any one opponent.
If Skyladder is not used again in a short period, the Cloud Transmogrification state will be canceled.

If Xianyun does not use Driftcloud Wave while in this state, the next CD of <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color> will be decreased by 3s.

Do not shake Cloud Retainer's hand too tightly; cranes are quite adept at gripping.

talents.name: Stars Gather at Dusk
talents.desc:
Brings forth a sacred breeze that deals <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color> and heals all nearby characters based on Xianyun's ATK. It will also summon the "Starwicker" mechanism.

Starwicker
● Continuously follows the active character and periodically heals all nearby characters based on Xianyun's ATK.
● Starts with 8 stacks of Adeptal Assistance. While Adeptal Assistance is active, nearby active characters will have their jump height increased.
● When the active character completes a Plunging Attack, Starwicker will consume 1 stack of Adeptal Assistance and deal <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>.
Only 1 Starwicker can exist simultaneously.

This is the newest invention in the "Lunastar Artifices" series, of which previous creations include the Supreme Cuisine Machine, the Snowdrift Mechanism, Supreme Housekeeping Machine, the Floating Toting Device, and the Bloom Pruner. This series was intended for young humans Cloud Retainer held in great esteem, and so was not designed with a certain half-adeptus in mind. However, when offered Starwicker, a certain female disciple of hers had these emotionless words to say: "No thank you."
Cloud Retainer thus had no choice but to keep it herself.

talents.name: Galefeather Pursuit
talents.desc:
Each opponent hit by Driftcloud Waves from White Clouds at Dawn will grant all nearby party members 1 stack of Storm Pinion for 20s. Max 4 stacks. These will cause the characters' Plunging Attack CRIT Rate to increase by 4%/6%/8%/10% respectively.
Each Storm Pinion created by hitting an opponent has an independent duration.

talents.name: Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm
talents.desc:
When the Starwicker created by <color=skill>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 180% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 9,000.
Each Plunging Attack shockwave DMG instance can only apply this increased DMG effect to a single opponent. Each character can trigger this effect once every 0.4s.

talents.name: Crane Form
talents.desc:
Increases gliding SPD for your own party members by 15%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Purifying Wind
constellations.desc: <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Aloof From the World
constellations.desc:
After using a Skyladder from <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color>, Xianyun's ATK will be increased by 20% for 15s.
Additionally, the effects of the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm</color>" will be enhanced: When the Starwicker created by <color=skill>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 360% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 18,000.
Each Plunging Attack shockwave DMG instance can only apply this increased DMG effect to a single opponent. Each character can trigger this effect once every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm</color>."

constellations.name: Creations of Star and Moon
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystery Millet Gourmet
constellations.desc: After using Skyladder 1/2/3 times during one <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color> Cloud Transmogrification state, when a Driftcloud Wave unleashed during that instance hits an opponent, it will heal all nearby party members for 50%/80%/150% of Xianyun's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

constellations.name: Astride Rose-Colored Clouds
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cloudkeeper's Spirit
constellations.desc:
After Xianyun uses 1/2/3 Skyladders within one Cloud Transmogrification caused by <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color>, the CRIT DMG of a Driftcloud Wave created in this instance of Cloud Transmogrification will be increased by 15%/35%/70%.
Within 16s after Xianyun has used <color=skill>Stars Gather at Dusk</color>, <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color> will not enter CD. This effect will be canceled once she has used <color=skill>White Clouds at Dawn</color> 8 times.

of_travels_and_treasures_a_thankyou_gift.name: Of Travels and Treasures: A Thank-You Gift

vishaps_and_where_to_find_them_2021_03_0.name: Vishaps and Where to Find Them

vibrant_harriers_aloft_in_spring_breeze_.name: Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze

iniquitous_baptist.name: Iniquitous Baptist
iniquitous_baptist.title: The Guide to the Dark Paradise

algorithm_of_semiintransient_matrix_of_o.name: Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network
algorithm_of_semiintransient_matrix_of_o.title: Tomb Guard of the Desert King

emperor_of_fire_and_iron.name: Emperor of Fire and Iron
emperor_of_fire_and_iron.title: Searing Tide Pulsing Beneath the Mountains

millennial_pearl_seahorse.name: Millennial Pearl Seahorse
millennial_pearl_seahorse.title: Nameless Lord of the Great Lake

alldevouring_narwhal.name: All-Devouring Narwhal
alldevouring_narwhal.title: Visitor from the Far Side of the Sea of Stars

ajilenakh_nut.name: Ajilenakh Nut
ajilenakh_nut.desc: A fruit that grows on evergreen trees within desert oases. The flesh under the tough skin is thick, sweet, and delicious, making it an important food source amongst the desert peoples.

almond.name: Almond
almond.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

bamboo_shoot.name: Bamboo Shoot
bamboo_shoot.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

berry.name: Berry
berry.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

bird_egg.name: Bird Egg
bird_egg.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

bulle_fruit.name: Bulle Fruit
bulle_fruit.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

cabbage.name: Cabbage
cabbage.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

chilled_meat.name: Chilled Meat
chilled_meat.desc:
Rare, fresh meat.
This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

coffee_beans.name: Coffee Beans
coffee_beans.desc: A common fruit in Teyvat with a special aroma. It can be used to make beverages after being ground.

crab.name: Crab
crab.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

eel_meat.name: Eel Meat
eel_meat.desc: The fresh meat of an Unagi/Eel. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.

fermented_juice.name: Fermented Juice
fermented_juice.desc: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

fish.name: Fish
fish.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

flour.name: Flour
flour.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

fowl.name: Fowl
fowl.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

glabrous_beans.name: Glabrous Beans
glabrous_beans.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

horsetail.name: Horsetail
horsetail.desc: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.

lavender_melon.name: Lavender Melon
lavender_melon.desc: A brightly-colored fruit. The flesh within transforms into food with a unique mouthfeel when cooked.

lotus_head.name: Lotus Head
lotus_head.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

matsutake.name: Matsutake
matsutake.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

milk.name: Milk
milk.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

mint.name: Mint
mint.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

mushroom.name: Mushroom
mushroom.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

mysterious_meat.name: Mysterious Meat
mysterious_meat.desc: A fresh chunk of meat that seems to be radiating an enigmatic aura. Wonder what it'll taste like?

onion.name: Onion
onion.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

pepper.name: Pepper
pepper.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

pinecone.name: Pinecone
pinecone.desc: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

potato.name: Potato
potato.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

radish.name: Radish
radish.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

rice.name: Rice
rice.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

salt.name: Salt
salt.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

seagrass.name: Seagrass
seagrass.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

shrimp_meat.name: Shrimp Meat
shrimp_meat.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

snapdragon.name: Snapdragon
snapdragon.desc: Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.

starshroom.name: Starshroom
starshroom.desc: A fungus with a cap that resembles a five-pointed star. It is quite hardy indeed. Once it matures, the center of the cap will split open.

sumeru_rose.name: Sumeru Rose
sumeru_rose.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

sunsettia.name: Sunsettia
sunsettia.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

sweet_flower.name: Sweet Flower
sweet_flower.desc: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

tofu.name: Tofu
tofu.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

wheat.name: Wheat
wheat.desc: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

zaytun_peach.name: Zaytun Peach
zaytun_peach.desc: The fruit of a forest shrub. Its flesh is firm and sweet. It is said to have a calming effect on the mind.

butter.name: Butter
butter.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

cream.name: Cream
cream.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

ham.name: Ham
ham.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

smoked_fowl.name: Smoked Fowl
smoked_fowl.desc: Fowl that has been smoked. The firmness of the meat gives new texture to dishes.

spice.name: Spice
spice.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

sugar.name: Sugar
sugar.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

bacon.name: Bacon
bacon.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

crab_roe.name: Crab Roe
crab_roe.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

jam.name: Jam
jam.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

sausage.name: Sausage
sausage.desc: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

crown_of_insight.name: Crown of Insight
crown_of_insight.desc: Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

mora.name: Mora
mora.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

wanderers_advice.name: Wanderer's Advice
wanderers_advice.desc: These experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

adventurers_experience.name: Adventurer's Experience
adventurers_experience.desc: These experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

heros_wit.name: Hero's Wit
heros_wit.desc: These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

brilliant_diamond_sliver.name: Brilliant Diamond Sliver
brilliant_diamond_sliver.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

brilliant_diamond_fragment.name: Brilliant Diamond Fragment
brilliant_diamond_fragment.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

brilliant_diamond_chunk.name: Brilliant Diamond Chunk
brilliant_diamond_chunk.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

brilliant_diamond_gemstone.name: Brilliant Diamond Gemstone
brilliant_diamond_gemstone.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

vayuda_turquoise_fragment.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
vayuda_turquoise_fragment.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

vayuda_turquoise_chunk.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
vayuda_turquoise_chunk.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

vayuda_turquoise_gemstone.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
vayuda_turquoise_gemstone.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

prithiva_topaz_fragment.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
prithiva_topaz_fragment.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

prithiva_topaz_chunk.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
prithiva_topaz_chunk.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

prithiva_topaz_gemstone.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
prithiva_topaz_gemstone.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

vajrada_amethyst_fragment.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
vajrada_amethyst_fragment.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

vajrada_amethyst_chunk.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
vajrada_amethyst_chunk.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

vajrada_amethyst_gemstone.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
vajrada_amethyst_gemstone.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

nagadus_emerald_fragment.name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
nagadus_emerald_fragment.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."

nagadus_emerald_chunk.name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
nagadus_emerald_chunk.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."
"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."

nagadus_emerald_gemstone.name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
nagadus_emerald_gemstone.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"I had a very, very long dream..."
"In it, people were holding hands, dancing in a circle, be they sages or fools, dancers or warriors, puppets or statues of gods..."
"That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

ash_wood.name: Ash Wood
ash_wood.desc:
Wood from the Ash Tree. With its extremely high strength, it is not only used for making strong load-bearing components, but also for making sheets to be used as wall reinforcements, and for transportation crates subject to frequent shocks.
Can be used to create furnishings.

cypress_wood.name: Cypress Wood
cypress_wood.desc:
Wood from the Cypress Tree. The core has a relatively large radius, with thinner sapwood. Though not solid or reliable as metal, the wood possesses unique advantages for buildings components with a large surface area.
Can be used to create furnishings.

linden_wood.name: Linden Wood
linden_wood.desc:
Wood from the Linden Tree. With a smooth texture and light color, few wood chips are produced even during fine processing. Often carved into delicate handicrafts or used to make compact parts for wooden mechanisms.
Can be used to create furnishings.

mallow_wood.name: Mallow Wood
mallow_wood.desc:
Wood from the Mallow Tree. With a tough core, it is suitable for building the foundations and frames of houses. It is easy to craft and process, so it takes relatively less manual labor to produce beautiful furniture.
Can be used to create furnishings.

transoceanic_pearl.name: Transoceanic Pearl
transoceanic_pearl.desc:
A small crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.
Fontemer Aberrants arise from Fontaine's seas. They are believed to be a unique life form born from the mysterious energy in the water.

transoceanic_chunk.name: Transoceanic Chunk
transoceanic_chunk.desc:
A crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.
It gives off a somewhat mysterious energy.
Although many legends speak of great life forms residing in remote seas beyond human reach, ordinary oceans can hardly compare to the vibrant seas of Fontaine.

xenochromatic_crystal.name: Xenochromatic Crystal
xenochromatic_crystal.desc:
A large crystal obtained from a defeated Fontemer Aberrant.
It contains a mysterious energy.
All rivers and seas originate in Fontaine, but the water loses all its unique properties once it flows outside Fontaine's borders.

meshing_gear.name: Meshing Gear
meshing_gear.desc:
Clockwork meka's gear.
It is a crucial part of the meka's transmission structure. The whole system will malfunction if this gear is absent.

mechanical_spur_gear.name: Mechanical Spur Gear
mechanical_spur_gear.desc:
Clockwork meka's gear.
Although many breakthroughs have been made in the kinematics of clockwork meka, its dynamics research has not seen any major advancement beyond the framework laid down by Alain Guillotin four hundred years ago.

artificed_dynamic_gear.name: Artificed Dynamic Gear
artificed_dynamic_gear.desc:
Clockwork meka's gear.
Precision processing and advancement of material science are the keys to clockwork meka's development in Fontaine. With the help of advanced equipment, any engineer is capable of making a meka that outshines "Lord-Artificer" Alain Guillotin's creation.

drop_of_tainted_water.name: Drop of Tainted Water
drop_of_tainted_water.desc:
A small drop of water obtained from the Tainted Hydro Phantasm you defeated.
The life force in it has yet to ebb away.

scoop_of_tainted_water.name: Scoop of Tainted Water
scoop_of_tainted_water.desc:
The water obtained from the Tainted Hydro Phantasm you defeated.
The life force in it has yet to ebb away.
Today, with the Oceanids extirpated from Fontaine, strange elemental life forms that are far from elegant have appeared in the waters.

newborn_tainted_hydro_phantasm.name: Newborn Tainted Hydro Phantasm
newborn_tainted_hydro_phantasm.desc:
A new life form that arose from the dispersed Tainted Hydro Phantasm. It is trapped inside a bottle.
The life contained within the waters is formless, and formless life is born of water and gains water's shape.

rift_core.name: Rift Core
rift_core.desc:
A shard left by Breacher Primus.
It bears no resemblance to any form of life on earth.

foreign_synapse.name: Foreign Synapse
foreign_synapse.desc:
A shard left by Breacher Primus.
This strange life form originates in Elynas and inhabits the area.

alien_life_core.name: Alien Life Core
alien_life_core.desc:
Breacher Primus's core.
There is no way to exterminate this life form. One reduced to nothing but its core will resurrect the next day or in decades. Luckily, it is neither aggressive nor intelligent, so Fontainians would just keep their distance.

old_operatives_pocket_watch.name: Old Operative's Pocket Watch
old_operatives_pocket_watch.desc:
A standard-issue pocket watch given to Fatui Operatives.
The erosion and oxidation on the casing serve as a loyal record of its owners' days spent as an instrument, enforcing the Fatui's will.

operatives_standard_pocket_watch.name: Operative's Standard Pocket Watch
operatives_standard_pocket_watch.desc:
A standard-issue pocket watch given to Fatui Operatives.
The head of the watch is not well-designed, as the outer casing has way too many sharp angles, which can cause excessive wear and tear on clothes. As such, there will always be those who will stuff this watch into a more practical, less distinctive casing for use.

operatives_constancy.name: Operative's Constancy
operatives_constancy.desc:
An accessory with a Delusion mounted on it. This is source of the Fatui Operative's power.
That said, taking it off would not detract from the fact that said Operative has physical abilities far beyond that of ordinary humans, forged through long years of training and combat experience. As for them, they are well-aware that they have sacrificed their past, present, and future upon the altar of the Fatui's ideal paradise, such that the damage they cause themselves on account of using a Delusion's power matters not at all.

artificed_spare_clockwork_component_copp.name: Artificed Spare Clockwork Component — Coppelia
artificed_spare_clockwork_component_copp.desc:
