Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

philosophies_of_gold.name: Philosophies of Gold
philosophies_of_gold.desc:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

teachings_of_transience.name: Teachings of Transience
teachings_of_transience.desc:
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
Fleeting glories are the highest expression of mortal beauty, for are we mortals not like the flashing lightning itself? Like a lovely dream or blossoming spark, we shall leave a gorgeous mark on the eternal night sky.

guide_to_transience.name: Guide to Transience
guide_to_transience.desc:
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
We find the greatest joys in mortal life in transient dreams, for is life itself not like the shadow of the thunder? Pursue your dreams into the clouds if you wish, and enjoy the unexpected silence of the dim lamp-lit nights.

philosophies_of_transience.name: Philosophies of Transience
philosophies_of_transience.desc:
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

teachings_of_elegance.name: Teachings of Elegance
teachings_of_elegance.desc:
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like the sea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They will not cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown into the mud, staining its dignity.

guide_to_elegance.name: Guide to Elegance
guide_to_elegance.desc:
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance shuns arrogance. The elegant are ever humble, and only by discarding vanity and sloth may one see clearly — and is there not beauty and loveliness even in the basest of appearances?

philosophies_of_elegance.name: Philosophies of Elegance
philosophies_of_elegance.desc:
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance — that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.

teachings_of_light.name: Teachings of Light
teachings_of_light.desc:
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
The ruler who claims to have perceived all forever aims to hoard celestial glory. But this vision that cannot be shared only leads people to long for it more fiercely, like moths diving into the flame.

guide_to_light.name: Guide to Light
guide_to_light.desc:
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though the sun rays themselves should be blocked by layers upon layers of clouds, there are still those in the thunder god's land who dream of piercing that wrathful sea of lightning to pursue the glory of the divine, fearing not that they shall be cruelly struck down.

philosophies_of_light.name: Philosophies of Light
philosophies_of_light.desc:
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.

teachings_of_admonition.name: Teachings of Admonition
teachings_of_admonition.desc:
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition comes from a pure heart. Only sensible words of goodwill can express profound wisdom and free the sprout of knowledge from the shackles of arrogance.

guide_to_admonition.name: Guide to Admonition
guide_to_admonition.desc:
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition is paired with wise thinking. Careful deliberation affords humble words a clarity that convinces the wise and enlightens the foolish. Such words allow wisdom to flow like an unobstructed river.

philosophies_of_admonition.name: Philosophies of Admonition
philosophies_of_admonition.desc:
Admonition is the branches of the nation of wisdom.
Admonition is completed by good deeds. What is done confers real meaning upon what is said. When one's mind, words, and deeds are aligned, their nourishment shall guarantee the fruition of wisdom's tree.

teachings_of_ingenuity.name: Teachings of Ingenuity
teachings_of_ingenuity.desc:
Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.
Ingenuity springs forth from benevolent consideration. They say that "a poisonous tree bears no kind fruit." Similarly, ingenious nascent ideas are always born from determined and benign minds, for only they are worthy bearers of wisdom.

guide_to_ingenuity.name: Guide to Ingenuity
guide_to_ingenuity.desc: Ingenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom. Ingenuity sets words of integrity on the right path. One who thinks out of goodwill and in a clever and careful fashion never deviates from the path of boons. Yet one who thinks with contempt and malice shall taint their words with despicable colors.

philosophies_of_ingenuity.name: Philosophies of Ingenuity
philosophies_of_ingenuity.desc:
ngenuity is the leaf-veins of the nation of wisdom.
Ingenuity is completed by harmonious conduct. What is done completes what is thought. Wisdom blooms where the mind, words, and practice converge.

teachings_of_praxis.name: Teachings of Praxis
teachings_of_praxis.desc:
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes stem from an unwavering will. All wisdom is manifested through the unyielding pursuit of goodness. Where goodness is not practiced, ingenuity and eloquence wither.

guide_to_praxis.name: Guide to Praxis
guide_to_praxis.desc:
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes validate words of honesty. Though one speaks and acts out of goodwill, one has not yet obtained wisdom. Wisdom, born from action, is a signet pressed upon honest words.

philosophies_of_praxis.name: Philosophies of Praxis
philosophies_of_praxis.desc:
Praxes are the roots of the nation of wisdom.
Praxes bring forth the fruit of wisdom. Practice grants itself meaning, and it is only by treading a path that unites action, speech, and thought that the wise may reach perfection.

tile_of_decarabians_tower.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
tile_of_decarabians_tower.desc: The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

debris_of_decarabians_city.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
debris_of_decarabians_city.desc: Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

fragment_of_decarabians_epic.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
fragment_of_decarabians_epic.desc: Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

scattered_piece_of_decarabians_dream.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
scattered_piece_of_decarabians_dream.desc:
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

boreal_wolfs_milk_tooth.name: Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth
boreal_wolfs_milk_tooth.desc:
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

boreal_wolfs_cracked_tooth.name: Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth
boreal_wolfs_cracked_tooth.desc:
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

boreal_wolfs_broken_fang.name: Boreal Wolf's Broken Fang
boreal_wolfs_broken_fang.desc:
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal  that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

boreal_wolfs_nostalgia.name: Boreal Wolf's Nostalgia
boreal_wolfs_nostalgia.desc: The Wolf King, believing himself to despise humans, thought himself unable to envision a happy life for humanity, making him unworthy of becoming the Lord of the Winds of the world. Therefore, he chose to disappear. Yet, in truth, he gazes on the ones abandoned by the world ever so gently.

fetters_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.name: Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator
fetters_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.desc:
It's a human thing to exaggerate a hero's story, even to the point of elevating the fetters that once bound the hero to the level of an enemy of true freedom.
As a result, these fetters were granted extraordinary powers.

chains_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.name: Chains of the Dandelion Gladiator
chains_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.desc: The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

shackles_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.name: Shackles of the Dandelion Gladiator
shackles_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.desc:
Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.
She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

dream_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.name: Dream of the Dandelion Gladiator
dream_of_the_dandelion_gladiator.desc:
Vennessa may have been freed from slavery, but she then found herself subject to many other, even greater forms of bondage. What began as a duty to her tribespeople extended to all of Mondstadt, then to the concept of freedom itself, and beyond a point even to the whole world.
What she really hoped for, in truth, was that the world might grow stronger.

luminous_sands_from_guyun.name: Luminous Sands from Guyun
luminous_sands_from_guyun.desc: The stone pillars that tower amid Guyun Stone Forest were once the stone spears Morax used to defeat his enemies. Over time, the gods' substance has seeped into the pillars that pin them down, lending them divine power. The pillars sometimes shed fragments of hatred and curses.

lustrous_stone_from_guyun.name: Lustrous Stone from Guyun
lustrous_stone_from_guyun.desc: The learned know that Guyun Stone Forest is far more than simply a miraculous sight on the sea to behold: It is the cemetery of the former gods of Liyue. Hatred and filth have periodically risen up from it, but all have been subdued by a demon-conquering young man.

relic_from_guyun.name: Relic from Guyun
relic_from_guyun.desc: The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

divine_body_from_guyun.name: Divine Body from Guyun
divine_body_from_guyun.desc: That which lurks within and animates this relic are the divine remains of lamenting gods. They are unrealized ideals, designs for a prosperous humanity that could never be. They may now lie deep within stone and sea, but they will not go quietly into the night.

mist_veiled_lead_elixir.name: Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
mist_veiled_lead_elixir.desc: Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.

mist_veiled_mercury_elixir.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
mist_veiled_mercury_elixir.desc: With Fulu, the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

mist_veiled_gold_elixir.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
mist_veiled_gold_elixir.desc: Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

mist_veiled_primo_elixir.name: Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
mist_veiled_primo_elixir.desc: An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

grain_of_aerosiderite.name: Grain of Aerosiderite
grain_of_aerosiderite.desc: A black meteor once fell beyond Liyue's Sea of Clouds, said to have fallen to vanquish a monster. However, it was stained by powerful tainted blood, so this item no longer possesses the pure power of Rex Lapis.

piece_of_aerosiderite.name: Piece of Aerosiderite
piece_of_aerosiderite.desc: Rumors of sea monsters are commonplace in Liyue, since the other shore is an unknown region that lies outside of Teyvat. Without the protection of The Seven, all that lies beyond is unknown chaos. Only power beyond the order of Teyvat is able to stain the power of Rex Lapis black.

bit_of_aerosiderite.name: Bit of Aerosiderite
bit_of_aerosiderite.desc: The coastal nations of Teyvat refer to the region beyond the protection of The Seven as the Dark Sea. It is said that many defeated gods refused to live under the new order of The Seven, so they fled to remote islands and became evil gods. However, their powers came from the same source as Rex Lapis, separate from this all-devouring darkness.

chunk_of_aerosiderite.name: Chunk of Aerosiderite
chunk_of_aerosiderite.desc: When Khaenri'ah was destroyed, a great sinner created endless monsters with dark, alien blood flowing through their veins. They rampaged across the land, destroying all in their paths. They were mutated lifeforms, and the mutations were caused by powers from beyond this world. The black serpentine dragon Durin that attacked Mondstadt was one such mutated being.

coral_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
coral_branch_of_a_distant_sea.desc: Watatsumi Island is the furthest from Narukami Island in the Inazuman island chain, and its name means "the god of the oceans" in the island's ancient tongue. Legend has it that when the great serpent first arose within the abyssal nation of ever-night, its fluorescent body was covered in myriad-colored coral.

jeweled_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
jeweled_branch_of_a_distant_sea.desc: This coral cannot be found anywhere in Teyvat, but was a gift that the great serpent obtained when it broke into the Dark Sea. For that abyssal snake, to be filled with coral was to be mighty, and its power would be shaved away as those corals were lost. In other words, those corals contain power far beyond the norm.

jade_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
jade_branch_of_a_distant_sea.desc:
Fleeing into the Dark Sea, the god that had lost everything met the abandoned people who had nothing within the ocean depths. Thus it elected to remain and become their "Orobashi no Mikoto," their "Watatsumi Omikami."
It is said that the great snake god once broke off all the coral branches on its body to give light to the children who were curled up in the darkness. They also say that it used these coral branches to create a huge ladder to allow those children to once again reach the surface and see the light of day.

golden_branch_of_a_distant_sea.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea
golden_branch_of_a_distant_sea.desc:
The meaning that lies behind the name "Watatsumi" is simply the unrequited hopes that the abandoned people who dwelt in the deep sea pinned upon the serpent god that led them.
And it was also because the serpent god now had people who worshiped it that it stayed in the world it should have long fled, breaking off the coral branches that adorned its body, treading upon land where it should not have, and facing a foe it could never hope to match — till at last, its divine form was sundered along with the mountains, its ichor turned into plasma, and its will and power became a curse that could never be extinguished: Tatarigami.

narukamis_wisdom.name: Narukami's Wisdom
narukamis_wisdom.desc: In the past, the ancients would climb the peak now known as Mt. Yougou and bend wood that had been charred by lightning into a hook to offer as an effigy unto the thundering force that lit up the skies and shook the earth. This shape would eventually become the "Electro Mitsudomoe" symbol, symbolizing the favor, wisdom, and might of Electro, and also the people who represent these values.

narukamis_joy.name: Narukami's Joy
narukamis_joy.desc: Those who belong to the Shogunate Commissions are those who administer and exercise power. In the monster-filled tales of the ancient past, those who were deeply trusted by the Shogun would bear talismans with this hooked design on their person, and just as the word "commission" means to "joyfully serve" in the old tongue, those who received her favor would return it with love and loyalty. Yet, after a certain point in time, nothing would be as it was before.

narukamis_affection.name: Narukami's Affection
narukamis_affection.desc:
All demons who wander in the wilderness or live amongst mortals will be attracted by the sight of the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, represented by the Electro Mitsudomoe. Though their lives may be longer than any creature, they will at last come to their end. If those with limited lifespans hanker after eternity, then they can only pray that "Eternity" remembers them. And she did indeed answer their prayers, remembering them all, friend and foe alike, in her heart. No matter whether it was the demon owls who resided amidst the fog and ripped through the skies, the bake-danuki who dared to trespass her imperial gardens, or that female oni, lovely as the moon and mighty in battle, yet who would eventually come to blows with her... Whether it was the tengu who soared on dark wings or the Kitsune Saiguu who once walked by her side, but who eventually disappeared forever...
These countless tales have come to rest within her heart, and someday, they will surely shine again in the eternal paradise of her dreams.

narukamis_valor.name: Narukami's Valor
narukamis_valor.desc:
The treasure of the lord of thunder is her majesty, and that majesty is embodied in her valor and wrath. Her wrath comes from the love that persists in her heart, and her valor supports that anger. Thus, whomsoever should block the path towards eternity or lay a finger on Inazuma's people shall become her foe.
They say that there were four great spirits, three divine foxes, and two great swords — but that the symbol of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, could only be a single strike, unsurpassed and brilliant as a meteor.

mask_of_the_wicked_lieutenant.name: Mask of the Wicked Lieutenant
mask_of_the_wicked_lieutenant.desc:
Folktales tell that once upon a time, there lived an oni named Torachiyo. Torachiyo was a highly skilled warrior, such that it was once said the Torachiyo might dance amid a thousand blades, juunihitoe robes becoming shredded like falling violet petals, and yet not receive a single wound. Yet this oni would eventually betray the Shogun and revolt, becoming shorn of an arm and a horn in the battle before fleeing and slaying itself in a fit of furious madness.
Hearsay holds that the stubborn oni often hold fear and distress in their hearts. That they should fantasize about eternity yet fear the moment, and are apt to become swallowed by terror or anger is their just reward. This mask depicts Torachiyo, fangs bared.

mask_of_the_tigers_bite.name: Mask of the Tiger's Bite
mask_of_the_tigers_bite.desc:
"Sumirezome Sangetsu Kogetsukan" depicts the fierce oni Torachiyo shattering the Shogun's naginata with a single bite, thus gaining the upper hand for a time. As such, masks that are based on him have finely crafted fangs.
In the denouement of this tale, the wounded oni fled into the forest, deathly afraid of showing himself even to the cold moonlight. The wind that whispers through the alleys and valleys can be said to resemble his quiet cries of agony, and so there is a poetic seasonal expression for this in Inazuma: "Torachiyo's Wind."

mask_of_the_onehorned.name: Mask of the One-Horned
mask_of_the_onehorned.desc:
In the lost songs of the oni nursemaids, Torachiyo was an elegant young man, strong of body and fair of face. He was once a beloved lieutenant of the Shogun, and he followed her into the dark abyssal realms to repel the defiled ones, winning renown for the oni, whose blood thinned with each passing day.
None now sing these songs, but the mask of a horned oni, even in a different form, still possesses power beyond the norm.

mask_of_the_kijin.name: Mask of the Kijin
mask_of_the_kijin.desc:
Chiyo, a warrior of the oni tribe with the Electro Mitsudomoe emblem emblazoned on her back, was once swallowed whole by a beast from beyond this world that had a tiger's body and a serpent's tail while holding back the forces of darkness. At last, she tore the creature's innards apart from within, breaking free.
This is the origin of the phrase "Chiyo the Tiger-Bite," and would be changed over many years to "Torachiyo."
But within the belly of the beast, she was stained by a deep sin and saw her comrades ripped to shreds by those blood-red teeth. Steeped in darkness as far as the eye could see, she would eventually draw her sword upon the Almighty Narukami Ogosho. Her sword-arm and one horn would be cloven, and she would flee from the city into the forest like a wounded beast. There, they say that she was taken for some unknown monster and slain by the tengu, or perhaps by the Shuumatsuban — or perhaps by a scion of the Iwakura Clan training deep in the mountains, for her features had been twisted by hatred and the agony of her wounds. Or perhaps she even met the oni-masked, sword-bearing doll near the corpse of the giant serpent, and there ended her life's journey.
Few among those who fought against the abyss in those days were spared pitch-dark dreams. Those who slew monsters and then became them were hardly the minority. The border between worlds grows fragile, and corruption of this kind is perhaps not merely monodirectional.

copper_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
copper_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.desc:
Under the instructions of the First Sage, the ancestors of the forest people made these talismans using withered trees to commemorate the Lord of Verdure.
The talisman's shape was inspired by the forest dew. It symbolizes the permeation of wisdom into mortal minds.

iron_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
iron_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.desc:
Later, the Lord of Verdure taught people the mystery of the forging of black iron. The innocent mortals thus grasped the knowledge of using fire to forge blades.
The Lord of Verdure took pleasure in their knowledge — Lethal as fire and blades were to her, they made ordinary people powerful.

silver_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
silver_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.desc:
n the myriad lore of the forest, the one in the striped cape that resembled blazing flames was the Greater Lord of the Labyrinths and the Owner of the Moon-Mirrored Spring.
When he bowed his head and struck up a friendship with the Lord of Verdure, the tokens of their friendship were the gems that glimmered like water and silver that gleamed like the moonlight.
To repay such a gesture, the Lord of Verdure promised to keep secrets for the Greater Lord of the Labyrinths and safeguard the intricate and beautiful dreams of the rainforest.
No one could have foretold that the magnificent mansion of secrets and dreams would later fade away amidst the shroud of the dark flame of oblivion, after which its ash returned to the soil and became nutrients for the virgin rainforests.

golden_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.name: Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew
golden_talisman_of_the_forest_dew.desc:
"Mortals hold dear three things only: the spring water that embraces the moonlight, verdant life, and ageless youth..."
The nature of "wisdom" is not domination over all minds or scheming to gain all the benefit. Instead, it is about empowering even ordinary beings to one day overcome their imposed constraints.
Though the roar of the tiger is no longer heard in the forest and the resilient guardians would seclude themselves within the dreams of children... On the night when every secret golden seal is lifted and all dreams glow like amber in the moonlight, perhaps she and her beloved people will eventually win genuine freedom.

oasis_gardens_reminiscence.name: Oasis Garden's Reminiscence
oasis_gardens_reminiscence.desc:
People used to say that the Lord of Flowers was the Lord of Joy and Happiness. Freshwater sprang from her sleeves, and thus was the oasis of blossoming flowers born in the desert. Flowers and grasses followed in her footsteps, and gleaming moonlight cleared the way for her.
In the bitter days when the sky turned its back on the ground, the Lord of Flowers extended her mercy to each and every one of the mortals, letting them regain their happiness and egos, allowing leisure and luxury to resume.

oasis_gardens_kindness.name: Oasis Garden's Kindness
oasis_gardens_kindness.desc:
In the literature buried deep beneath the yellow sands, the Lord of Flowers was the Mistress of Dreams.
She bestowed dreams upon the exiled, the manic, and the foolish. In those dreams, they were presented with their dearest delights. Burdened by the brutality of reality, they were fascinated by the charm of the Lord of Flowers and captivated by her beauty and care.

oasis_gardens_mourning.name: Oasis Garden's Mourning
oasis_gardens_mourning.desc:
The Lord of Flowers was in an amicable relationship with the Jinn.
The Mistress of Flowers and Oases joined hands with the Lord of Deserts and built Ay-Khanoum, the "City of Amphitheaters," which carried the meaning of "City of the Moon Maiden" in the ancient language of the Jinn.
Later, however, it was said that the Lord of Flowers died due to the malice of the burning sun and yellow sand, after which the blossoms of purple Padisarahs were never seen again in the oases.
After the departure of the Lord of Flowers, the sandstorms keened, the Jinn sobbed, and the moonlight-silver gem disc lost its original, glad purpose, giving off a mournful glimmer.

oasis_gardens_truth.name: Oasis Garden's Truth
oasis_gardens_truth.desc:
"Who would worship a departed god?"
The Lord of Flowers was once in alliance with two other gods. Apart from wisdom and power, she also brought mercy and joy to her people.
Just as the earth needs more than the burning sunshine and pouring rain, to the people of the Lord of Flowers, joy and love, singing and music, and wine and extravagance were just as vital as strength and sensibility.
It is said that flowers blossom so that they may enjoy a spectacular death, and that death was precisely the wholehearted pursuit of the Lord of Flowers — for death adds bitterness to lost joy, and intensifies with time across endless memories.
The ignorant Lord of Deserts was never aware of her reasoning. He only reveled in her immense charm and grace — and as misguided as such fervent affections might be, they were well within the calculations of the Lord of Flowers.

echo_of_scorching_might.name: Echo of Scorching Might
echo_of_scorching_might.desc:
A long time ago, the people of the Lord of Deserts carved these imperial insignias based on robust beetles to memorialize the bright sun that marked the shifting of day and night, as well as the infinity of such times.
Though the name of that Lord is no longer mentioned, these imperial insignias have been preserved through time, each bearing a faint ambiance of those past glories.
These insignias travel with the descendants of the Eremite Tribe, silently telling the tales of their then-Lord.

remnant_glow_of_scorching_might.name: Remnant Glow of Scorching Might
remnant_glow_of_scorching_might.desc:
To weave together myriad thoughts and reign over countless souls — this is the essence of power.
However, power is not cold-blooded tyranny. Its true ideal, at its heart, is to create a utopia free of worry, schemes, and slavery.
It was just as the silent lord saw in the crystal's secrets, and just as the lost companion had once taught.
The dark insect insignia and the steel judgment thus laid the foundations of the kingdom's rules.

dream_of_scorching_might.name: Dream of Scorching Might
dream_of_scorching_might.desc:
Silver moonlight and clear springs once completed the scenery of the oases. But as the Lord of Flowers faded in the darkening sandstorm, so was the worriless golden paradise submerged by death.
In the poetry of the Eremite Tribe, the moon cast its silver light on the crimson mantle, causing Al-Ahmar, the Mourning King, to be driven to madness.
In a melancholic desert ballad, driven by the haunting nostalgia, the lonely king created an ever-youthful dreamland in the center of the desert, where undisturbed water sprang up and perpetual dusk remained.

olden_days_of_scorching_might.name: Olden Days of Scorching Might
olden_days_of_scorching_might.desc:
In the era when the ignorant Lord of Deserts ruled, his power descended upon every inch of the land like the scorching sun.
Ancient stone tablets record that he turned his power into seven rays of blinding light or seven pillars, which he granted equally and mercifully to everyone. No one was neglected, nor was anyone discontented.
That was a forgotten golden era, an era when the Lord of Flowers had faded into the sands and the Lord of Verdure was determined to leave. Only the descendants in the yellow sand chose to follow their god. Even as the grim shadow of calamity loomed, the power in which they had faith shone brightly like amber and gold.
Yet calamity befell nonetheless, and the golden insectoid insignias were buried beneath the depths of shrine and palace, under collapsed pillars engraved with images of eagles and bulls.

northlander_bow_billet.name: Northlander Bow Billet
northlander_bow_billet.desc: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

northlander_claymore_billet.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
northlander_claymore_billet.desc: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

northlander_catalyst_billet.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
northlander_catalyst_billet.desc: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

northlander_polearm_billet.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
northlander_polearm_billet.desc: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

northlander_sword_billet.name: Northlander Sword Billet
northlander_sword_billet.desc: Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

midlander_bow_billet.name: Midlander Bow Billet
midlander_bow_billet.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

midlander_catalyst_billet.name: Midlander Catalyst Billet
midlander_catalyst_billet.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

midlander_claymore_billet.name: Midlander Claymore Billet
midlander_claymore_billet.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star claymores.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

midlander_polearm_billet.name: Midlander Polearm Billet
midlander_polearm_billet.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

midlander_sword_billet.name: Midlander Sword Billet
midlander_sword_billet.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

feathery_fin.name: Feathery Fin
feathery_fin.desc:
A fin fragment taken from a defeated Xuanwen Beast's back.
Even though Xuanwen Beasts can't fly over long distances, these feather-like fins enable them to swiftly pursue their prey.

lunar_fin.name: Lunar Fin
lunar_fin.desc:
A fin taken from a defeated Xuanwen Beast's back.
The soft, moonlight-esque glow on the fin gives off a sense of serenity.

chasmlight_fin.name: Chasmlight Fin
chasmlight_fin.desc:
An elegant fin taken from a defeated Xuanwen Beast's back.
The faint light it reflects contains traces of adeptal power. In the still of the night, even the most violent beasts briefly sink into a peaceful slumber, reminiscing on times when dreams belonged not only to humans.

cloudseam_scale.name: Cloudseam Scale
cloudseam_scale.desc:
Cold and solid scales from a Solitary Suanni. They retain pure adeptal power even after falling off and cannot be damaged by ordinary weapons.
Ordinary beasts can sometimes be affected by errant adeptal power and become more powerful than usual. However, a suanni's adeptal power originates from within themselves, which is why their leader is often regarded as equal to adepti.

chenyu_adeptea.name: Chenyu Adeptea
chenyu_adeptea.desc: Tea grown in warm, moist areas in Chenyu Vale. After millennia of careful cultivation, the tea today emits a rich fragrance that can be savored from several streets away.

clearwater_jade.name: Clearwater Jade
clearwater_jade.desc: Jade from Chenyu Vale. Named for its cool, refreshing touch, that is much like clear water.

achievement_bowmaster.name: Achievement: Bowmaster
achievement_bowmaster.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Marksmanship"

achievement_challenger.name: Achievement: Challenger
achievement_challenger.desc: Even if you're just going out to get a single dandelion, there will be obstacles in your path. But you love a challenge, don't you?
achievement_challenger.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series I"

achievement_cliffhanger.name: Achievement: Cliffhanger
achievement_cliffhanger.desc: They say that storytellers love their cliffhangers — but you? You've heard it all before.
achievement_cliffhanger.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Stone Harbor's Nostalgia: Series I"

achievement_colors_of_the_rainbow.name: Achievement: Colors of the Rainbow
achievement_colors_of_the_rainbow.desc: Light can refract into countless colors, but people stop at seven because they're lazy to count. Perhaps the elements are like that, too.
achievement_colors_of_the_rainbow.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Elemental Specialist: Series I"

achievement_deep_dark.name: Achievement: Deep & Dark
achievement_deep_dark.desc: The deeper you delve, the more secrets you shall uncover.
achievement_deep_dark.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I"

achievement_explorer.name: Achievement: Explorer
achievement_explorer.desc: After all your wanderings throughout the world, do not forget the reason why you first set out.
achievement_explorer.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series I"

achievement_hero.name: Achievement: Hero
achievement_hero.desc: Your hero's journey began before you knew it, but it's the experiences that really made it special.
achievement_hero.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "The Hero's Journey"

achievement_hill_dwellers.name: Achievement: Hill Dwellers
achievement_hill_dwellers.desc: The hilichurls were dubbed the "hill devils." But a certain young girl named Musk insists on calling them the "hill dwellers."
achievement_hill_dwellers.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Olah!: Series I"

achievement_reunion.name: Achievement: Reunion
achievement_reunion.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series I"

achievement_snowy_land.name: Achievement: Snowy Land
achievement_snowy_land.desc: You've heard many stories about Snezhnaya. What does it look like in your mind's eye?
achievement_snowy_land.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Snezhnaya Does Not Believe in Tears: Series I"

achievement_virtuoso.name: Achievement: Virtuoso
achievement_virtuoso.desc: After mastering these skills, you may just find that you can get by just fine without engaging in battle. If you are without any commission to complete, that is.
achievement_virtuoso.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "The Art of Adventure"

liyue_stillness_of_stone.name: Liyue: Stillness of Stone
liyue_stillness_of_stone.desc: Witness the lonely, cloud-covered peaks of Liyue.
liyue_stillness_of_stone.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts"

mondstadt_whistling_wind.name: Mondstadt: Whistling Wind
mondstadt_whistling_wind.desc: Listen to the singing of Mondstadt's birds and winds.
mondstadt_whistling_wind.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song"

achievement_challenger_ii.name: Achievement: Challenger II
achievement_challenger_ii.desc: That which awaits at the end of the challenges is...
achievement_challenger_ii.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series II"

achievement_challenger_iii.name: Achievement: Challenger III
achievement_challenger_iii.desc: Finally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!
achievement_challenger_iii.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series III"

achievement_snowy_summit.name: Achievement: Snowy Summit
achievement_snowy_summit.desc: A draconian peak must be scaled.
achievement_snowy_summit.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Visitors on the Icy Mountain"

achievement_tea_time.name: Achievement: Tea Time
achievement_tea_time.desc: The days and months pass within the teapot.
achievement_tea_time.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "A Realm Beyond: Series I"

achievement_vacation_home.name: Achievement: Vacation Home
achievement_vacation_home.desc: The world is wide under the eaves.
achievement_vacation_home.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "A Realm Beyond: Series II"

achievement_full_bloom.name: Achievement: Full Bloom
achievement_full_bloom.desc: Gather ye then soil from all corners of the universe, and from it may countless flowers grow.
achievement_full_bloom.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "A Realm Beyond: Series III"

achievement_gate.name: Achievement: Gate
achievement_gate.desc: What encounters lie on the other side of this door?
achievement_gate.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series II"

achievement_stone_dragon.name: Achievement: Stone Dragon
achievement_stone_dragon.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series IV"

achievement_traversal.name: Achievement: Traversal
achievement_traversal.desc: A traveler shall experience ten thousand tales, and each shall form a part of the traveler's soul.
achievement_traversal.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series II"

inazuma_kujou_insignia.name: Inazuma: Kujou Insignia
inazuma_kujou_insignia.desc: This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Tenryou Commission's Kujou Clan.
inazuma_kujou_insignia.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I"

achievement_nails.name: Achievement: Nails
achievement_nails.desc: Wait, if these fish can't be eaten, then why are we hammering these nails into fishhooks?" "Oh, you wouldn't understand."
achievement_nails.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I"

inazuma_sangonomiya_crest.name: Inazuma: Sangonomiya Crest
inazuma_sangonomiya_crest.desc: This is the emblem of the Sangonomiya Clan, the leaders of Watatsumi's people.
inazuma_sangonomiya_crest.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II"

inazuma_eagleplume.name: Inazuma: Eagleplume
inazuma_eagleplume.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog " [sic]

inazuma_tokoyo.name: Inazuma: Tokoyo
inazuma_tokoyo.desc: "O Mighty Sun! What use are your heat and light if you cannot own all that they survey?"
inazuma_tokoyo.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "The Light of Day"

achievement_chasm.name: Achievement: Chasm
achievement_chasm.desc: Where once miners industriously delved and tunneled, now all is silent. Only the Glazed Sand Crystal and marrows of stone, both millennia-old, still give off any brilliance.
achievement_chasm.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Chasmlighter"

achievement_thunderclap.name: Achievement: Thunderclap
achievement_thunderclap.desc: Listen to the sound that comes from the clouds. That is its resentful rage, and its tiny wish.
achievement_thunderclap.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series V"

achievement_fated_encounter.name: Achievement: Fated Encounter
achievement_fated_encounter.desc: One day, our encounter at this moment shall shine like a star of reminiscence in our hearts.
achievement_fated_encounter.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series III"

achievement_roaming.name: Achievement: Roaming
achievement_roaming.desc: Every journey and memory is a unique miracle that only belongs to the traveler.
achievement_roaming.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series III"

sumeru_shimmering_woods.name: Sumeru: Shimmering Woods
sumeru_shimmering_woods.desc: What dreams lie within the rich slumber of the stories deep in the woods?
sumeru_shimmering_woods.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore"

achievement_mirrored_dreams.name: Achievement: Mirrored Dreams
achievement_mirrored_dreams.desc: "A millennium of obsession and tragic yearning has long been lost in the sandstorms of those blazing nights. But the eternal verdant oasis of her dreams is, in all likelihood, as tender as it was at the first..."
achievement_mirrored_dreams.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Challenger: Series VI"

achievement_seven_lights.name: Achievement: Seven Lights
achievement_seven_lights.desc: Anyone can play a tune that belongs just to them, and like the dew under grass, can reflect the seven lights of heaven.
achievement_seven_lights.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Elemental Specialist: Series II"

sumeru_sandtreader.name: Sumeru: Sandtreader
sumeru_sandtreader.desc: The sands subsume the tracks of travelers, and they await the day when a gust of wind will reveal gilded memories once more.
sumeru_sandtreader.obtain: Reward for completing all Achievements under "Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I"

achievement_invoker.name: Achievement: Invoker
achievement_invoker.desc: "In this village, no one can defeat me!"
achievement_invoker.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Genius Invokation TCG"

sumeru_sandstorm.name: Sumeru: Sandstorm
sumeru_sandstorm.desc: The endless sandstorm conceals ancient dreams...
sumeru_sandstorm.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II"

achievement_infinitum.name: Achievement: Infinitum
achievement_infinitum.desc: "Oh, Khvarena in your endless forms, protect this imperiled land. The blights and glories of the earthly realm are naught but the illusion of existing seeds."
achievement_infinitum.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Blessed Hamada"

achievement_transient_twilight.name: Achievement: Transient Twilight
achievement_transient_twilight.desc: "I will forget the flowers of yesteryear, the daylight, the rain. I ask that you remember in my stead, in this nascent world, and hold to that lost dream."
achievement_transient_twilight.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Challenger: Series VII"

achievement_mariner.name: Achievement: Mariner
achievement_mariner.desc: The hands of travelers have touched ten thousand streams. They all flow from the same font of the world's waters, and all return to the same sea.
achievement_mariner.obtain: Complete all achievements under "Mortal Travails: Series IV".

achievement_orbits.name: Achievement: Orbits
achievement_orbits.desc: "O Almighty Sovereign, the Universitas Magistrorum has provided the predictions you requested: The two stars have been captured by the world's gravity... After a lengthy orbital period, today their paths shall intertwine once more.".
achievement_orbits.obtain: Complete all achievements under "Meetings in Outrealm: Series IV".

fontaine_judgment.name: Fontaine: Judgment
fontaine_judgment.desc: The insignia of the new Hydro Archon. Even without any legal notice, it is understood that none dare use it without permission.
fontaine_judgment.obtain: Complete all achievements under "Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)".

achievement_perpetual.name: Achievement: Perpetual
achievement_perpetual.desc: "No one hears the dream that shattered between the conches and the gears. Only the tireless mechanical dancer still queries the echoes of the past day and night with its every elegant step."
achievement_perpetual.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Challenger: Series VIII"

fontaine_redemption.name: Fontaine: Redemption
fontaine_redemption.desc: The official logo of the Fortress of Meropide. It is our dearest hope that all who wish to honor order and live out their lives in peace shall not ever be associated with the organization this insignia represents.
fontaine_redemption.obtain: Reward for completing all achievements under "Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)"

fontaine_completeness.name: Fontaine: Completeness
fontaine_completeness.desc: "The evening clouds scatter in the sky and the creek shines gold under the setting sun. My shadow wanders alone, akin to a lonely apparition at the bottom of a waterfall."
fontaine_completeness.obtain: Complete all achievements under Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)

travel_notes_catch_the_wind.name: Travel Notes: Catch the Wind
travel_notes_catch_the_wind.desc: The most difficult part of writing a travel journal is coming up with the beginning.

travel_notes_fading_star.name: Travel Notes: Fading Star
travel_notes_fading_star.desc: So long as there is still desire left in your heart, when you hold your head high you will see that which glitters but is not light.

travel_notes_chalk.name: Travel Notes: Chalk
travel_notes_chalk.desc: Remember to keep warm when setting foot on the mountain.

travel_notes_mingxiao.name: Travel Notes: Mingxiao
travel_notes_mingxiao.desc: When everyone's wishes are gathered together, they can light up the long night.

travel_notes_windblume.name: Travel Notes: Windblume
travel_notes_windblume.desc: Who has seen the wind? Neither you nor I. Nor has anyone ever seen love, till a bouquet comes flying by.

travel_notes_sub_space_recreation.name: Travel Notes: Sub-Space Recreation
travel_notes_sub_space_recreation.desc: How many nights have you spent with "a stone for your pillow?"

travel_notes_grand_narukami_shrine.name: Travel Notes: Grand Narukami Shrine
travel_notes_grand_narukami_shrine.desc: The sakura of Mt. Yougou symbolizes the Grand Narukami Shrine.

travel_notes_moonchaser.name: Travel Notes: Moonchaser
travel_notes_moonchaser.desc: May the moonlight wash over you, O pursuer!

travel_notes_heavenly_general.name: Travel Notes: Heavenly General
travel_notes_heavenly_general.desc: "You were not created to punish evil. But as to what your purpose is... I fear that I, too, do not know."

travel_notes_lyratum.name: Travel Notes: Lyratum
travel_notes_lyratum.desc: Only this flower remains on the heights where all trees have withered.

travel_notes_flowing_hues.name: Travel Notes: Flowing Hues
travel_notes_flowing_hues.desc: The luxurious colors flow past — all things are renewed.

travel_notes_awakening.name: Travel Notes: Awakening
travel_notes_awakening.desc: The three realms quake, heaven and earth awaken. The Sangacorexes, too, rise again from their eternal slumber.

travel_notes_irodori.name: Travel Notes: Irodori
travel_notes_irodori.desc: Those who share a hobby are known as a group as "fans." Best come up with those stories, everyone, before the kitsune editor-in-chief dreams up copyright law... Or perhaps she has already dreamed it up, but does not altogether mind?

travel_notes_divine_will.name: Travel Notes: Divine Will
travel_notes_divine_will.desc: "Once upon a time, loyal souls did scatter east and west like swan geese." "Today I light my lantern, that they may not lose their way."

travel_notes_azure_main.name: Travel Notes: Azure Main
travel_notes_azure_main.desc: Years have gone by, and you wake from an old dream. Inside the keepsake shell, lingers the blue ocean of those summer days.

travel_notes_woodlands.name: Travel Notes: Woodlands
travel_notes_woodlands.desc: Beneath the tranquil moon and inside the deep valley grows blooming roses. 'Tis a paradise with your presence.

travel_notes_returning_winds.name: Travel Notes: Returning Winds
travel_notes_returning_winds.desc: The years come and go. Only remembrance and the winds that return do not change.

travel_notes_fungus_land.name: Travel Notes: Fungus Land
travel_notes_fungus_land.desc: "Traveler, there is no need to grieve, for the wind at dawn will blow the fungal spores carrying beautiful dreams to the fields that contain your hopes..."

travel_notes_stellar_rivers.name: Travel Notes: Stellar Rivers
travel_notes_stellar_rivers.desc: Forgotten is the name of the ancient feast, scattered are the three rivers amongst a plumage of clouds, and across the curve of twilight does autumn yet linger.

travel_notes_rhythm_and_rhyme.name: Travel Notes: Rhythm and Rhyme
travel_notes_rhythm_and_rhyme.desc: With magnificent sunglow sheds light on the night sky, chimes are orchestrated to celebrate the bygone year. The gilded palaces are adorned with beaded curtains, the railings painted silver by bright moonlight, and the feasts brimmed with jolly singing and dances. Is that flowers or fireworks? A wealth of instruments plays in unison, harmonious and pleasant.

travel_notes_artful_intent.name: Travel Notes: Artful Intent
travel_notes_artful_intent.desc: It is said that experiencing true love is like seeing a ghost. Most folks speak of both as hearsay, but true witnesses remain few and far between. That said, since even ghosts can manifest here, perhaps true love is also waiting right around the next corner.

travel_notes_crown_of_glory.name: Travel Notes: Crown of Glory
travel_notes_crown_of_glory.desc: "Knowledge serves as the crown of time, and reminiscence is bound to the time we shared as one."

travel_notes_secrets.name: Travel Notes: Secrets
travel_notes_secrets.desc: Never forget the time you once spent with games and good friends. Never forget what it feels like to have no worries about the future.

travel_notes_vivid_illumination.name: Travel Notes: Vivid Illumination
travel_notes_vivid_illumination.desc: Who knows? Perhaps the phantasmal light that only exists on the other side of this transparent glass can ever so slightly brighten up the world on this one.

travel_notes_primordial_waters.name: Travel Notes: Primordial Waters
travel_notes_primordial_waters.desc: Timepieces accompany the tranquil passing of the years, as fish accompany the swirling of the clear waters of the font. If all that is must one day wither, why are my thoughts as clear as ever?

travel_notes_falling_star.name: Travel Notes: Falling Star
travel_notes_falling_star.desc: Make a wish before you toss the arrow. If you manage to get it into the pot, who knows — your wish just might come true.

travel_notes_whirling_waltz.name: Travel Notes: Whirling Waltz
travel_notes_whirling_waltz.desc: Even if the clockwork stops ticking, even if the puppets stop stepping forward. Though our memories be frozen eternally as coral, do not forget our adventures and the time we spent together.

amber_bunny.name: Amber: Bunny
amber_bunny.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Amber

barbara_flow.name: Barbara: Flow
barbara_flow.desc: When Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.
barbara_flow.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Barbara

beidou_weighing_anchor.name: Beidou: Weighing Anchor
beidou_weighing_anchor.desc: "Weighing anchor out to sea, one is wont to waver. But look to the skies, and the stars shall light the way."
beidou_weighing_anchor.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Beidou

bennett_recognition.name: Bennett: Recognition
bennett_recognition.desc: A sign of recognition from Benny's Adventure Team.
bennett_recognition.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Bennett

chongyun_spirit_blade.name: Chongyun: Spirit Blade
chongyun_spirit_blade.desc: This was originally a peachwood sword made of ice. But a big enough ice block makes a better exorcist's tool than peachwood.
chongyun_spirit_blade.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Chongyun

diluc_flames.name: Diluc: Flames
diluc_flames.desc: Master Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.
diluc_flames.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Diluc

fischl_night_raven.name: Fischl: Night Raven
fischl_night_raven.desc: A raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"
fischl_night_raven.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Fischl

jean_the_winds_course.name: Jean: The Winds' Course
jean_the_winds_course.desc: The dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.
jean_the_winds_course.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Jean

kaeya_pavo_ocellus.name: Kaeya: Pavo Ocellus
kaeya_pavo_ocellus.desc: The pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?
kaeya_pavo_ocellus.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaeya

keqing_lightning_stiletto.name: Keqing: Lightning Stiletto
keqing_lightning_stiletto.desc: It was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...
keqing_lightning_stiletto.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Keqing

klee_explosive.name: Klee: Explosive
klee_explosive.desc: Klee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)
klee_explosive.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Klee

lisa_tempus_fugit.name: Lisa: Tempus Fugit
lisa_tempus_fugit.desc: An hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.
lisa_tempus_fugit.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lisa

mona_starry_sky.name: Mona: Starry Sky
mona_starry_sky.desc: A girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.
mona_starry_sky.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Mona

ningguang_phoenix.name: Ningguang: Phoenix
ningguang_phoenix.desc: They say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...
ningguang_phoenix.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ningguang

noelle_protector.name: Noelle: Protector
noelle_protector.desc: Noelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.
noelle_protector.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Noelle

qiqi_cold_storage.name: Qiqi: Cold Storage
qiqi_cold_storage.desc: What should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.
qiqi_cold_storage.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Qiqi

razor_wolvensprint.name: Razor: Wolvensprint
razor_wolvensprint.desc: It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.
razor_wolvensprint.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Razor

sucrose_bio_alchemy.name: Sucrose: Bio-Alchemy
sucrose_bio_alchemy.desc: If you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.
sucrose_bio_alchemy.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sucrose

venti_azure_sky.name: Venti: Azure Sky
venti_azure_sky.desc: The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.
venti_azure_sky.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Venti

xiangling_fresh_from_the_pan.name: Xiangling: Fresh from the Pan
xiangling_fresh_from_the_pan.desc: Try saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."
xiangling_fresh_from_the_pan.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xiangling

xingqiu_rainbow.name: Xingqiu: Rainbow
xingqiu_rainbow.desc: Come watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.
xingqiu_rainbow.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xingqiu

childe_foul_legacy.name: Childe: Foul Legacy
childe_foul_legacy.desc: This bears all the marks of that fellow who gallivants as he pleases across the continent with his ever-changing combat styles. Yet, his "Foul Legacy" was not originally his. Rather, it was taught to him by that solitary girl who dwelt in the darkest corners of the universe.
childe_foul_legacy.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Tartaglia

diona_meow.name: Diona: Meow!
diona_meow.desc: All who have Kätzlein blood will have such feline features. An ancient prank played by a certain someone, perhaps?
diona_meow.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Diona

xinyan_songs_end.name: Xinyan: Song's End
xinyan_songs_end.desc: Xinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.
xinyan_songs_end.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xinyan

zhongli_planet_befall.name: Zhongli: Planet Befall
zhongli_planet_befall.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Zhongli

albedo_sun_blossom.name: Albedo: Sun Blossom
albedo_sun_blossom.desc: Allow me to bear witness to this miracle.
albedo_sun_blossom.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Albedo

ganyu_qilin.name: Ganyu: Qilin
ganyu_qilin.desc: Do no harm to plant nor insect.
ganyu_qilin.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Ganyu

hu_tao_spirit_soother.name: Hu Tao: Spirit Soother
hu_tao_spirit_soother.desc: Director Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.
hu_tao_spirit_soother.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Hu Tao

xiao_mask.name: Xiao: Mask
xiao_mask.desc: He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.
xiao_mask.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Xiao

rosaria_indenture.name: Rosaria: Indenture
rosaria_indenture.desc: The unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.
rosaria_indenture.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Rosaria

eula_ice_sealed.name: Eula: Ice-Sealed
eula_ice_sealed.desc: A cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.
eula_ice_sealed.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Eula

yanfei_impartial.name: Yanfei: Impartial
yanfei_impartial.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yanfei

kaedehara_kazuha_autumn_maple_viewing.name: Kaedehara Kazuha: Autumn Maple-Viewing
kaedehara_kazuha_autumn_maple_viewing.desc: "The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."
kaedehara_kazuha_autumn_maple_viewing.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kaedehara Kazuha

kamisato_ayaka_folding_fan.name: Kamisato Ayaka: Folding Fan
kamisato_ayaka_folding_fan.desc: Ayaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.
kamisato_ayaka_folding_fan.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kamisato Ayaka

sayu_mujimuji_daruma.name: Sayu: Muji-Muji Daruma
sayu_mujimuji_daruma.desc: It is even smaller than Sayu, sure, but it can help her do the things she doesn't want to do.
sayu_mujimuji_daruma.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sayu

yoimiya_auratus_spark.name: Yoimiya: Auratus Spark
yoimiya_auratus_spark.desc: Even momentarily sparks can leave beautiful, unquenchable flames in the hearts of those who watch the night sky.
yoimiya_auratus_spark.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yoimiya

aloy_dawn.name: Aloy: Dawn
aloy_dawn.desc: "Everything I do is in the service of life, not death."
aloy_dawn.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Aloy

kujou_sara_tengu.name: Kujou Sara: Tengu
kujou_sara_tengu.desc: Kujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.
kujou_sara_tengu.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kujou Sara

raiden_shogun_enlightenment.name: Raiden Shogun: Enlightenment
raiden_shogun_enlightenment.desc: Not simply Ei, and not merely the Raiden Shogun. Observe yourself also with one stormy eye, and you will someday reach a breakthrough.
raiden_shogun_enlightenment.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with the Raiden Shogun

sangonomiya_kokomi_the_deep.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Deep
sangonomiya_kokomi_the_deep.desc: All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.
sangonomiya_kokomi_the_deep.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Sangonomiya Kokomi

thoma_blazing_guard.name: Thoma: Blazing Guard
thoma_blazing_guard.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Thoma

gorou_leisurely_hound.name: Gorou: Leisurely Hound
gorou_leisurely_hound.desc: As long as you believe in the path you are walking, then everything you encounter on your journey will be a source of happiness.
gorou_leisurely_hound.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Gorou

itto_oni_face.name: Itto: Oni Face
itto_oni_face.desc: A real man puts sorrow and anger behind him and smiles brightly for the world to see!
itto_oni_face.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Arataki Itto

shenhe_comb.name: Shenhe: Comb
shenhe_comb.desc: The early onset of white hair is often correlated to one's sorrows. Since "comb" and "scatter" are similarly read in Liyue's language, they believe that combing one's hair is the same as scattering one's misfortunes.
shenhe_comb.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Shenhe

yun_jin_rhyme.name: Yun Jin: Rhyme
yun_jin_rhyme.desc: Ms. Yun has two sorts of teachers. The critics of her onstage performances are one, and the books on rhyme she references while writing are the other.
yun_jin_rhyme.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yun Jin

yae_miko_kitsune_dreaming.name: Yae Miko: Kitsune Dreaming
yae_miko_kitsune_dreaming.desc: Where can Yae Miko's fox form be found? In your dreams, that's where.
yae_miko_kitsune_dreaming.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yae Miko

kamisato_ayato_ripple.name: Kamisato Ayato: Ripple
kamisato_ayato_ripple.desc: The camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.
kamisato_ayato_ripple.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kamisato Ayato

kuki_shinobu_net.name: Kuki Shinobu: Net
kuki_shinobu_net.desc: "You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden is truly frightening..."
kuki_shinobu_net.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Kuki Shinobu

yelan_throw.name: Yelan: Throw
yelan_throw.desc: "Dice are always quite hard to make 'fair.' That goes double for dice with shoddier workmanship. The weighting on each numbered side will almost certainly be unbalanced."
yelan_throw.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Yelan

shikanoin_heizou_temari.name: Shikanoin Heizou: Temari
shikanoin_heizou_temari.desc: A Temari of entwining strings in various colors. It must have taken someone's great effort to make such an item, yet Heizou only sees it as a simple game to untangle each string.
shikanoin_heizou_temari.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Shikanoin Heizou

collei_good_virtue.name: Collei: Good Virtue
collei_good_virtue.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Collei

dori_jinni.name: Dori: Jinni
dori_jinni.desc: If you wipe the lamp she gave you and then scrub the Mora you gave her, no wish is unattainable... right?
dori_jinni.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Dori

tighnari_dew_kissed.name: Tighnari: Dew-Kissed
tighnari_dew_kissed.desc: Tighnari takes good care of his big, fluffy tail. The essential oil he uses was extracted from flowers and mixed together meticulously. It gives off a faint, calming scent.
tighnari_dew_kissed.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Tighnari

candace_grey_heron.name: Candace: Grey Heron
candace_grey_heron.desc: The burning winds of the past ruffle the heron's feathers, but the bird has eyes only for the morning star at first light.
candace_grey_heron.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Candace

cyno_silence.name: Cyno: Silence
cyno_silence.desc: Whenever Cyno falls into a profound silence, he must be considering some weighty judgment... Or perhaps he is simply considering something amusing.
cyno_silence.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Cyno

nilou_lotus_dance.name: Nilou: Lotus Dance
nilou_lotus_dance.desc: The lotus that blooms amidst the pure water is naught but a flash of light beneath her toes.
nilou_lotus_dance.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Nilou

layla_daydream.name: Layla: Daydream
layla_daydream.desc: "The starry sky in your dreams will illuminate your way forward, on the premise that the crystal in your heart reflects clear lights."
layla_daydream.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Layla

nahida_crescent.name: Nahida: Crescent
nahida_crescent.desc: The rising moon admires the sun, because her light can shine all over the earth. On the other hand, the setting sun is envious of the moon, for she can be accompanied by the sweetest of dreams.
nahida_crescent.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Nahida

faruzan_sealed_secret.name: Faruzan: Sealed Secret
faruzan_sealed_secret.desc: "A—Anyway! Next time, remember to refer to me as Madam Faruzan before you ask a question! Seriously..."
faruzan_sealed_secret.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Faruzan

wanderer_drifters_ballad.name: Wanderer: Drifter's Ballad
wanderer_drifters_ballad.desc: In a world most transient does the past hide, and in the whims of flowing flowers does thin snow abide.
wanderer_drifters_ballad.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with the Wanderer

alhaitham_enlightenment.name: Alhaitham: Enlightenment
alhaitham_enlightenment.desc: "The only things researchers should abide by are debates and dialectics. Only by questioning everything at all times can one avoid falling into prejudice."
alhaitham_enlightenment.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Alhaitham

yaoyao_yuegui.name: Yaoyao: Yuegui
yaoyao_yuegui.desc: "Can you guess which one here is Yuegui? That's right, all of them are!"
yaoyao_yuegui.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Yaoyao

dehya_purifying_flame.name: Dehya: Purifying Flame
dehya_purifying_flame.desc: Those that should be burned will be reduced to fly ash, so that all the precious things that should be preserved can be revealed.
dehya_purifying_flame.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Dehya

mika_index.name: Mika: Index
mika_index.desc: Every time he holds the map he illustrated in his hands, the boy feels like he is holding a small piece of rubbing of this world.
mika_index.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Mika

baizhu_relief.name: Baizhu: Relief
baizhu_relief.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Baizhu

kaveh_domed_court.name: Kaveh: Domed Court
kaveh_domed_court.desc: "When conceptualizing architecture, there is nothing wrong with imagining that the structure we build will surmount the firmament and outlast the stars."
kaveh_domed_court.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Kaveh

kirara_neko_box.name: Kirara: Neko Box
kirara_neko_box.desc: "To Kirara, the smiles on her customers' faces are the best rewards possible."
kirara_neko_box.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Kirara

freminet_progress.name: Freminet: Progress
freminet_progress.desc: As the clockwork devices do naught but round and round in circles turn, the dolls march forward.
freminet_progress.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Freminet

lynette_earnestness.name: Lynette: Earnestness
lynette_earnestness.desc: One major type of magic revolves around "appearing suddenly." Lynette is usually conserving her energy, but her serious side can "appear" as abruptly as pigeons from a hat.
lynette_earnestness.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lynette

lyney_pretense.name: Lyney: Pretense
lyney_pretense.desc: One major type of magic revolves around making things "vanish." Lyney has an arsenal of tricks up his sleeve. As his accomplice, as long as you are willing to turn a blind eye, all your problems may vanish as well.
lyney_pretense.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Lyney

neuvillette_surge.name: Neuvillette: Surge
neuvillette_surge.desc: The water's surface may seem placid as a pristine gem, but it may yet be lying in wait for an opportune moment to gush forth.
neuvillette_surge.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Neuvillette

wriothesley_detention.name: Wriothesley: Detention
wriothesley_detention.desc: Maintaining order at the Fortress of Meropide is no simple affair. As such, a deft and sometimes firm hand is needed — along with a small pinch of truly regrettable cruelty.
wriothesley_detention.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship 10 with Wriothesley

charlotte_exclusive.name: Charlotte: Exclusive
charlotte_exclusive.desc: "One, I've written an exclusive, and it's going to generate a lot of buzz for sure! Two, the newspaper said the situation is developing too slowly, so they're changing to a press release instead... Three, the person writing the press release will be in the Opera Epiclese as the defendant tomorrow, so they've decided to run my piece after all!"
charlotte_exclusive.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Charlotte

furina_banquet.name: Furina: Banquet
furina_banquet.desc: Can one person eat every cake? If they eat one per day, they should be able to enjoy cake for a week or so, right? But will the cakes stay fresh that long? Hmm... Well, don't worry, because there will be friends coming to eat the cakes together.
furina_banquet.obtain: Reward for reaching Friendship Level 10 with Furina

celebration_hypostasis.name: Celebration: Hypostasis
celebration_hypostasis.desc: My opponent for today seems to have an artistic temperament.
celebration_hypostasis.obtain: Obtained from the Hypostatic Symphony event

celebration_lantern_light.name: Celebration: Lantern-Light
celebration_lantern_light.desc: Every year on this day, the lanterns light up the night. May the fire never die, and may humanity endure.
celebration_lantern_light.obtain: Obtained from the Lantern Rite event

celebration_mechanicus.name: Celebration: Mechanicus
celebration_mechanicus.desc: You claim to have seen all mechanisms, but have you ever considered playing yourself as a pawn?
celebration_mechanicus.obtain: Obtained from the Lantern Rite event

celebration_feast.name: Celebration: Feast
celebration_feast.obtain: Obtained from the "Gifts of an Outworld Encounter" event (CN only)

celebration_fruit_of_wisdom.name: Celebration: Fruit of Wisdom
celebration_fruit_of_wisdom.desc: What knowledge might the fruit of wisdom bring, were it to descend upon the land? Either way, it'll taste good as a drink if left in Diona's hands.
celebration_fruit_of_wisdom.obtain: Obtained from the Energy Amplifier Initiation event

celebration_peekaboo.name: Celebration: Peekaboo!
celebration_peekaboo.desc: You can't see me. You can't see me.

celebration_battlesong.name: Celebration: Battlesong
celebration_battlesong.desc: Good omens must appear thrice for good fortune to come. One bows thrice at curtain call. The opponents to defeat number three.
celebration_battlesong.obtain: Obtained from the Legend of the Vagabond Sword event

celebration_kaboomball.name: Celebration: Kaboomball
celebration_kaboomball.desc: "In a land far, far away, there was a kingdom known as the Grand Alliance, and the people living there could throw ever-changing, quick, and powerful Kaboomballs."
celebration_kaboomball.obtain: Obtained from the Kaboomball Kombat event

celebration_vastness.name: Celebration: Vastness
celebration_vastness.desc: Imagine the vast expanse of a sea of stars. Imagine a one followed by a hundred zeros.
celebration_vastness.obtain: Obtained from the Google Play Gift Card Collab-Event

celebration_wondrous_calculation.name: Celebration: Wondrous Calculation
celebration_wondrous_calculation.desc: A true grandmaster can see the board a thousand steps ahead.
celebration_wondrous_calculation.obtain: Obtained from the Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders event

celebration_ikki.name: Celebration: Ikki
celebration_ikki.desc: "I will ask you a question, and you shall answer me with your sword."
celebration_ikki.obtain: Obtained from the Hyakunin Ikki event

celebration_shining_scale.name: Celebration: Shining Scale
celebration_shining_scale.desc: The universe does play host to just such a snake, whose scales glitter with precisely these colors.
celebration_shining_scale.obtain: Obtained from the Genshin Impact X Razer Collaboration event

celebration_binge_vessel.name: Celebration: Binge Vessel
celebration_binge_vessel.desc: There's a great many stories here, but no alcohol, so it's safe for Paimon to drink.
celebration_binge_vessel.obtain: Obtained from the Of Drink A-Dreaming event

celebration_lenticular_clouds.name: Celebration: Lenticular Clouds
celebration_lenticular_clouds.desc: The floating clouds dispersed to the thousand peaks at dawn.

celebration_euphonia.name: Celebration: Euphonia
celebration_euphonia.desc: The trees sing on the slopes of a thousand mountain valleys, accompanied by the music of the passing rain.
celebration_euphonia.obtain: Obtained from the Genshin Concert event

frostbearing_ancient_tree.name: Frostbearing: Ancient Tree
frostbearing_ancient_tree.desc: We shall rise again — the tree of old has sprouted anew.
frostbearing_ancient_tree.obtain: Reward for reaching Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude Lv. 9

inazuma_sacred_sakura.name: Inazuma: Sacred Sakura
inazuma_sacred_sakura.desc: Wherever the sakura petals fall, there the protection of the sacred tree rests.
inazuma_sacred_sakura.obtain: Reward for reaching Sacred Sakura's Favor Lv. 48

lumens_stone_of_light.name: Lumens: Stone of Light
lumens_stone_of_light.desc: What flows within this nameless, voiceless azure crystal? The secrets of the heavens? Or the whispers of the abyss?
lumens_stone_of_light.obtain: Reward for enhancing the Lumenstone Adjuvant to Lv. 10

sumeru_amrita.name: Sumeru: Amrita
sumeru_amrita.desc: The ancient Amrita Pool is suffused with recollections of times past. Perhaps it also contains the power that will create the future.
sumeru_amrita.obtain: Make 6 offerings to the Amrita Pool

sumeru_the_great_dream.name: Sumeru: The Great Dream
sumeru_the_great_dream.desc: "The time to flourish has yet to come. Hide me with care between the blades of grass and beneath the tallness of trees. Let me linger in that place of dreams."
sumeru_the_great_dream.obtain: Reach Tree of Dreams's Favor Level 48

liyue_a_thousand_ships.name: Liyue: A Thousand Ships
liyue_a_thousand_ships.desc: Many boats have been numbered by day and night.

liyue_in_the_clouds.name: Liyue: In the Clouds
liyue_in_the_clouds.desc: The peaks adorn the clouded moon.

mondstadt_blessing.name: Mondstadt: Blessing
mondstadt_blessing.desc: They who have it in their hearts to bless others shall themselves be blessed.

mondstadt_heros_fame.name: Mondstadt: Hero's Fame
mondstadt_heros_fame.desc: The name of the Honorary Knight has spread far and wide among the citizenry.

inazuma_kamisato_crest.name: Inazuma: Kamisato Crest
inazuma_kamisato_crest.desc: This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan.

inazuma_raiden_emblem.name: Inazuma: Raiden Emblem
